'''FreeCAD''' is a general purpose parametric 3D [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/CAD '''CAD'''] modeler. The development is completely [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Open_source Open Source] (LGPL License). FreeCAD is aimed directly at [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mechanical_engineering mechanical engineering] and [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Product_design product design] but also fits in a wider range of uses around engineering, such as architecture or other engineering specialties.
FreeCAD features tools similar to [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Catia Catia], [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Solidworks SolidWorks] or [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Solid_Edge Solid Edge], and therefore also falls into the category of [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/CAD '''MCAD'''], [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Product_Lifecycle_Management '''PLM'''], [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/CAx '''CAx'''] and [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Computer-aided_engineering '''CAE''']. It is a [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Parametric_feature_based_modeler feature based parametric modeler] with a modular software architecture which makes it easy to provide additional functionality without modifying the core system.
As with many modern 3D [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/CAD CAD] modelers it has many 2D components in order to sketch 2D shapes or extract design details from the 3D model to create 2D production drawings, but direct 2D drawing (like [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/AutoCAD#AutoCAD_LT AutoCAD LT]) is not the focus, neither are animation or organic shapes (like [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Maya_(software) Maya], [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/3ds_Max 3ds Max], [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Blender_%28software%29 Blender] or [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/CINEMA_4D Cinema 4D]), although, thanks to its wide adaptability, FreeCAD might become useful in a much broader area than its current focus.
FreeCAD makes heavy use of all the great open-source libraries that exist out there in the field of [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Scientific_Computation Scientific Computing]. Among them are [http://OpenCascade.org OpenCascade], a powerful CAD kernel, [http://www.Coin3D.org Coin3D], an incarnation of [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Open_Inventor Open Inventor], [http://www.qtsoftware.com/ Qt], the world-famous UI framework, and [http://www.python.org Python], one of the best scripting languages available. FreeCAD itself can also be used as a library by other programs.
FreeCAD is also fully [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cross-platform multi-platform], and currently runs flawlessly on Windows and Linux/Unix and Mac OSX systems, with the exact same look and functionality on all platforms.
For more about FreeCAD's capabilities, take a look at the [[Feature list]], the [[Getting_started#What's new| latest release notes]] or the [[Getting started]] articles, or head directly to the [[User hub]]!
<noinclude>[[Category:Template]]</noinclude>

'''FreeCAD'''的功能目的是成为一个3D [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/CAD '''CAD'''] 建模工具。她的开发完全遵循 [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Open_source Open Source] (GPL & LGPL License)协议。 FreeCAD的目标直指 [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mechanical_engineering 机械工程] 、 [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Product_design 产品设计] ，当然也适合工程行业内的其他广大用户，比如建筑或者其他特殊工程行业。
FreeCAD的功能特征类似[http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Catia Catia], [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Solidworks SolidWorks] 或 [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Solid_Edge Solid Edge], 因此也可以使用关键词 [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/CAD '''MCAD'''], [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Product_Lifecycle_Management '''PLM'''], [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/CAx '''CAx'''] 以及 [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Computer-aided_engineering '''CAE''']. 她是一个 [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Parametric_feature_based_modeler 功能化的参数化建模工具] ，是一个模块化的CAD核心环境，你可以在不修改核心程序的基础上为其开发插件、功能模块。
和其他3D [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/CAD CAD]建模工具一样，她也将拥有一个2D组件来将3D模型的准确设计信息转化为2D的产品图纸，二维静态图纸(比如: [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/AutoCAD#AutoCAD_LT AutoCAD LT]) 并不准确、动态或者有零件关系等概念（译者:仅仅是一些线条而已)(比如: [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Maya_(software) Maya], [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/3ds_Max 3ds Max] 或 [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/CINEMA_4D Cinema 4D]), 因此，得益于FreeCAD可以被广泛地改写（添加功能模块）, 她将比目前更加有用。
FreeCAD另外一个值得注意关注的是深度应用所有强大的已有开源库，例如[http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Scientific_Computation 计算机科学]. 其中包含 [http://OpenCascade.org OpenCascade], 强大的CAD内核, [http://Coin3D.org Coin3D](是 [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Open_Inventor OpenInventor]的进化版本), [http://www.qtsoftware.com/ Qt],著名的UI库,[http://www.python.org Python], 是目前最好的脚本语言。当然FreeCAD自身也可以被其他项目作为库来使用。
FreeCAD是一个真正的[http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cross-platform 多平台程序], 目前可在Windows、Linux/Unix以及Mac OSX系统上完美运行，并在所有平台上拥有一样的外观和功能。
有兴趣？看看 [[Feature list/cn|特色]] 或者 [[Getting started/cn|开始]] 文档,或者直接到[[User hub/cn|用户中心]]! <noinclude>[[Category:Template/cn]]</noinclude>

The development is completely [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Open_source Open Source] (LGPL License). FreeCAD is aimed directly at [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mechanical_engineering mechanical engineering] and [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Product_design product design] but also fits in a wider range of uses around engineering, such as architecture or other engineering specialties.
FreeCAD features tools similar to [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Catia Catia], [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Solidworks SolidWorks] or [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Solid_Edge Solid Edge], and therefore also falls into the category of [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/CAD '''MCAD'''], [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Product_Lifecycle_Management '''PLM'''], [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/CAx '''CAx'''] and [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Computer-aided_engineering '''CAE''']. It is a [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Parametric_feature_based_modeler feature based parametric modeler] with a modular software architecture which makes it easy to provide additional functionality without modifying the core system.
As with many modern 3D [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/CAD CAD] modelers it has many 2D components in order to sketch 2D shapes or extract design detail from the 3D model to create 2D production drawings, but direct 2D drawing (like [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/AutoCAD#AutoCAD_LT AutoCAD LT]) is not the focus, neither are animation or organic shapes (like [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Maya_(software) Maya], [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/3ds_Max 3ds Max], [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Blender_%28software%29 Blender] or [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/CINEMA_4D Cinema 4D]), although, thanks to its wide adaptability, FreeCAD might become useful in a much broader area than its current focus.
FreeCAD makes heavy use of all the great open-source libraries that exist out there in the field of [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Scientific_Computation Scientific Computing]. Among them are [http://OpenCascade.org OpenCascade], a powerful CAD kernel, [http://Coin3D.org Coin3D], an incarnation of [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Open_Inventor OpenInventor], [http://www.qtsoftware.com/ Qt], the world-famous UI framework, and [http://www.python.org Python], one of the best scripting languages available. FreeCAD itself can also be used as a library by other programs.
FreeCAD is also fully [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cross-platform multi-platform], and currently runs flawlessly on Windows and Linux/Unix and Mac OSX systems, with the exact same look and functionality on all platforms.

'''FreeCAD''' es una aplicación de modelado [http://es.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dise%C3%B1o_asistido_por_computadora '''CAD'''] 3D de propósito general. El desarrollo está completamente en [http://es.wikipedia.org/wiki/C%C3%B3digo_abierto Código abierto] (Licencia GPL & LGPL). FreeCAD está orientado a la [http://es.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ingenier%C3%ADa_mec%C3%A1nica ingeniería mecánica] y el [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Product_design diseño de producto] pero también se ajusta a un amplio rango de usos cercanos a la ingeniería, como la arquitectura así como a otras especialidades de la ingeniería.
Las herramientas de FreeCAD son similares a las de [http://es.wikipedia.org/wiki/CATIA Catia], [http://es.wikipedia.org/wiki/SolidWorks SolidWorks] o [http://es.wikipedia.org/wiki/Solid_Edge Solid Edge], por tanto también pertenece a la categoría de [http://es.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dise%C3%B1o_asistido_por_computadora '''MCAD'''], [http://es.wikipedia.org/wiki/Administraci%C3%B3n_del_ciclo_de_vida_de_productos '''PLM'''], [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/CAx '''CAx'''] y [http://es.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ingenier%C3%ADa_asistida_por_computadora '''CAE''']. Será un [http://es.wikipedia.org/wiki/Modelamiento_de_s%C3%B3lidos modelador paramétrico basado en operaciones] con una arquitectura de software modular, que hace sencillo proporcionar funcionalidades adicionales sin modificar el sistema principal.
Como muchos de los modeladores 3D de [http://es.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dise%C3%B1o_asistido_por_computadora CAD] tendrá un componente 2D para extraer detalles de diseño a partir del modelo 3D y crear planos 2D de producción, pero el trabajar directamente en planos en 2D (como [http://es.wikipedia.org/wiki/AutoCAD AutoCAD LT]) no es el objetivo, tampoco lo es la animación o el diseño de formas orgánicas (como [http://es.wikipedia.org/wiki/Autodesk_Maya Maya], [http://es.wikipedia.org/wiki/Autodesk_3ds_Max 3ds Max] o [http://es.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cinema_4D Cinema 4D]), aunque, gracias a su amplia adaptabilidad, FreeCAD podría llegar a ser útil en muchas otras áreas además de en la que está centrada actualmente.
Otra de las principales preocupaciones de FreeCAD es hacer un amplio empleo de todas las excelentes librerías de código abierto que existen en el campo de la [http://es.wikipedia.org/wiki/Computaci%C3%B3n_Cient%C3%ADfica Ciencia Computacional]. Entre ellos se encuentra [http://OpenCascade.org OpenCascade], un potente núcleo de CAD, [http:///www.Coin3D.org Coin3D], una reencarnación de [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Open_Inventor Open Inventor], [http://www.qtsoftware.com/ Qt], la mundialmente famosa biblioteca multiplataforma para desarrollar interfaces gráficas, y [http://www.python.org Python], uno de los mejores lenguajes de archivos de guión disponibles. FreeCAD también puede utilizarse como una librería por otros programas.
FreeCAD es también completamente [http://es.wikipedia.org/wiki/Multiplataforma multiplataforma], y actualmente se ejecuta de forma impecable en Windows, Linux/Unix y Mac OSX, con exactamente el mismo aspecto y funcionalidades en todas las plataformas.
Echa un vistazo a la [[Feature list/es| Lista de principales características]] o a los artículos the [[Getting started/es|Primeros pasos]], o diríjase directamente al [[User hub/es|Centro de usuarios]]! <noinclude>[[Category:Template/es]]</noinclude>

'''FreeCAD''' est une application de [http://fr.wikipedia.org/wiki/Conception_assist%C3%A9e_par_ordinateur '''CAO'''] 3D dont le développement est complètement [http://fr.wikipedia.org/wiki/Open_source Open Source] (licences [http://fr.wikipedia.org/wiki/Licence_publique_générale_GNU GPL] et [http://fr.wikipedia.org/wiki/Licence_publique_générale_limitée_GNU LGPL]). FreeCAD est orienté vers le [http://fr.wikipedia.org/wiki/Génie_mécanique génie mécanique] et le [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Product_design design de produits], mais vise également d'autres disciplines, telles que l'architecture ou d'autres champs d'activité du génie.
FreeCAD propose des fonctionnalités similaires à [http://fr.wikipedia.org/wiki/Catia Catia], [http://fr.wikipedia.org/wiki/Solidworks SolidWorks] ou [http://fr.wikipedia.org/wiki/Solid_Edge Solid Edge], et s'inscrit donc aussi dans les catégories [http://fr.wikipedia.org/wiki/Conception_et_fabrication_assistées_par_ordinateur '''CFAO''']/[http://fr.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ingénierie_assistée_par_ordinateur '''IAO''']/[http://fr.wikipedia.org/wiki/Product_Lifecycle_Management '''PLM''']. Il vise la [http://fr.wikipedia.org/wiki/Conception_paramétrique conception paramétrique], avec une architecture modulaire qui permet l'ajout facile de fonctionnalités supplémentaires sans modifier le cœur du programme.
Comme plusieurs logiciels de [http://fr.wikipedia.org/wiki/Conception_assist%C3%A9e_par_ordinateur CAO] modernes, il offrira une composante 2D pour extraire des vues de dessin du modèle 3D et produire des mises en plan. Mais le dessin 2D direct (comme [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/AutoCAD#AutoCAD_LT AutoCAD LT]) n'est pas l'objectif visé, pas plus que l'animation ou les formes organiques (comme [http://fr.wikipedia.org/wiki/Maya_(logiciel) Maya], [http://fr.wikipedia.org/wiki/3ds_Max 3ds Max] ou [http://fr.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cinema_4D Cinema 4D]), bien que grâce à sa grande adaptabilité, FreeCAD pourrait voir son utilité étendue à des champs d'activité qui ne font pas partie de son orientation actuelle.
Un autre objectif majeur de FreeCAD est l'usage intensif des importantes bibliothèques open source qui existent dans le domaine du [http://fr.wikipedia.org/wiki/Calcul_num%C3%A9rique calcul numérique], notamment : [http://fr.wikipedia.org/wiki/Open_CASCADE OpenCasCade], un puissant noyau géométrique, [http:///en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Coin3D Coin 3D], une implémentation de [http://fr.wikipedia.org/wiki/Inventor_%28biblioth%C3%A8que_logicielle%29 Open Inventor], [http://fr.wikipedia.org/wiki/Qt Qt], le réputé framework pour la programmation d'interfaces graphiques, ainsi que [http://fr.wikipedia.org/wiki/Python_%28langage%29 Python], un des meilleurs langages de script actuels. FreeCAD peut être lui-même utilisé comme bibliothèque par d'autres programmes.
FreeCAD est aussi [http://fr.wikipedia.org/wiki/Multiplate-forme multiplateforme], et fonctionne présentement parfaitement sous Windows, Linux/Unix et Mac OSX, avec la même apparence et les mêmes fonctionnalités sous toutes les plateformes.
Ça vous intrigue ? Jetez un coup d'œil aux [[Feature list/fr|fonctionnalités]] ou à l'article de [[Getting started/fr|mise en route]], ou encore allez directement au [[User hub/fr|User hub]] ! <noinclude>[[Category:Template/fr]]</noinclude>

FreeCAD adalah aplikasi [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/CAD '''CAD'''] 3D model untuk berbagai keperluan. Dalam pengembanganya FreeCAD adalah aplikasi yang sepenuhnya [http://id.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sumber_terbuka '''Open Source'''] (dibawah lisensi GPL & LGPL). FreeCAD ditujukan untuk [http://id.wikipedia.org/wiki/Teknik_mesin '''Teknik Mesin'''] dan [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Product_design '''Desain Produk'''] tapi juga untuk berbagai keperluan seperti arsitektur dan bidang keteknikan yang lain.
Fitur FreeCAD serupa dengan [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Catia '''Catia'''], [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Solidworks '''SolidWorks'''], atau [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Solid_Edge '''SolidEdge'''], dan oleh karena itu FreeCAD masuk dalam kategori [http://id.wikipedia.org/wiki/CAD '''MCAD'''], [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Product_Lifecycle_Management '''PLM'''], [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/CAx '''CAx'''], dan [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Computer-aided_engineering '''CAE''']. FreeCAD dibekali fitur [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Parametric_feature_based_modeler '''pemodelan berbasis parametrik'''] dengan sistem modul sehingga memudahkan dalam penambahan fitur - fitur tanpa modifikasi sistem intinya.
Seperti kebanyakan aplikasi pemodelan CAD 3D memiliki banyak komponen 2D untuk pembentukan model 3D atau konversi gambar kerja 2D dari model 3D, tapi aplikasi desain 2D (seperti [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/AutoCAD#AutoCAD_LT '''AutoCAD LT'''] dan animasi atau bentuk organik (seperti [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Maya_(software) '''Maya'''], [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/3ds_Max '''3DS Max'''], [http://en.wikpedia.org/Blender '''Blender'''] atau [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/CINEMA_4D '''Cinema 4D)'''] bukan merupakan fokus dari FreeCAD, meskipun begitu dengan adaptasi yang luas, FreeCAD bisa berkembang ke area yang lebih luas.
Perhatian utama FreeCAD yang lain adalah menggunakan dengan sungguh - sungguh semua library - library open source yang handal yang ada di dunia [http://id.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ilmu_komputasi '''Komputasi'''], diantaranya [http://opencascade.org/ '''OpenCascade'''], kernel CAD yang sangat handal, [http://coin3d.org/ '''Coin3D'''], penjelmaan dari [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Open_Inventor '''OpenInventor'''], [http://www.qtsoftware.com/ '''Qt'''], UI framework yang sangat terkenal, dan [http://www.python.org/ '''Python'''], salah satu bahasa pemrograman yang handal. FreeCAD sendiri juga bisa digunakan sebagai library oleh program lain.
FreeCAD juga mendukung [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cross-platform '''multi-platform'''], dapat pergunakan pada sistem Windows, Linux/Unix dan Mac OSX.Dengan tampilan dan fungsi yang sama di semua sistem.
Untuk informasi yang lain, lihat pada [http://www.freecadweb.org/wiki/index.php?title=Feature_list '''daftar fitur'''], [http://www.freecadweb.org/wiki/index.php?title=Latest_release_notes '''catatan rilis terbaru'''] atau [http://www.freecadweb.org/wiki/index.php?title=Getting_started '''artikel Getting Started'''] atau langsung kepada [http://www.freecadweb.org/wiki/index.php?title=User_hub '''pengguna'''].
[[Category:User Documentation/id]]

'''FreeCAD''' è un software [http://it.wikipedia.org/wiki/CAD '''CAD'''] di modellazione parametrica 3D. Lo sviluppo ed il codice sorgente vengono portati aventi tramite la filosofia [http://it.wikipedia.org/wiki/Open_source Open Source] (Licenza LGPL). FreeCAD è studiato per l'[http://it.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ingegneria_meccanica ingegneria meccanica] e per il [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Product_design product design] (progettazione del prodotto) ma è sfruttabile per un'ampia gamma di applicazioni, che vanno dall'architettura ad altre discipline ingegneristiche.
L'utilizzo e le funzioni di FreeCAD sono simili a quelle di [http://it.wikipedia.org/wiki/Catia Catia], [http://it.wikipedia.org/wiki/Solidworks SolidWorks] o [http://it.wikipedia.org/wiki/Solid_Edge Solid Edge], e rientra anche nella categoria di [http://it.wikipedia.org/wiki/CAD '''MCAD'''], [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Product_Lifecycle_Management '''PLM'''], [http://it.wikipedia.org/wiki/CAx '''CAx'''] e [http://it.wikipedia.org/wiki/Computer-aided_engineering '''CAE''']. È un [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Parametric_feature_based_modeler Modellatore parametrico di solidi] con una architettura modulare che permette l'aggiunta e lo sviluppo di nuove funzioni con estrema facilità, senza modificare il "cuore" del software.
Come ogni moderno strumento di modellazione 3D [http://it.wikipedia.org/wiki/CAD CAD] è provvisto di uno strumento di visualizzazione in 2D a partire dal modello spaziale, ma il disegno in 2D di tipo [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/AutoCAD#AutoCAD_LT AutoCAD LT] non è lo scopo del software, e non rientrano negli interessi principali neanche le animazioni come [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Maya_(software) Maya], [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/3ds_Max 3ds Max], [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Blender_%28software%29 Blender] o [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/CINEMA_4D Cinema 4D], anche se, grazie alla sua estrema flessibilità, FreeCAD può essere molto utile in numerosi altri campi che non fanno parte dei suoi interessi attuali.
FreeCAD fa abbondante uso delle eccellenti librerie open-source disponibili nel campo della [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Scientific_Computation computazione scientifica]. Tra questi [http://OpenCascade.org OpenCascade], un potente kernel CAD, [http:///www.Coin3D.org Coin3D], che incarna gli intenti di [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Open_Inventor Open Inventor], [http://www.qtsoftware.com/ Qt], il framework per lo sviluppo di Interfacce Utente, e [http://www.python.org Python], uno dei migliori linguaggi di script attualmente disponibili. FreeCAD può anche essere utilizzato come libreria per altri software.
Inoltre, FreeCAD è totalmente [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cross-platform multi-piattaforma], ed allo stato attuale è in grado di funzionare senza problemi su Windows, Linux/Unix e Mac OSX, conservando inalterate le caratteristiche e le funzionalità su ognuna di queste piattaforme.
Ti sei incuriosito? Dai un'occhiata alle [[Feature list/it | caratteristiche]], muovi i [[Getting started/it | primi passi]], oppure accedi direttamente al [[User hub/it| Centro utente]]! <noinclude>[[Category:Administration/it]][[Category:Template/it]]</noinclude>

'''FreeCAD''' は汎用の3D[http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/CAD '''CAD''' ]モデラーです。完全な[http://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E3%82%AA%E3%83%BC%E3%83%97%E3%83%B3%E3%82%BD%E3%83%BC%E3%82%B9 オープンソース]（GPL＆LGPLライセンス）で開発されています。FreeCADは[http://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E6%A9%9F%E6%A2%B0%E5%B7%A5%E5%AD%A6 機械工学]と[http://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E3%83%97%E3%83%AD%E3%83%80%E3%82%AF%E3%83%88%E3%83%87%E3%82%B6%E3%82%A4%E3%83%B3 製品設計]向けですが、それだけではなく建築やその他の専門工学などの幅広い用途にも適しています。
FreeCADは[http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Catia CATIA]や[http://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/SolidWorks SolidWorks]，[http://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/Solid_Edge Solid Edge]と類似のツールを備えているため、同様に[http://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/CAD '''MCAD''' ]や[http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Product_Lifecycle_Management '''PLM''' ]、[http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/CAx '''CAx''' ]や[http://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/CAE '''CAE''' ]のカテゴリーに属します。 FreeCADは[http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Parametric_feature_based_modeler フィーチャーベースのパラメトリックモデラー]であり、システムのコアを改変することなく機能追加が簡単に行えるモジュラーソフトウェアアーキテクチャーを採用しています。
多くの現代的な3D[http://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/CAD CAD]モデラーと同様に、FreeCADも3Dモデルから詳細設計を抽出して2Dの製品図面を作成する2Dコンポーネントを備えています。ただし[http://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/AutoCAD AutoCAD LT]のようなダイレクトな2Dの作図をFreeCADは対象としません。これはアニメーションや有機的な形状([http://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/Maya Maya]や[http://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/3ds_Max 3ds Max]、[http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/CINEMA_4D Cinema 4D]のような）についても同様です。しかしながら、その広い適用能力のおかげでFreeCADは今よりもさらに多くの分野で使用できるようになることでしょう。
FreeCADのもうひとつの主要な関心事は[http://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E8%A8%88%E7%AE%97%E7%A7%91%E5%AD%A6 科学計算]分野で現存する全ての偉大なオープンソースライブラリをたっぷりと使用することです。その中には強力なCADカーネルである[http://OpenCascade.org OpenCascade]、[http://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/Open_Inventor OpenInventor]実装の一つである[http://Coin3D.org Coin3D]、世界的に有名なUIフレームワークである[http://www.qtsoftware.com/ Qt]、そして現存する最高のスクリプト言語の一つである[http://www.python.org Python]が含まれます。またFreeCAD自身もライブラリとして他のプログラムから使用できます。
また、FreeCADは完全な[http://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E3%82%AF%E3%83%AD%E3%82%B9%E3%83%97%E3%83%A9%E3%83%83%E3%83%88%E3%83%95%E3%82%A9%E3%83%BC%E3%83%A0 クロスプラットフォーム]です。現在、Windows、Linux/Unix、Mac OSXシステムの全てのプラットフォーム上で完全に同じ様に動作します。
FreeCADの機能についてもっと知りたければ[[Feature list/jp|機能のリスト]]、[[Getting_started/jp|最新のリリースノート]]、[[Getting started/jp|スタートガイド]]を見てください。すぐに[[User hub/jp|ユーザーハブ]]を見に行くのもいいでしょう！ <noinclude>[[Category:Template/jp]]</noinclude>

FreeCAD jest programem [http://pl.wikipedia.org/wiki/Komputerowe_wspomaganie_projektowania CAD] 3D ogólnego przeznaczenia. Rozwój odbywa się całkowicie wg zasad [http://pl.wikipedia.org/wiki/Open_source Open Source](licencje GPL i LGPL). FreeCAD jest nastawiony na [http://pl.wikipedia.org/wiki/In%C5%BCynieria_mechaniczna inżynierię mechaniczną] i [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Product_design projektowanie produktu] także wpisuje się w szeroki zakres zastosowań inżynierii, jak architektura czy inne dziedziny.
Narzędzia FreeCADa są analogiczne do tych z programów [http://pl.wikipedia.org/wiki/CATIA Catia], [http://pl.wikipedia.org/wiki/SolidWorks SolidWorks] czy [http://pl.wikipedia.org/wiki/Solid_Edge Solid Edge], ponieważ FreeCAD podlega pod kategorie [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/CAD MCAD], [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Product_Lifecycle_Management PLM], [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/CAx CAx] i [http://www.google.com/url?q=http://pl.wikipedia.org/wiki/Computer_Aided_Engineering CAE]. Ma być [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Parametric_feature_based_modeler modelerem opartym na cechach parametrycznych] z modularną architekturą oprogramowania, która pozwala na łatwe rozszerzanie funkcjonalności, bez modyfikowania rdzenia systemu.
Tak jak wiele nowoczesnych modelerów [http://pl.wikipedia.org/wiki/Komputerowe_wspomaganie_projektowania CAD] 3D, będzie posiadał moduł 2D pozwalający tworzyć dokumentację z rzutów modeli 3D. Aktualnie nie skupiano się nad bezpośrednim rysowaniem 2D (jak w [http://pl.wikipedia.org/wiki/AutoCAD|AutoCADzie LT]) jak i animacjami czy kształtami organicznymi (jak w [http://pl.wikipedia.org/wiki/Maya_(program_komputerowy) Maya], [http://pl.wikipedia.org/wiki/3ds_max|3ds Max] czy [http://pl.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cinema_4D|Cinema 4D]), choć, dzięki dużej zdolności przystosowania, FreeCAD może stać się przydatny w znacznie szerszym obszarze zastosowań.
Inny główny punkt uwagi to stworzenie potężnego użytku z e wszystkich wspaniałych bibliotek open source, które egzystują w obszarze [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Scientific_Computation prac naukowych z wykorzystaniem komputerów]. Wśród nich można znaleźć [http://opencascade.org/ OpenCascade]- potężny rdzeń CAD, [http://coin3d.org/ Coin3D] - wcielenie [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Open_Inventor OpenInvenventora], [http://www.qtsoftware.com/ Qt]- znany framework interfejsu użytkownika i [http://www.python.org/ Pythona]- jednego z najlepszych dostępnych języków skryptowych. Również FreeCAD może być użyty jako biblioteka dla innych programów.
FreeCAD jest także całkowicie [http://pl.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wieloplatformowo%C5%9B%C4%87 wieloplatformowy] i aktualnie działa bezproblemowo pod systemami: Windows, Linux/Unix oraz Mac OS X, jednocześnie zachowując ten sam wygląd i funkcjonalność na wszystkich platformach.
Zaciekawiony? Spójrz na [[Feature list/pl|Listę cech]], [[Getting started/pl|Szybki start]] lub bezpośrednio do [[User hub/pl|Centrum użytkowników]]! <noinclude>[[Category:Template/pl]]</noinclude>

'''FreeCAD''' is a general purpose parametric 3D [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/CAD '''CAD'''] modeler. The development is completely [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Open_source Open Source] (LGPL License). FreeCAD is aimed directly at [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mechanical_engineering mechanical engineering] and [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Product_design product design] but also fits in a wider range of uses around engineering, such as architecture or other engineering specialties.
FreeCAD features tools similar to [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Catia Catia], [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Solidworks SolidWorks] or [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Solid_Edge Solid Edge], and therefore also falls into the category of [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/CAD '''MCAD'''], [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Product_Lifecycle_Management '''PLM'''], [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/CAx '''CAx'''] and [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Computer-aided_engineering '''CAE''']. It is a [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Parametric_feature_based_modeler feature based parametric modeler] with a modular software architecture which makes it easy to provide additional functionality without modifying the core system.
As with many modern 3D [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/CAD CAD] modelers it has many 2D components in order to sketch 2D shapes or extract design detail from the 3D model to create 2D production drawings, but direct 2D drawing (like [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/AutoCAD#AutoCAD_LT AutoCAD LT]) is not the focus, neither are animation or organic shapes (like [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Maya_(software) Maya], [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/3ds_Max 3ds Max], [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Blender_%28software%29 Blender] or [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/CINEMA_4D Cinema 4D]), although, thanks to its wide adaptability, FreeCAD might become useful in a much broader area than its current focus.
FreeCAD makes heavy use of all the great open-source libraries that exist out there in the field of [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Scientific_Computation Scientific Computing]. Among them are [http://OpenCascade.org OpenCascade], a powerful CAD kernel, [http://www.Coin3D.org Coin3D], an incarnation of [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Open_Inventor Open Inventor], [http://www.qtsoftware.com/ Qt], the world-famous UI framework, and [http://www.python.org Python], one of the best scripting languages available. FreeCAD itself can also be used as a library by other programs. <noinclude>[[Category:Template/pt-br]]</noinclude>
FreeCAD is also fully [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cross-platform multi-platform], and currently runs flawlessly on Windows and Linux/Unix and Mac OSX systems, with the exact same look and functionality on all platforms.
For more about FreeCAD's capabilities, take a look at the [[Feature list/pt-br|Feature list]], the [[Getting_started/pt-br#What's new| latest release notes]] or the [[Getting started/pt-br|Getting started]] articles, or head directly to the [[User hub/pt-br|User hub]]!

'''FreeCAD''' este un modelator [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/CAD '''CAD'''] 3D de uz general. Dezvoltarea e guvernata de conceptul [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Open_source Open Source] (sursa deschisa, licenta GPL si LGPL). FreeCAD se adreseaza direct [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mechanical_engineering ingineriei mecanice] si [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Product_design designului produselor] dar poate fi folosit intr-o gama mare de domenii ingineresti precum arhitectura.
FreeCAD contine unelte similare cu [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Catia Catia], [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Solidworks SolidWorks] sau [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Solid_Edge Solid Edge], ca urmare cade in categoriile [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/CAD '''MCAD'''], [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Product_Lifecycle_Management '''PLM'''], [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/CAx '''CAx'''] si [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Computer-aided_engineering '''CAE''']. Va deveni un [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Parametric_feature_based_modeler modelator parametric bazat pe caracteristici] cu arhitectura modulara ce permite implementarea de functionalitati noi fara a fi nevoie de modificarea intregului sistem.
Precum multe programe de modelare [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/CAD CAD] 3D, FreeCAD contine numeroase componente 2D pentru schitarea formelor 2D sau pentru extragerea detaliilor de design din modele 3D, in vederea realizarii de planuri pentru productie. Desenul direct in 2D (vezi [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/AutoCAD#AutoCAD_LT AutoCAD LT]) nu este principalul obiectiv, nici animatiile sau formele organice (vezi [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Maya_(software) Maya], [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/3ds_Max 3ds Max], [http://en.wikpedia.org/Blender Blender] sau [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/CINEMA_4D Cinema 4D]) desi, data fiind adaptabilitatea sa, FreeCAD poate deveni folositor in aceste arii si multe altele.
O alta preocupare pentru FreeCAD este folosirea tuturor librariilor cu sursa deschisa ce exista in [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Scientific_Computation domeniul calculului stintific]. Astfel de exemple sunt [http://OpenCascade.org OpenCascade], un nucleu (kernel) CAD puternic, [http://Coin3D.org Coin3D], o incarnare a [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Open_Inventor OpenInventor], [http://www.qtsoftware.com/ Qt], faimoasa librarie pentru interfete grafice si [http://www.python.org Python], unul dintre cele mai bune limbaje de scripting din cate exista. FreeCAD poate fi folosit el insusi ca si librarie pentru alte aplicatii.
FreeCAD este un program [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cross-platform multi-platforma], ruland fara probleme in Windows, Linux/Unix si Mac OSX cu aceeasi interfata si functionalitate pe toate platformele.
Pentru mai multe informatii despre capabilitatile programului cititi articolele despre [[Feature list/ro|lista caracteristicilor]], [[Getting_started/ro#What's new/ro|notele pentru ultima versiune]] sau [[Getting started/ro|primi pasi]], ori vizitati [[User hub/ro|centrul pentru utilizatori]]! <noinclude>[[Category:Template/ro]]</noinclude>

FreeCAD это трёхмерная твердотельная [http://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/Система_автоматизированного_проектирования САПР]. Это проект с открытым исходным кодом([http://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/GNU_General_Public_License GPL] и [http://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/LGPL LGPL] лицензии). FreeCAD в первую очередь предназначен для машиностроения, но его также можно применять и в более широком круге задач, например, таких как архитектурное моделирование.
Проектирование в FreeCAD подобно [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Catia Catia], [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Solidworks SolidWorks] или [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Solid_Edge Solid Edge], поэтому его можно октнести к [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/CAD '''MCAD'''], [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Product_Lifecycle_Management '''PLM'''], [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/CAx '''CAx'''] и [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Computer-aided_engineering '''CAE''']. FreeCAD разрабатывается для параметрического твердотельного моделирования и имеет модульную структуру, благодаря чему легко добавлять необходимую функциональность без изменения ядра программы.
Как и в большинстве современных САПР трёхмерного моделирования, здесь присутствует компонент для создания двумерных чертежей из трёхмерной модели. Но непосредственно двумерное черчение(как в [http://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/Компас_(САПР) КОМПАС] или AutoCAD LT) - не главная цель, так же как и анимация (подобно [http://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/Maya Maya], [http://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/3ds_Max 3ds Max] или [http://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/Blender Blender]). Хотя, благодаря высокой гибкости, FreeCAD может быть полезным в более широком круге задач, чем цель сегодняшней разработки.
Другая важная составляющая FreeCAD - использование всей мощи лучших свободных библиотек в каждой области программирования. Среди них - [http://OpenCascade.org OpenCascade], мощное САПР ядро, [http://Coin3D.org Coin3D], потомок [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Open_Inventor OpenInventor], [http://www.qtsoftware.com/ Qt], всемирно известная библиотека построения пользовательского интерфейса, и [http://www.python.org Python], один из лучших интерпретируемых языков. FreeCAD также может быть использован как библиотека для других программ.
FreeCAD [http://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/Кроссплатформенное_программное_обеспечение кроссплатформенное ПО], и в настоящее время полноценно работает в таких системах как Windows, Linux/Unix и Mac OS X, имея соответствующий вид и одинаковую функциональность на каждой платформе.
Заинтересовались? Тогда взгляните на статьи [[Feature list/ru|Список возможностей]], [[Getting started/ru|Начало работы]] или обратитесь напрямую в [[User hub/ru|Центр пользователя]]. <noinclude>[[Category:Template/ru]]</noinclude>

'''FreeCAD''' genel amaçlı 3D [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/CAD '''CAD'''] modelleme programıdır. Tamamıyla [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Open_source Açık Kaynak] (GPL & LGPL Lisansı) altında geliştirilmektedir . FreeCAD, [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mechanical_engineering makina mühendisliği] ve [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Product_design ürün tasarımı] alanlarını hedeflemektedir fakat mühendislik çerçevesi içerisinde mimari ve diğer mühendislik alanlarıyla birlikte daha geniş bir kullanıma uygundur.
FreeCAD [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Catia Catia], [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Solidworks SolidWorks] veya [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Solid_Edge Solid Edge] ile benzer özelliklere sahiptir, ve bu nedenle [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/CAD '''MCAD'''], [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Product_Lifecycle_Management '''PLM'''], [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/CAx '''CAx'''] ve [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Computer-aided_engineering '''CAE'''] kategorileri içerisindedir. [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Parametric_feature_based_modeler Parametrik temelli modelleyici özellik] ile çekirdek sistemi değiştirmeksizin ek işlevselliği basit bir şekilde sağlayan modüler yazılım mimarisine sahiptir.
Birçok modern 3D [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/CAD CAD] modelleyicileri sırayla 2D şekillerin taslağını veya 3D modelden 2D üretim çizimlerini çıkarmak için pek çok 2D bileşenlere sahiptir. Ama doğrudan 2D çizim odaklı ([http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/AutoCAD#AutoCAD_LT AutoCAD LT] gibi) değildir, ne animasyon ne de organik şekillerin hiçbirine odaklanmamıştır([http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Maya_(software) Maya], [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/3ds_Max 3ds Max] veya [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/CINEMA_4D Cinema 4D] gibi). Buna rağmen geniş adaptasyon yeteneği sayesinde, FreeCAD odaklanmak yerine daha geniş bir alanda yararlı hale gelebilir.
FreeCAD'in önemli bir diğer konusuda [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Scientific_Computation Bilimsel Hesaplama] alanında ağrlıklı olarak bütün açık-kaynak kütüphanelerini kullanmasıdır. Bunların arasında [http://OpenCascade.org OpenCascade] güçlü bir CAD çekirdeği, [http://Coin3D.org Coin3D], [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Open_Inventor OpenInventor] cisimleştiricisi, [http://www.qtsoftware.com/ Qt] dünyaca ünlü UI framework ve [http://www.python.org Python] mevcut en iyi betik dillerinden biri. FreeCAD'in kendisi de diğer programlar tarafında bir kütüphane olarak kullanılabilir.
FreeCAD [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cross-platform çoklu-platform] tam desteklemekte ve şu anda Windows, Linux/Unix ve Mac OSX sistemlerinde kusursuz çalışmaktadır. Aynı görünüm ve işlevselliği ile tüm platformlarda sağlamaktadır.
Meraklısına! [[Feature list]], the [[Getting_started#What's new|latest release notes]] veya [[Getting started]] başlıklarına bir göz atın! <noinclude>[[Category:Template/tr]]</noinclude>

'''FreeCAD'''的功能目的是成为一个3D [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/CAD '''CAD'''] 建模工具。她的开发完全遵循 [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Open_source Open Source] (GPL & LGPL License)协议。 FreeCAD的目标直指 [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mechanical_engineering 机械工程] 、 [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Product_design 产品设计] ，当然也适合工程行业内的其他广大用户，比如建筑或者其他特殊工程行业。
FreeCAD的功能特征类似[http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Catia Catia], [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Solidworks SolidWorks] 或 [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Solid_Edge Solid Edge], 因此也可以使用关键词 [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/CAD '''MCAD'''], [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Product_Lifecycle_Management '''PLM'''], [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/CAx '''CAx'''] 以及 [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Computer-aided_engineering '''CAE''']. 她是一个 [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Parametric_feature_based_modeler 功能化的参数化建模工具] ，是一个模块化的CAD核心环境，你可以在不修改核心程序的基础上为其开发插件、功能模块。
和其他3D [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/CAD CAD]建模工具一样，她也将拥有一个2D组件来将3D模型的准确设计信息转化为2D的产品图纸，二维静态图纸(比如: [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/AutoCAD#AutoCAD_LT AutoCAD LT]) 并不准确、动态或者有零件关系等概念（译者:仅仅是一些线条而已)(比如: [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Maya_(software) Maya], [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/3ds_Max 3ds Max] 或 [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/CINEMA_4D Cinema 4D]), 因此，得益于FreeCAD可以被广泛地改写（添加功能模块）, 她将比目前更加有用。
FreeCAD另外一个值得注意关注的是深度应用所有强大的已有开源库，例如[http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Scientific_Computation 计算机科学]. 其中包含 [http://OpenCascade.org OpenCascade], 强大的CAD内核, [http://Coin3D.org Coin3D](是 [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Open_Inventor OpenInventor]的进化版本), [http://www.qtsoftware.com/ Qt],著名的UI库,[http://www.python.org Python], 是目前最好的脚本语言。当然FreeCAD自身也可以被其他项目作为库来使用。
FreeCAD是一个真正的[http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cross-platform 多平台程序], 目前可在Windows、Linux/Unix以及Mac OSX系统上完美运行，并在所有平台上拥有一样的外观和功能。
有兴趣？看看 [[Feature list/zh|特色]] 或者 [[Getting started/zh|开始]] 文档,或者直接到[[User hub/zh|用户中心]]! <noinclude>[[Category:Template/zh]]</noinclude>

===Construction tools===
These are tools for creating architectural objects.
* [[Image:Arch_Wall.png|32px]] [[Arch_Wall|Wall]]: Creates a wall from scratch or using a selected object as a base * [[Image:Arch_Structure.png|32px]] [[Arch_Structure|Structural element]]: Creates a structural element from scratch or using a selected object as a base * [[Image:Arch_Rebar.png|32px]] [[Arch_Rebar|Rebar]]: Creates a reinforcement bar in a selected structural element * [[Image:Arch_Floor.png|32px]] [[Arch_Floor|Floor]]: Creates a floor including selected objects * [[Image:Arch_Building.png|32px]] [[Arch_Building|Building]]: Creates a building including selected objects * [[Image:Arch_Site.png|32px]] [[Arch_Site|Site]]: Creates a site including selected objects * [[Image:Arch_Window.png|32px]] [[Arch_Window|Window]]: Creates a window using a selected object as a base * [[Image:Arch_SectionPlane.png|32px]] [[Arch_SectionPlane|Section Plane]]: Adds a section plane object to the document * [[Image:Arch_Axis.png|32px]] [[Arch_Axis|Axes system]]: Adds an axes system to the document * [[Image:Arch_Roof.png|32px]] [[Arch_Roof|Roof]]: Creates a sloped roof from a selected face * [[Image:Arch_Space.png|32px]] [[Arch_Space|Space]]: Creates a space object in the document * [[Image:Arch_Stairs.png|32px]] [[Arch_Stairs|Stairs]]: Creates a stairs object in the document * [[Image:Arch_Panel.png|32px]] [[Arch_Panel|Panel]]: Creates a panel object from a selected 2D object * [[Image:Arch_Frame.png|32px]] [[Arch_Frame|Frame]]: Creates a frame object from a selected layout
===Modification tools===
These are tools for modifying architectural objects.
* [[Image:Arch_Add.png|32px]] [[Arch_Add|Add]]: Adds objects to a component * [[Image:Arch_Remove.png|32px]] [[Arch_Remove|Remove]]: Subtracts or removes objects from a component * [[Image:Arch_Survey.png|32px]] [[Arch_Survey|Survey]]: Enters or leaves surveying mode * [[Image:Arch_CutPlane.png|32px]] [[Arch_CutPlane|Cut Plane]]: Cut an object according to a plan.
===Utilities===
These are additional tools to help you in specific tasks.
* [[Image:Arch_SplitMesh.png|32px]] [[Arch_SplitMesh|Split Mesh]]: Splits a selected mesh into separate components * [[Image:Arch_MeshToShape.png|32px]] [[Arch_MeshToShape|Mesh To Shape]]: Converts a mesh into a shape, unifying coplanar faces * [[Image:Arch_RemoveShape.png|32px]] [[Arch_RemoveShape|Remove Shape]]: Turns cubic shape-based arch object fully parametric * [[Image:Arch_SelectNonSolidMeshes.png|32px]] [[Arch_SelectNonSolidMeshes|Select non-solid meshes]]: Selects all non-solid meshes from the current selection or frm the document * [[Image:Arch_CloseHoles.png|32px]] [[Arch_CloseHoles|CloseHoles]]: Closes holes in a selected shape-based object * [[Image:Arch_Check.png|32px]] [[Arch_Check|Check]]: Check if the selected objects are solids and don't contain defects * [[Image:Arch_IfcExplorer.png|32px]] [[Arch_IfcExplorer|Ifc Explorer]]: Browse the contents of an [[Arch_IFC|IFC]] file
<noinclude>[[Category:Administration]] [[Category:Template]]</noinclude>

===Nástroje pro konstrukci===
Tyto nástroje slouží pro vytváření architektonických objektů.
* [[Image:Arch_Wall.png|32px]] [[Arch_Wall/cs|Zeď]]: Vytváří zeď buď od počátku nebo použitím vybraného objektu jako základu * [[Image:Arch_Structure.png|32px]] [[Arch_Structure/cs|Strukturální prvek]]: Vytváří strukturální prvek buď od počátku nebo použitím vybraného objektu jako základu * [[Image:Arch_Rebar.png|32px]] [[Arch_Rebar/cs|Překlad]]: Vytváří železobetonový překlad ve vybraném strukturálním prvku * [[Image:Arch_Floor.png|32px]] [[Arch_Floor/cs|Podlaží]]: Vytváří podlaží zahrnutím vybraných objektů * [[Image:Arch_Building.png|32px]] [[Arch_Building/cs|Budova]]: Vytváří budovu zahrnutím vybraných objektů * [[Image:Arch_Site.png|32px]] [[Arch_Site/cs|Staveniště]]: Vytváří staveniště zahrnutím vybraných objektů * [[Image:Arch_Window.png|32px]] [[Arch_Window/cs|Okno]]: Vytváří okno použitím vybraného objektu jako základu * [[Image:Arch_SectionPlane.png|32px]] [[Arch_SectionPlane/cs|Řez]]: Přidává do dokumentu řez objektem * [[Image:Arch_Axis.png|32px]] [[Arch_Axis/cs|Osový systém]]: Přidává do dokumentu osový systém * [[Image:Arch_Roof.png|32px]] [[Arch_Roof/cs|Střecha]]: Vytváří šikmou střechu z vybrané plochy * [[Image:Arch_Space.png|32px]] [[Arch_Space/cs|Prostor]]: Vytváří v dokumentu objekt prostoru * [[Image:Arch_Stairs.png|32px]] [[Arch_Stairs/cs|Schodiště]]: Vytváří v dokumentu objekt schodiště * [[Image:Arch_Frame.png|32px]] [[Arch_Frame/cs|Frame]]: Creates a frame object from a selected layout
===Modification tools===
These are tools for modifying architectural objects.
* [[Image:Arch_Add.png|32px]] [[Arch_Add/cs|Add]]: Adds objects to a component * [[Image:Arch_Remove.png|32px]] [[Arch_Remove/cs|Remove]]: Subtracts or removes objects from a component * [[Image:Arch_Survey.png|32px]] [[Arch_Survey/cs|Survey]]: Enters or leaves surveying mode
===Utilities===
These are additional tools to help you in specific tasks.
* [[Image:Arch_SplitMesh.png|32px]] [[Arch_SplitMesh/cs|Split Mesh]]: Splits a selected mesh into separate components * [[Image:Arch_MeshToShape.png|32px]] [[Arch_MeshToShape/cs|Mesh To Shape]]: Converts a mesh into a shape, unifying coplanar faces * [[Image:Arch_RemoveShape.png|32px]] [[Arch_RemoveShape/cs|Remove Shape]]: Turns cubic shape-based arch object fully parametric * [[Image:Arch_SelectNonSolidMeshes.png|32px]] [[Arch_SelectNonSolidMeshes/cs|Select non-solid meshes]]: Selects all non-solid meshes from the current selection or frm the document * [[Image:Arch_CloseHoles.png|32px]] [[Arch_CloseHoles/cs|CloseHoles]]: Closes holes in a selected shape-based object * [[Image:Arch_Check.png|32px]] [[Arch_Check/cs|Check]]: Check if the selected objects are solids and don't contain defects * [[Image:Arch_IfcExplorer.png|32px]] [[Arch_IfcExplorer/cs|Ifc Explorer]]: Browse the contents of an [[Arch_IFC/cs|IFC]] file <noinclude>[[Category:Template/cs]]</noinclude>

===Konstruktionswerkzeuge===
Hier der Werkzeugkasten zur Erzeugung von Architekturobjekten:
* [[Image:Arch_Wall.png|32px]] [[Arch_Wall/de|Wand]]: Erzeugt eine Wand auf dem ausgewählten Objekt * [[Image:Arch_Structure.png|32px]] [[Arch_Structure/de|Bauelement]]: Erzeugt ein Bauelement auf dem ausgewählten Objekt * [[Image:Arch_Rebar.png|32px]] [[Arch_Rebar/de|Rebar]]: Creates a reinforcement bar in a selected structural element * [[Image:Arch_Floor.png|32px]] [[Arch_Floor/de|Etage]]: Erzeugt eine Etage mit den ausgewählten Objekten * [[Image:Arch_Building.png|32px]] [[Arch_Building/de|Gebäude]]: Erzeugt ein Gebäude mit den ausgewählten Objekten * [[Image:Arch_Site.png|32px]] [[Arch_Site/de|Baugrund]]: Erzeugt einen Baugrund mit den ausgewählten Objekten * [[Image:Arch_Window.png|32px]] [[Arch_Window/de|Fenster]]: Erzeugt ein Fenster im ausgewählten Objekt * [[Image:Arch_SectionPlane.png|32px]] [[Arch_SectionPlane/de|Schnittebene]]: Fügt eine Schnittebene zum Dokument hinzu * [[Image:Arch_Axis.png|32px]] [[Arch_Axis/de|Achsen]]: Fügt ein Achsensystem zum Dokument hinzu * [[Image:Arch_Roof.png|32px]] [[Arch_Roof/de|Dach]]: Erzeugt eine Dachneigung auf Grundlage der selektierten Fläche * [[Image:Arch_Space.png|32px]] [[Arch_Space/de|Space]]: Creates a space object in the document * [[Image:Arch_Stairs.png|32px]] [[Arch_Stairs/de|Stairs]]: Creates a stairs object in the document * [[Image:Arch_Frame.png|32px]] [[Arch_Frame/de|Frame]]: Creates a frame object from a selected layout
===Änderungswerkzeuge===
Hier die Werkzeuge zur Änderung von Architekturobjekten:
* [[Image:Arch_Add.png|32px]] [[Arch_Add/de|Hinzufügen]]: Fügt ein Objekt zu einer Komponente hinzu * [[Image:Arch_Remove.png|32px]] [[Arch_Remove/de|Entfernen]]: Subtrahiert oder entfernt Objekte von einer Komponente * [[Image:Arch_Survey.png|32px]] [[Arch_Survey/de|Survey]]: Enters or leaves surveying mode
===Hilfsmittel===
Hier sind zusätzliche Hilfsmittel für spezifische Aufgaben:
* [[Image:Arch_SplitMesh.png|32px]] [[Arch_SplitMesh/de|Gitter teilen]]: Zerlegt das ausgewählte Gitter in separate Komponenten * [[Image:Arch_MeshToShape.png|32px]] [[Arch_MeshToShape/de|Gitter Zu Form]]: Konvertiert ein Gitter zu einer Form, vereinheitlicht koplanare Flächen * [[Image:Arch_RemoveShape.png|32px]] [[Arch_RemoveShape/de|Entferne Form]]: Parametrisiert würfelförmige Formteile vollständig * [[Image:Arch_SelectNonSolidMeshes.png|32px]] [[Arch_SelectNonSolidMeshes/de|Auswahl nicht-feste Gitter]]: Selektiert alle nicht-festen Gitter in der aktuellen Auswahl oder im gesamten Dokument * [[Image:Arch_CloseHoles.png|32px]] [[Arch_CloseHoles/de|Lochverschluss]]: Schließt Löcher in einem ausgewählten Form-basierten Objekt * [[Image:Arch_Check.png|32px]] [[Arch_Check/de|Check]]: Prüft ob ausgewählte Objekte Festkörper ohne Defekte sind * [[Image:Arch_IfcExplorer.png|32px]] [[Arch_IfcExplorer/de|Ifc Explorer]]: Browse the contents of an [[Arch_IFC|IFC]] file
<noinclude>[[Category:Administration/de]] [[Category:Template/de]]</noinclude>

===Herramientas de construcción===
Estas son herramientas para crear objetos arquitectónicos.
* [[Image:Arch_Wall.png|32px]] [[Arch_Wall|Muro]]: Crea un muro utilizando un objeto seleccionado como base * [[Image:Arch_Structure.png|32px]] [[Arch_Structure|Elemento estructural]]: Crea un elemento estructural utilizando un objeto seleccionado como base * [[Image:Arch_Floor.png|32px]] [[Arch_Floor|Piso]]: Crea un piso incluyendo los objetos seleccionados * [[Image:Arch_Building.png|32px]] [[Arch_Building|Construcción]]: Crea una construcción incluyendo los objetos seleccionados * [[Image:Arch_Site.png|32px]] [[Arch_Site|Situación]]: Crea una situación incluyendo los objetos seleccionados * [[Image:Arch_Window.png|32px]] [[Arch_Window/es|Ventana]]: Crea una ventana utilizando un objeto seleccionado como base * [[Image:Arch_SectionPlane.png|32px]] [[Arch_SectionPlane/es|Plano de sección]]: Añade un objeto plano de sección al documento * [[Image:Arch_Axis.png|32px]] [[Arch_Axis/es|Sistema de ejes]]: Añade un sistema de ejes al documento * [[Image:Arch_Roof.png|32px]] [[Arch_Roof/es|Techo]]: Crea un techo con pendiente a partir de la cara seleccionada
===Herramientas de modificación===
Estas son herramientas para modificar objetos de arquitectura.
* [[Image:Arch_Add.png|32px]] [[Arch_Add/es|Añadir]]: Añade objetos a un componente * [[Image:Arch_Remove.png|32px]] [[Arch_Remove/es|Eliminar]]: Resta o elimina objetos de un componente
===Utilidades===
Estas son herramientas adicionales para ayudarte en tareas específicas.
* [[Image:Arch_SplitMesh.png|32px]] [[Arch_SplitMesh/es|Dividir malla]]: Divide una malla seleccionada en componentes separados * [[Image:Arch_MeshToShape.png|32px]] [[Arch_MeshToShape/es|Malla a forma]]: Convierte una malla en una forma, unificando caras coplanares * [[Image:Arch_RemoveShape.png|32px]] [[Arch_RemoveShape/es|Eliminar forma]]: Convierte formas basadas en cubos a objetos de arquitectura completamente paramétricos * [[Image:Arch_SelectNonSolidMeshes.png|32px]] [[Arch_SelectNonSolidMeshes/es|Seleccionar mallado no-sólido]]: Selecciona todos los mallados no-sólidos de la selección actual o del documento * [[Image:Arch_CloseHoles.png|32px]] [[Arch_CloseHoles/es|Tapar agujeros]]: Cierra los agujeros en el objeto basado en formas seleccionado * [[Image:Arch_Check.png|32px]] [[Arch_Check/es|Comprobar]]: Comprueba si los objetos seleccionados son sólidos y no contienen defectos <noinclude>[[Category:Template/es]]</noinclude>

===Outils de Construction===
Ces outils permettent la création d'objets architecturaux.
* [[Image:Arch_Wall.png|32px]] [[Arch_Wall/fr|Mur]] : Crée un mur à partir de zéro ou à partir d'un objet sélectionné. * [[Image:Arch_Structure.png|32px]] [[Arch_Structure/fr|Élément structurel]] : Crée un élément structurel à partir de zéro ou à partir d'un objet sélectionné. * [[Image:Arch_Floor.png|32px]] [[Arch_Floor/fr|Étage]] : Crée un étage incluant les objets sélectionnés. * [[Image:Arch_Building.png|32px]] [[Arch_Building/fr|Bâtiment]] : Crée un bâtiment incluant les objets sélectionnés. * [[Image:Arch_Site.png|32px]] [[Arch_Site/fr|Site]] : Crée un site incluant les objets sélectionnés. * [[Image:Arch_Window.png|32px]] [[Arch_Window/fr|Fenêtre]] : Crée une fenêtre à partir d'un objet sélectionné. * [[Image:Arch_SectionPlane.png|32px]] [[Arch_SectionPlane/fr|Plan de coupe]] : Ajoute un plan de coupe au document. * [[Image:Arch_Axis.png|32px]] [[Arch_Axis/fr|Axes systèmes]]: Ajouter un système d'Axes dans le document. * [[Image:Arch_Roof.png|32px]] [[Arch_Roof/fr|Toiture]]: Crée un toit en pente à partir d'une face sélectionnée. * [[Image:Arch_Space.png|32px]] [[Arch_Space/fr|Espace]]: Crée un objet spatial dans le document. * [[Image:Arch_Stairs.png|32px]] [[Arch_Stairs/fr|Escaliers]]: Crée un objet escalier dans le document.
===Outils de transformation===
Ce sont des outils de modification d'objets architecturaux.
* [[Image:Arch_Add.png|32px]] [[Arch_Add/fr|Add]]: Ajouter un objet à un composant. * [[Image:Arch_Remove.png|32px]] [[Arch_Remove/fr|Remove]]: Soustraire ou effacer un ou des objets d'un composant. * [[Image:Arch_Survey.png|32px]] [[Arch_Survey/fr|Survey]]: Permet de prendre rapidement des mesures et des informations sur un modèle * [[Image:Arch_CutPlane.png|32px]] [[Arch_CutPlane/fr|Couper Plan]]: Couper un objet selon un plan définit par une face.
===Utilitaires===
Ce sont des outils supplémentaires, pour vous aider dans des tâches spécifiques.
* [[Image:Arch_SplitMesh.png|32px]] [[Arch_SplitMesh/fr|Split Mesh]]: Fractionne un maillage sélectionné en composant distinct. * [[Image:Arch_MeshToShape.png|32px]] [[Arch_MeshToShape/fr|Mesh To Shape]]: Fractionne un maillage sélectionné en composantes distinctes. * [[Image:Arch_RemoveShape.png|32px]] [[Arch_RemoveShape/fr|Remove Shape]]: Transforme un objet '''arch''' de forme cubique entièrement paramétrique. * [[Image:Arch_SelectNonSolidMeshes.png|32px]] [[Arch_SelectNonSolidMeshes/fr|Select non-solid meshes]]: Sélectionne tous les maillages non solides dans la sélection actuelle ou du document. * [[Image:Arch_CloseHoles.png|32px]] [[Arch_CloseHoles/fr|CloseHoles]]: Ferme des trous dans un objet sélectionné. * [[Image:Arch_Check.png|32px]] [[Arch_Check/fr|Check]]: Vérifie si les objets sélectionnés sont des solides, et, ne contiennent pas de défauts. <noinclude>[[Category:Template/fr]]</noinclude>

==== Strumenti di costruzione ====
Strumenti per creare gli oggetti architettonici.
* [[Image:Arch_Wall.png|32px]] [[Arch_Wall/it|Muro]]: Crea un muro tramite uno schizzo o utilizzando come base un oggetto selezionato * [[Image:Arch_Structure.png|32px]] [[Arch_Structure/it|Elemento strutturale]]: Crea un elemento strutturale tramite uno schizzo o utilizzando come base un oggetto selezionato * [[Image:Arch_Rebar.png|32px]] [[Arch_Rebar/it|Armatura]]: Crea l'armatura in un elemento strutturale estrudendo uno schizzo o utilizzando come base un oggetto selezionato * [[Image:Arch_Floor.png|32px]] [[Arch_Floor/it|Piano]]: Crea un piano che comprende gli oggetti selezionati * [[Image:Arch_Building.png|32px]] [[Arch_Building/it|Edificio]]: Crea un edificio che comprende gli oggetti selezionati * [[Image:Arch_Site.png|32px]] [[Arch_Site/it|Sito]]: Crea un sito che comprende gli oggetti selezionati * [[Image:Arch_Window.png|32px]] [[Arch_Window/it|Finestra]]: Crea una finestra utlizzando come base un oggetto selezionato * [[Image:Arch_SectionPlane.png|32px]] [[Arch_SectionPlane/it|Piano di sezione]]: Aggiunge un oggetto ''Piano di sezione'' al documento * [[Image:Arch_Axis.png|32px]] [[Arch_Axis/it|Sistema di assi]]: Aggiunge al documento un sistema di assi * [[Image:Arch_Roof.png|32px]] [[Arch_Roof/it|Tetto]]: Crea le falde del tetto partendo da una faccia selezionata * [[Image:Arch_Space.png|32px]] [[Arch_Space/it|Spazio]]: Crea un oggetto spazio * [[Image:Arch_Stairs.png|32px]] [[Arch_Stairs/it|Scala]]: Crea un oggetto scala * [[Image:Arch_Panel.png|32px]] [[Arch_Panel/it|Pannello]]: Crea un oggetto pannello basato su un oggetto 2D selezionato * [[Image:Arch_Frame.png|32px]] [[Arch_Frame/it|Frame]]: Crea un oggetto frame basato su uno schema selezionato
==== Strumenti di modifica ====
Strumenti per modificare gli oggetti architettonici.
* [[Image:Arch_Add.png|32px]] [[Arch_Add/it|Aggiungi]]: Aggiunge oggetti ad un componente * [[Image:Arch_Remove.png|32px]] [[Arch_Remove/it|Rimuovi]]: Sottrae o rimuove oggetti da un componente * [[Image:Arch_Survey.png|32px]] [[Arch_Survey/it|Ispeziona]]: Entra o esce dalla modalità ispezione * [[Image:Arch_CutPlane.png|32px]] [[Arch_CutPlane/it|Taglia con un piano]]: Taglia un oggetto secondo un piano.
==== Utilità ====
Strumenti aggiuntivi di aiuto per operazioni specifiche.
* [[Image:Arch_SplitMesh.png|32px]] [[Arch_SplitMesh/it|Dividi maglia]]: Divide una maglia selezionata in componenti separati * [[Image:Arch_MeshToShape.png|32px]] [[Arch_MeshToShape/it|Forma da Maglia]]: Converte una maglia in una forma, unificando le facce complanari * [[Image:Arch_RemoveShape.png|32px]] [[Arch_RemoveShape/it|Rimuovi forma]]: Converte forme basate su cubi in oggetti architettonici completamente parametrici * [[Image:Arch_SelectNonSolidMeshes.png|32px]] [[Arch_SelectNonSolidMeshes/it|Seleziona i meshes non-solidi]]: Seleziona tutti gli oggetti maglia non-solidi della selezione corrente o del documento * [[Image:Arch_CloseHoles.png|32px]] [[Arch_CloseHoles/it|Chiudi aperture]]: Chiude le aperture in un oggetto selezionato basato su forme * [[Image:Arch_Check.png|32px]] [[Arch_Check/it|Verifica]]: Controlla se gli oggetti selezionati sono solidi e non contengono difetti * [[Image:Arch_IfcExplorer.png|32px]] [[Arch_IfcExplorer/it|Ifc Explorer]]: Esplora il contenuto di un file [[Arch_IFC/it|IFC]] {{clear}}<noinclude>[[Category:Administration/it]] [[Category:Template/it]]</noinclude>

===構築用ツール===
建築用オブジェクトを作成するためのツールです。
* [[Image:Arch_Wall.png|32px]] [[Arch_Wall/jp|壁]]: 選択されているオブジェクトを基礎として壁を作成します * [[Image:Arch_Structure.png|32px]] [[Arch_Structure/jp|構造要素]]: 選択されているオブジェクトを基礎として構造要素を作成します * [[Image:Arch_Floor.png|32px]] [[Arch_Floor/jp|床]]: 選択されているオブジェクトを含む床を作成します * [[Image:Arch_Building.png|32px]] [[Arch_Building/jp|Building]]: 選択されているオブジェクトを含む建造物を作成します * [[Image:Arch_Site.png|32px]] [[Arch_Site/jp|サイト]]: 選択されているサイトを含む建造物を作成します * [[Image:Arch_Window.png|32px]] [[Arch_Window/jp|窓]]: 選択されているオブジェクトを基礎として使って窓を作成します * [[Image:Arch_SectionPlane.png|32px]] [[Arch_SectionPlane/jp|断面]]: ドキュメントに断面を追加します * [[Image:Arch_Axis.png|32px]] [[Arch_Axis/jp|座標系]]: ドキュメントに座標系を追加します * [[Image:Arch_Roof.png|32px]] [[Arch_Roof/jp|屋根]]: 選択されている面から傾斜屋根を作成します
===修正用ツール===
建築用オブジェクトを修正するためのツールです。
* [[Image:Arch_Add.png|32px]] [[Arch_Add/jp|追加]]: 構成要素にオブジェクトを追加します * [[Image:Arch_Remove.png|32px]] [[Arch_Remove/jp|削除]]: 構成要素からオブジェクトを減算したり削除したりします
===ユーティリティ===
特定の作業を補助するための付加的なツールです。
* [[Image:Arch_SplitMesh.png|32px]] [[Arch_SplitMesh/jp|メッシュの分割]]: 選択されているメッシュを別々の構成要素に分割します * [[Image:Arch_MeshToShape.png|32px]] [[Arch_MeshToShape/jp|メッシュからシェイプへ]]: 同一面を統合しつつメッシュをシェイプに変換します * [[Image:Arch_RemoveShape.png|32px]] [[Arch_RemoveShape/jp|シェイプの削除]]: 三次元シェイプベースの建築オブジェクトを完全にパラメトリックなものに変えます * [[Image:Arch_SelectNonSolidMeshes.png|32px]] [[Arch_SelectNonSolidMeshes/jp|非ソリッドなメッシュを選択]]: 現在の選択オブジェクトまたはドキュメントから全ての非ソリッドなメッシュを選択します * [[Image:Arch_CloseHoles.png|32px]] [[Arch_CloseHoles/jp|穴埋め]]: 選択されているシェイプベースオブジェクトの穴を埋めます * [[Image:Arch_Check.png|32px]] [[Arch_Check/jp|検証]]: 選択されているオブジェクトが欠陥を含んでいないソリッドであるかどうかをチェックします <noinclude>[[Category:Template/jp]]</noinclude>

===Construction tools===
These are tools for creating architectural objects.
* [[Image:Arch_Wall.png|32px]] [[Arch_Wall/sv|Wall]]: Creates a wall from scratch or using a selected object as a base * [[Image:Arch_Structure.png|32px]] [[Arch_Structure/sv|Structural element]]: Creates a structural element from scratch or using a selected object as a base * [[Image:Arch_Rebar.png|32px]] [[Arch_Rebar/sv|Rebar]]: Creates a reinforcement bar in a selected structural element * [[Image:Arch_Floor.png|32px]] [[Arch_Floor/sv|Floor]]: Creates a floor including selected objects * [[Image:Arch_Building.png|32px]] [[Arch_Building/sv|Building]]: Creates a building including selected objects * [[Image:Arch_Site.png|32px]] [[Arch_Site/sv|Site]]: Creates a site including selected objects * [[Image:Arch_Window.png|32px]] [[Arch_Window/sv|Window]]: Creates a window using a selected object as a base * [[Image:Arch_SectionPlane.png|32px]] [[Arch_SectionPlane/sv|Section Plane]]: Adds a section plane object to the document * [[Image:Arch_Axis.png|32px]] [[Arch_Axis/sv|Axes system]]: Adds an axes system to the document * [[Image:Arch_Roof.png|32px]] [[Arch_Roof/sv|Roof]]: Creates a sloped roof from a selected face * [[Image:Arch_Space.png|32px]] [[Arch_Space/sv|Space]]: Creates a space object in the document * [[Image:Arch_Stairs.png|32px]] [[Arch_Stairs/sv|Stairs]]: Creates a stairs object in the document * [[Image:Arch_Frame.png|32px]] [[Arch_Frame/sv|Frame]]: Creates a frame object from a selected layout
===Modification tools===
These are tools for modifying architectural objects.
* [[Image:Arch_Add.png|32px]] [[Arch_Add/sv|Add]]: Adds objects to a component * [[Image:Arch_Remove.png|32px]] [[Arch_Remove/sv|Remove]]: Subtracts or removes objects from a component * [[Image:Arch_Survey.png|32px]] [[Arch_Survey/sv|Survey]]: Enters or leaves surveying mode
===Utilities===
These are additional tools to help you in specific tasks.
* [[Image:Arch_SplitMesh.png|32px]] [[Arch_SplitMesh/sv|Split Mesh]]: Splits a selected mesh into separate components * [[Image:Arch_MeshToShape.png|32px]] [[Arch_MeshToShape/sv|Mesh To Shape]]: Converts a mesh into a shape, unifying coplanar faces * [[Image:Arch_RemoveShape.png|32px]] [[Arch_RemoveShape/sv|Remove Shape]]: Turns cubic shape-based arch object fully parametric * [[Image:Arch_SelectNonSolidMeshes.png|32px]] [[Arch_SelectNonSolidMeshes/sv|Select non-solid meshes]]: Selects all non-solid meshes from the current selection or frm the document * [[Image:Arch_CloseHoles.png|32px]] [[Arch_CloseHoles/sv|CloseHoles]]: Closes holes in a selected shape-based object * [[Image:Arch_Check.png|32px]] [[Arch_Check/sv|Check]]: Check if the selected objects are solids and don't contain defects * [[Image:Arch_IfcExplorer.png|32px]] [[Arch_IfcExplorer/sv|Ifc Explorer]]: Browse the contents of an [[Arch_IFC|IFC]] file <noinclude>[[Category:Template/sv]]</noinclude>
not used [[Category:Pages_to_delete]]

{|border=1 !align=center width="25%"|選択 !align=center width="25%"|平行移動 !align=center width="25%"|拡大縮小 !align=center width="25%"|回転表示 |- align=center |[[Image:Hand_cursor.png]] |[[Image:Pan_cursor.png]] |[[Image:Zoom_cursor.png]] |[[Image:Rotate_cursor.png]] |- align= center |[[Image:Select-mouse.svg|Alt=Mouse with left button clicked | to Select ]] |{{KEY|shift}}+[[Image:Pan-mouse.svg |Alt=Mouse with middle button (scroll wheel) clicked | to Pan]] |[[Image:Zoom-mouse.svg |Alt=Mouse with scroll wheel rolling up or down | to Zoom in or out]] |[[Image:Pan-mouse.svg|Alt=Mouse with middle button (scroll wheel) clicked | to Rotate ]] |-valign=top |選択したいオブジェクトの上で左マウスボタンをクリックしてください。 |Shiftを押したまま中央マウスボタンをクリックしてオブジェクトの周りを動かしてください。 |拡大縮小にはマウスホイールを使ってください。 |中央マウスボタンをクリックしてドラッグしてください。 |} <noinclude>[[Category:Template/jp]]</noinclude>
