{|border=1 class="mousemodel" !align=center width="20%"|Select !align=center width="20%"|Pan !align=center width="20%"|Zoom !align=center width="20%"|Rotate View !align=center width="20%"|Rotate View
Alternate Method |- align=center |[[Image:Hand_cursor.png]] |[[Image:Pan_cursor.png]] |[[Image:Zoom_cursor.png]] |[[Image:Rotate_cursor.png]] |[[Image:Rotate_cursor.png]]
|- align=center |[[Image:Select-mouse.svg|Alt=Mouse with left button clicked | to Select ]] |[[Image:Pan-mouse.svg |Alt=Mouse with middle button (scroll wheel) clicked | to Pan]] |[[Image:Zoom-mouse.svg |Alt=Mouse with scroll wheel rolling up or down | to Zoom in or out]] |[[Image:Rotate-mouse.svg|Alt=Mouse with middle button (scroll wheel) clicked first and held, and the left button clicked second. | to Rotate view]] |[[Image:Rotate-mouse-MMB%2BRMB.svg|Alt=Mouse with middle button (scroll wheel) clicked first and held, and the right button clicked second. | to Rotate view]]
|- valign=top |Press the left mouse button over an object you want to select. Holding down ctrl allows the selection of multiple objects. |Click the middle mouse button and move the object around to pan |Use the mouse wheel to zoom in and out. |Click first with the middle mouse button, hold it down, and then click the left mouse button and drag the mouse in the desired direction. The cursor location at the middle mouse button click determines the center of rotation. Rotation works like spinning a ball which rotates around its center. If the buttons are released before you stop the mouse motion, the object continues [[spinning]], if this is enabled. A double click with the middle mouse button sets a new center of rotation. |Click first with the middle mouse button, hold it down, and then click the right mouse button and drag the mouse in the desired direction. This method works just like the previously described Rotate View that uses Middle Mouse Button + Left Mouse Button, except that the middle mouse button may be released after the right mouse button is pressed. Users who use the mouse with their right hand may find this Rotate View method easier than the previous method.
|- align=center | |[[Image:Mouse_2_button_right.svg|Ctrl + click and release right | to Pan]] |[[File:Mouse 2 button left.svg|Ctrl + click and release left | to Zoom]] |[[File:Mouse 2 button left.svg|Ctrl + click and momentary hold left mouse button to rotate | to rotate]] | |- valign=top | |Press and hold {{KEY|Ctrl}} key and click and release right mouse button to pan (rev 0.14) |Once in Pan mode, press and release left mouse button to Zoom, to exit back to pan mode press and release right mouse button (rev 0.14) |Once in Pan mode, click and momentary hold left mouse button to rotate, to exit back to pan mode press and release right mouse button (rev 0.14) | |} <noinclude>[[Category:Template]]</noinclude>

{|border=1 !align=center width="25%"|选择 !align=center width="25%"|平移 !align=center width="25%"|缩放 !align=center width="25%"|旋转 |- align=center |[[Image:Hand_cursor.png]] |[[Image:Pan_cursor.png]] |[[Image:Zoom_cursor.png]] |[[Image:Rotate_cursor.png]] |- align=center |[[Image:Select-mouse.svg|Alt=Mouse with left button clicked | to Select ]] |[[Image:Pan-mouse.svg |Alt=Mouse with middle button (scroll wheel) clicked | to Pan]] |[[Image:Zoom-mouse.svg |Alt=Mouse with scroll wheel rolling up or down | to Zoom in or out]] |[[Image:Rotate-mouse.svg|Alt=Mouse with middle button (scroll wheel) clicked first and held, and the left button clicked second. | to Rotate view]] |- valign=top |在欲选取的对象上面单击左键，如果摁住 Ctrl 键则可选择多个对象。 |摁住中键不释放，便可平移对象。 |使用滚轮可实现放大与缩小。 |摁住中键，再摁住左键，然后在所期望的方向上移动鼠标，这一操作像是让一个球围绕球心旋转。如果在鼠标移动过程中释放鼠标键，对象会继续[[spinning/cn|旋转]]，前提是这一功能被启用。在一个对象任意部位单击鼠标中键，便可将对应位置设为旋转及缩放中心。 |} <noinclude>[[Category:Template/cn]]</noinclude>

{|border=1 class="mousemodel" !align=center width="20%"|Výběr !align=center width="20%"|Pan !align=center width="20%"|Zoom !align=center width="20%"|Otáčení pohledem !align=center width="20%"|Otáčení pohledem
Alternativní Methoda |- align=center |[[Image:Hand_cursor.png]] |[[Image:Pan_cursor.png]] |[[Image:Zoom_cursor.png]] |[[Image:Rotate_cursor.png]] |[[Image:Rotate_cursor.png]] |- align=center |[[Image:Select-mouse.svg|Alt=Mouse with left button clicked | to Select ]] |[[Image:Pan-mouse.svg |Alt=Mouse with middle button (scroll wheel) clicked | to Pan]] |[[Image:Zoom-mouse.svg |Alt=Mouse with scroll wheel rolling up or down | to Zoom in or out]] |[[Image:Rotate-mouse.svg|Alt=Mouse with middle button (scroll wheel) clicked first and held, and the left button clicked second. | to Rotate view]] |[[Image:Rotate-mouse-MMB%2BRMB.svg|Alt=Mouse with middle button (scroll wheel) clicked first and held, and the right button clicked second. | to Rotate view]] |- valign=top |Stiskněte levé tlačítko myši nad objektem, který chcete vybrat. Podržení klávesy CTRL umožňuje současný výběr více objektů. |Klikněte na střední tlačítko a pohybujte objektem kolem pan |Kolečko myši používejte pro zoomování (zvětšení nebo zmenšení měřítka). |Klikněte na prostřední tlačítko, podržte je stisknuté a potom klikněte na levé tlačítko myši a táhněte myší v požadovaném směru. Umístění kurzovu v době stisknutí prostředního tlačítka určuje střed rotace. Otáčení funguje jako rotace míče, který se otáčí podle svého středu. Pokud jsou tlačítka uvolněna před zastavením pohybu myši, objekt pokračuje v [[spinning/cs|otáčení]], pokud je to umožněno. Dvojklik prostředním tlačítkem nastaví nový střed otáčení. |Klikněte na prostřední tlačítko, podržte je stisknuté a potom klikněte na pravé tlačítko myši a táhněte myší v požadovaném směru. Tato metoda pracuje stejně jako dříve popsaná metoda se stiskem prostředního tlačítka a levého tlačítka, s tím rozdílem, že prostřední tlačítko může být uvolněno hned po stisknutí pravého tlačítka. Pro uživatele, kteří používají myš pravou rukou může být tento způosob otáčení příjemnější než předchozí metoda. |} <noinclude>[[Category:Template/cs]]</noinclude>

{|border=1 !align=center width="25%"|Auswählen !align=center width="25%"|Bewegen !align=center width="25%"|Zoom !align=center width="25%"|Ansicht drehen |- align=center |[[Image:Hand_cursor.png]] |[[Image:Pan_cursor.png]] |[[Image:Zoom_cursor.png]] |[[Image:Rotate_cursor.png]] |- align=center |[[Image:Select-mouse.svg|Alt=Mouse with left button clicked | to Select ]] |[[Image:Pan-mouse.svg |Alt=Mouse with middle button (scroll wheel) clicked | to Pan]] |[[Image:Zoom-mouse.svg |Alt=Mouse with scroll wheel rolling up or down | to Zoom in or out]] |[[Image:Rotate-mouse.svg|Alt=Mouse with middle button (scroll wheel) clicked first and held, and the left button clicked second. | to Rotate view]] |- valign=top |Drücken Sie den linken Maus-Knopf über einem Objekt, das Sie auswählen wollen. Gleichzeit gedrückte Strg-Taste erlaubt die Auswahl von mehreren Objekten. |Klicken und halten Sie die mittlere Maustaste gedrückt und verschieben Sie das Objekt. |Mit dem Mausrad können Sie vergrößern oder verkleinern. |Klicken und halten Sie zunächst die mittlere Maustaste, klicken Sie während dessen mit der linken Maustaste auf einen sichtbaren Teil eines Objekts und ziehen Sie ihn in die gewünschte Richtung. Das arbeitet wie das Drehen eines Balls, der um sein Zentrum rotiert. Wenn Sie die Tasten loslassen, bevor Sie Ihre Bewegung zu stoppen, wird das Objekt weiter drehen, wenn dies in den Einstellungen aktiviert ist. Ein Doppelklick mit der mittleren Maustaste auf einen beliebigen Teil eines Objekts setzt den neuen Drehpunkt und zoomt auf diesen Punkt. |} <noinclude>[[Category:Template/de]]</noinclude>

{|border=1 !align=center width="25%"|Selección !align=center width="25%"|Encuadre !align=center width="25%"|Zoom !align=center width="25%"|Rotar vista |- align=center |[[Image:Hand_cursor.png]] |[[Image:Pan_cursor.png]] |[[Image:Zoom_cursor.png]] |[[Image:Rotate_cursor.png]] |- align=center |[[Image:Select-mouse.svg|Alt=Mouse with left button clicked | Selección]] |[[Image:Pan-mouse.svg |Alt=Mouse with middle button (scroll wheel) clicked | Encuadre]] |[[Image:Zoom-mouse.svg |Alt=Mouse with scroll wheel rolling up or down | Zoom]] |[[Image:Rotate-mouse.svg|Alt=Mouse with middle button (scroll wheel) clicked first and held, and the left button clicked second. | Rotar vista]] |- valign=top |Presiona el botón izquierdo sobre el objeto que quieras seleccionar. Manteniendo pulsadas la tecla CRTL se permite la selección de múltiples objetos. |Pulsa el botón del medio. |Utiliza la rueda del ratón para acercar o alejar la vista. |Pulsa primero con el botón del medio, mantén el botón presionado y pulsa el botón izquierdo sobre cualquier parte visible de cualquier pieza de un objeto y arrástralo en la dirección deseada. Esto funciona como si se girase una bola que rotase sobre su centro. Si liberas el botón antes de parar el movimiento, el objeto continua [[spinning/es|girando]], si está activado. Un doble clic con el botón del medio sobre cualquier parte de un objeto establece en ese punto el nuevo centro de rotación y acerca la vista a él. |} <noinclude>[[Category:Template/es]]</noinclude>

{|border=1 class="mousemodel" !align=center width="20%"|Selection !align=center width="20%"|Pan (déplacement) !align=center width="20%"|Zoom !align=center width="20%"|Rotation !align=center width="20%"|Rotation Méthode alternative |- align=center |[[Image:Hand_cursor.png]] |[[Image:Pan_cursor.png]] |[[Image:Zoom_cursor.png]] |[[Image:Rotate_cursor.png]] |[[Image:Rotate_cursor.png]] |- align=center |[[Image:Select-mouse.svg|Alt=Mouse with left button clicked | pour Selectionner ]] |[[Image:Pan-mouse.svg |Alt=Mouse with middle button (scroll wheel) clicked | pour déplacer]] |[[Image:Zoom-mouse.svg |Alt=Mouse with scroll wheel rolling up or down | pour Zoomer + or -]] |[[Image:Rotate-mouse.svg|Alt=Mouse with middle button (scroll wheel) clicked first and held, and the left button clicked second. | pour pivoter la vue]] |[[Image:Rotate-mouse-MMB%2BRMB.svg|Alt=Mouse with middle button (scroll wheel) clicked first and held, and the right button clicked second. | pour pivoter la vue]] |- valign=top |Cliquez avec le bouton gauche de la souris sur l'objet que vous souhaitez sélectionner. Maintenez la touche CTRL enfoncée pour sélectionner plusieurs objets. |Cliquez sur le bouton central de la souris pour déplacer l'objet dans l'écran graphique |Utilisez la molette de la souris pour zoomer et dézoomer. Le réglage peut se faire dans "Edition → Préférences → Affichage → Vue 3D → Etape de zoom" |D'abord cliquez et maintenez le bouton central de la souris, puis cliquez sur le bouton gauche de la souris sur l'objet et faites-le glisser dans la direction souhaitée. Cela fonctionne comme une boule qui tourne autour de son axe. Si vous relâchez les touches avant l'arrêt de votre requête et si la fonction "Permettre l'animation" est cochée, l'objet poursuit sa [[spinning/fr|rotation]]. Un double-clic avec le bouton central de la souris sur n'importe quelle partie d'un objet définit le nouveau centre de rotation et effectue un zoom en avant à partir de ce point. |D'abord cliquer et maintenez le bouton central de la souris, puis cliquez sur le bouton droit de la souris et faites glisser la souris dans la direction souhaitée. Cette méthode fonctionne comme décrite précédemment la rotation de l'affichage utilise le bouton central de la souris + le bouton gauche de la souris. Les utilisateurs qui utilisent la souris avec la main droite peuvent trouver cette méthode de rotation d'affichage plus facile que la méthode précédente. |- align=center | |[[Image:Mouse_2_button_right.svg|Enfoncez la touche Ctrl et cliquez puis relâchez le bouton droit de la souris | pour déplacer (Pan)]] |[[File:Mouse 2 button left.svg|Enfoncez la touche Ctrl et cliquez puis relâchez le bouton gauche de la souris | pour Zoomer]] |[[File:Mouse 2 button left.svg|Enfoncez la touche Ctrl et cliquez momentanément le bouton gauche de la souris pour faire pivoter la vue | pour pivoter]] | |- valign=top | |Enfoncez la touche {{KEY|Ctrl}} et cliquez puis relâchez le bouton droit de la souris pour déplacer (Pan) (rev 0.14) |Enfoncez la touche {{KEY|Ctrl}} et cliquez puis relâchez le bouton gauche de la souris pour Zoomer (rev 0.14) |Enfoncez la touche {{KEY|Ctrl}} et cliquez momentanément le bouton gauche de la souris pour faire pivoter la vue (rev 0.14) | | |} <noinclude>[[Category:Template/fr]]</noinclude>

{|border=1 class="mousemodel" !align=center width="25%"|Selezione !align=center width="25%"|Traslazione !align=center width="25%"|Zoom !align=center width="25%"|Rotazione |- align=center |[[Image:Hand_cursor.png]] |[[Image:Pan_cursor.png]] |[[Image:Zoom_cursor.png]] |[[Image:Rotate_cursor.png]] |- align=center |[[Image:Select-mouse.svg|Alt=Mouse with left button clicked | per selezionare ]] |[[Image:Pan-mouse.svg |Alt=Mouse with middle button (scroll wheel) clicked | per traslare]] |[[Image:Zoom-mouse.svg |Alt=Mouse with scroll wheel rolling up or down | per ingrandire o ridurre]] |[[Image:Rotate-mouse.svg|Alt=Mouse with middle button (scroll wheel) clicked first and held, and the left button clicked second. | per ruotare la vista]] oppure [[Image:Rotate-mouse-MMB%2BRMB.svg|Alt=Mouse with middle button (scroll wheel) clicked first and held, and the right button clicked second. | per ruotare la vista, secondo metodo]] |- valign=top |Premere il tasto sinistro del mouse sull'oggetto che si desidera selezionare. Tenere premuto il tasto {{KEY/it|Ctrl}} per selezionare più oggetti. |Fare clic sul pulsante centrale del mouse e muovere il mouse per spostare l'oggetto.
Inoltre, per attivare la traslazione, si può tenere premuto {{KEY/it|Ctrl}} e cliccare con il tasto destro. In questo modo la funzione rimane attiva, senza impegnare la mano del mouse, e permette l'uso della rotellina per lo zoom, fino a quando il tasto Ctrl non viene rilasciato. |Ruotare la rotellina del mouse per ingrandire e ridurre. |Premere e mantenere premuto il tasto centrale del mouse, fare clic con il pulsante sinistro, o destro, del mouse su qualsiasi parte visibile di un oggetto e trascinarlo nella direzione desiderata. La posizione del cursore nel momento in cui si preme il pulsante centrale del mouse determina il centro di rotazione. La rotazione funziona come nel caso di una palla che ruota attorno al suo centro. Se i tasti vengono rilasciati prima di arrestare il movimento e se l'opzione [[Spinning/it|Abilita animazione]] è attivata, l'oggetto continua la rotazione automaticamente. Un doppio clic con il tasto centrale del mouse su qualsiasi parte di un oggetto imposta un nuovo centro di rotazione e di zoom in tale punto. Il secondo metodo può essere utile ai mancini.
Inoltre, per attivare la rotazione, si può tenere premuto {{KEY/it|Maiusc}} (Shift) e cliccare con il tasto destro. In questo modo la funzione rimane attiva, senza impegnare la mano del mouse, e permette l'uso dello zoom, fino a quando il tasto Maiusc non viene rilasciato. |- align=center | |[[Image:Mouse_2_button_right.svg|Ctrl + click and release right | to Pan]] |[[File:Mouse 2 button left.svg|Ctrl + click and release left | to Zoom]] |[[File:Mouse 2 button left.svg|Ctrl + click and momentary hold left mouse button to rotate | to rotate]] | |- valign=top | |Premere {{KEY|Ctrl}}, cliccare sul tasto destro, rilasciarlo e spostare il mouse per spostare la vista (rev 0.14) |Premere {{KEY|Ctrl}}, cliccare sul tasto destro, rilasciarlo, cliccare sul tasto sinistro, rilasciarlo e spostare il mouse per zoommare (rev 0.14) |Premere {{KEY|Maiusc}}, cliccare sul tasto destro, rilasciarlo e spostare il mouse per ruotare la vista (rev 0.14) | |} [[Category:Administration/it]] [[Category:Template/it]]

{|border=1 !align=center width="25%"|選択 !align=center width="25%"|平行移動 !align=center width="25%"|拡大縮小 !align=center width="25%"|回転表示 |- align=center |[[Image:Hand_cursor.png]] |[[Image:Pan_cursor.png]] |[[Image:Zoom_cursor.png]] |[[Image:Rotate_cursor.png]] |- align=center |[[Image:Select-mouse.svg|Alt=Mouse with left button clicked | to Select ]] |[[Image:Pan-mouse.svg |Alt=Mouse with middle button (scroll wheel) clicked | to Pan]] |[[Image:Zoom-mouse.svg |Alt=Mouse with scroll wheel rolling up or down | to Zoom in or out]] |[[Image:Rotate-mouse.svg|Alt=Mouse with middle button (scroll wheel) clicked first and held, and the left button clicked second. | to Rotate view]] |- valign=top |選択したいオブジェクトの上で左マウスボタンを押してください。Ctrlを押したまま操作すると複数のオブジェクトを選択できます。 |マウス中央ボタンを押して動かしてオブジェクトを平行移動させます。 |拡大縮小にはマウスホイールを使用してください。 |まず中央マウスボタンを押し、そのまま表示されているオブジェクトの任意の点で左ボタンをクリックして好きな方向にドラッグします。こうすると中心の周りを回転する球のように回転が行われます。ドラッグを止める前にボタンを離すとオブジェクトは[[spinning/jp|回転]]し続けます（有効になっている場合）。オブジェクト上の任意の点でマウスの中央ボタンをダブルクリックするとその点が回転、拡大縮小の原点に設定されます。 |} <noinclude>[[Category:Template/jp]]</noinclude>

{|border=1 class="mousemodel" !align=center width="20%"|Select !align=center width="20%"|Pan !align=center width="20%"|Zoom !align=center width="20%"|Rotate View !align=center width="20%"|Rotate View
Alternate Method |- align=center |[[Image:Hand_cursor.png]] |[[Image:Pan_cursor.png]] |[[Image:Zoom_cursor.png]] |[[Image:Rotate_cursor.png]] |[[Image:Rotate_cursor.png]]
|- align=center |[[Image:Select-mouse.svg|Alt=Mouse with left button clicked | to Select ]] |[[Image:Pan-mouse.svg |Alt=Mouse with middle button (scroll wheel) clicked | to Pan]] |[[Image:Zoom-mouse.svg |Alt=Mouse with scroll wheel rolling up or down | to Zoom in or out]] |[[Image:Rotate-mouse.svg|Alt=Mouse with middle button (scroll wheel) clicked first and held, and the left button clicked second. | to Rotate view]] |[[Image:Rotate-mouse-MMB%2BRMB.svg|Alt=Mouse with middle button (scroll wheel) clicked first and held, and the right button clicked second. | to Rotate view]]
|- valign=top |Press the left mouse button over an object you want to select. Holding down ctrl allows the selection of multiple objects. |Click the middle mouse button and move the object around to pan |Use the mouse wheel to zoom in and out. |Click first with the middle mouse button, hold it down, and then click the left mouse button and drag the mouse in the desired direction. The cursor location at the middle mouse button click determines the center of rotation. Rotation works like spinning a ball which rotates around its center. If the buttons are released before you stop the mouse motion, the object continues [[spinning]], if this is enabled. A double click with the middle mouse button sets a new center of rotation. |Click first with the middle mouse button, hold it down, and then click the right mouse button and drag the mouse in the desired direction. This method works just like the previously described Rotate View that uses Middle Mouse Button + Left Mouse Button, except that the middle mouse button may be released after the right mouse button is pressed. Users who use the mouse with their right hand may find this Rotate View method easier than the previous method.
|- align=center | |[[Image:Mouse_2_button_right.svg|Ctrl + click and release right | to Pan]] |[[File:Mouse 2 button left.svg|Ctrl + click and release left | to Zoom]] |[[File:Mouse 2 button left.svg|Ctrl + click and momentary hold left mouse button to rotate | to rotate]] | |- valign=top | |Press and hold {{KEY|Ctrl}} key and click and release right mouse button to pan (rev 0.14) |Once in Pan mode, press and release left mouse button to Zoom, to exit back to pan mode press and release right mouse button (rev 0.14) |Once in Pan mode, click and momentary hold left mouse button to rotate, to exit back to pan mode press and release right mouse button (rev 0.14) | |} <noinclude>[[Category:Template/pt]]</noinclude>

{|border=1 !align=center width="25%"|Selectare !align=center width="25%"|Translatie !align=center width="25%"|Zoom !align=center width="25%"|Rotire |- align=center |[[Image:Hand_cursor.png]] |[[Image:Pan_cursor.png]] |[[Image:Zoom_cursor.png]] |[[Image:Rotate_cursor.png]] |- align=center |[[Image:Select-mouse.svg|Alt=Mouse cu butonul stanga apasat | pentru selectie ]] |[[Image:Pan-mouse.svg |Alt=Mouse cu butonul din mijloc apasat | pentru translatie]] |[[Image:Zoom-mouse.svg |Alt=Mouse cu butonul din mijloc sus sau jos | pentru a mari sau micsora]] |[[Image:Rotate-mouse.svg|Alt=Mouse cu butonul din mijloc apasat mai intai apoi butonul stanga apasat | pentru a roti vizualizarea]] |- valign=top |Apasati butonul stanga al mouse-ului deasupra obiectului de selectat. Apasarea tastei CTRL permite selectarea mai multor obiecte. |Apasati butonul din mijloc si miscati mouse-ul pentru a translata vizualizarea. |Folositi rotita mouse-ului pentru a mari sau micsora. |Apasati mai intai butonul din mijloc al mouse-ului, tineti-l apasat si apasati butonul stanga al mouse-ului si mutati-l in directia dorita. Functioneaza ca o bila ce se roteste in jurul centrului. Daca eliberati butoanele inainte de a inceta miscarea vizualizarea va continua sa se [[spinning/ro|roteasca]]in jurul centrului, daca aceasta caracteristica e activata. Dublu-click folosind butonul mijlociu pe oricare parte a unui obiect seteaza noul centru de rotatie si panorameaza pe acest punct. |} <noinclude>[[Category:Template/ro]]</noinclude>

'''Usage:''' {{Click | image=myimage.png | link=PageName | width=10px | height=10px}} This template attempts to superimpose an invisible link on an image. It doesn't work in [[wikipedia:Safari (web browser)|Safari]], in text-only browsers, and in screen readers for the disabled, and possibly other situations. The technique of using [[wikipedia:CSS|CSS]] to change page content also completely breaks an article's [[wikipedia:web accessibility|web accessibility]] by contravening a [[wikipedia:WAI|WAI]] priority-one checkpoint.[http://www.w3.org/TR/WAI-WEBCONTENT/#tech-order-style-sheets] Please try to avoid using this template unless absolutely necessary. {{#tag:syntaxhighlight|{{{code|{{{1}}}}}}|lang="{{{lang|{{{2|python}}}}}}"|enclose="div"}}<noinclude>
----
Use this template when you want to display code, for example : <nowiki>{{Code|code= import FreeCAD, Draft Draft.makeLine(FreeCAD.Vector(0,0,0),FreeCAD.Vector(2,0,0)) }}</nowiki>
REMARK: Since a content that includes an equals sign (=) is interpreted as a variable, you must specify the '''code''' parameter explicitly to avoid issues (as in the above example)
This template gives a different coloration depending on the used programming language. The default language is '''Python'''.
Options:
* lang=python * lang=cpp * lang=java * lang=pascal
Other options are be supported: the template is a simple wrapper around the <nowiki><syntaxhighlight>...</syntaxhighlight> </nowiki> tag to show syntax-highlighted text. Unlike <nowiki><syntaxhighlight></nowiki>, text that does not fit on the screen will be wrapped. See [http://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:SyntaxHighlight_GeSHi <nowiki><syntaxhighlight></nowiki>] for a complete list of supported languages
[[Category:Administration]]
</noinclude>

===Drawing objects===
These are tools for creating objects.
* [[Image:Draft_Line.png]] [[Draft_Line|Line]]: Draws a line segment between 2 points * [[Image:Draft_Wire.png]] [[Draft_Wire|Wire]]: Draws a line made of multiple line segments (polyline) * [[Image:Draft_Circle.png]] [[Draft_Circle|Circle]]: Draws a circle from center and radius * [[Image:Draft_Arc.png]] [[Draft_Arc|Arc]]: Draws an arc segment from center, radius, start angle and end angle * [[Image:Draft_Ellipse.png|32px]] [[Draft_Ellipse|Ellipse]]: Draws an ellipse from two corner points * [[Image:Draft_Polygon.png]] [[Draft_Polygon|Polygon]]: Draws a regular polygon from a center and a radius * [[Image:Draft_Rectangle.png]] [[Draft_Rectangle|Rectangle]]: Draws a rectangle from 2 opposite points * [[Image:Draft_Text.png]] [[Draft_Text|Text]]: Draws a multi-line text annotation * [[Image:Draft_Dimension.png]] [[Draft_Dimension|Dimension]]: Draws a dimension annotation * [[Image:Draft_BSpline.png]] [[Draft_BSpline|BSpline]]: Draws a B-Spline from a series of points * [[Image:Draft_Point.png|32px]] [[Draft_Point|Point]]: Inserts a point object * [[Image:Draft_ShapeString.png|32px]] [[Draft_ShapeString|ShapeString]]: The ShapeString tool inserts a compound shape representing a text string at a given point in the current document * [[Image:Draft_Facebinder.png|32px]] [[Draft_Facebinder|Facebinder]]: Creates a new object from selected faces on existing objects * [[Image:Draft_BezCurve.png|32px]] [[Draft_BezCurve|Bezier Curve]]: Draws a Bezier curve from a series of points
===Modifying objects===
These are tools for modifying existing objects. They work on selected objects, but if no object is selected, you will be invited to select one.
* [[Image:Draft_Move.png]] [[Draft_Move|Move]]: Moves object(s) from one location to another * [[Image:Draft_Rotate.png]] [[Draft_Rotate|Rotate]]: Rotates object(s) from a start angle to an end angle * [[Image:Draft_Offset.png]] [[Draft_Offset|Offset]]: Moves segments of an object about a certain distance * [[Image:Draft_Trimex.png]] [[Draft_Trimex|Trim/Extend (Trimex)]]: Trims or extends an object * [[Image:Draft_Upgrade.png]] [[Draft_Upgrade|Upgrade]]: Joins objects into a higher-level object * [[Image:Draft_Downgrade.png]] [[Draft_Downgrade|Downgrade]]: Explodes objects into lower-level objects * [[Image:Draft_Scale.png]] [[Draft_Scale|Scale]]: Scales selected object(s) around a base point * [[Image:Draft_PutOnSheet.png]] [[Draft_Drawing|Drawing]]: Writes selected objects to a [[Drawing Module|Drawing sheet]] * [[Image:Draft_Edit.png]] [[Draft_Edit|Edit]]: Edits a selected object * [[Image:Draft_WireToBSpline.png|32px]] [[Draft_WireToBSpline|Wire to BSpline]]: Converts a wire to a BSpline and vice-versa * [[Image:Draft_AddPoint.png|32px]] [[Draft_AddPoint|Add point]]: Adds a point to a wire or BSpline * [[Image:Draft_DelPoint.png|32px]] [[Draft_DelPoint|Delete point]]: Deletes a point from a wire or BSpline * [[Image:Draft_Shape2DView.png]] [[Draft_Shape2DView|Shape 2D View]]: Creates a 2D object which is a flattened 2D view of another 3D object * [[Image:Draft_Draft2Sketch.png|32px]] [[Draft_Draft2Sketch|Draft to Sketch]]: Converts a Draft object to Sketch and vice-versa * [[Image:Draft_Array.png|32px]] [[Draft_Array|Array]]: Creates a polar or rectangular array from selected objects * [[Image:Draft_PathArray.png|32px]] [[Draft_PathArray|Path Array]]: Creates an array of objects by placing the copies along a path * [[Image:Draft_Clone.png|32px]] [[Draft_Clone|Clone]]: Clones the selected objects
===Utility tools===
Additional tools available via right-click context menu, depending on the selected objects.
* [[Image:Draft_SelectPlane.png|32px]] [[Draft_SelectPlane|Set working plane]]: Sets a working plane from a standard view or a selected face * [[Image:Draft_FinishLine.png|32px]] [[Draft_FinishLine|Finish line]]: Ends the drawing of the current wire or bspline, without closing it * [[Image:Draft_CloseLine.png|32px]] [[Draft_CloseLine|Close line]]: Ends the drawing of the current wire or bspline, and closes it * [[Image:Draft_UndoLine.png|32px]] [[Draft_UndoLine|Undo line]]: Undoes the last segment of a line * [[Image:Draft_ToggleConstructionMode.png|32px]] [[Draft_ToggleConstructionMode|Toggle construction mode]]: Toggles the Draft construction mode on/off * [[Image:Draft_ToggleContinueMode.png|32px]] [[Draft_ToggleContinueMode|Toggle continue mode]]: Toggles the Draft continue mode on/off * [[Image:Draft_ApplyStyle.png|32px]] [[Draft_Apply|Apply style]]: Applies the current style and color to selected objects * [[Image:Draft_ToggleDisplayMode.png|32px]] [[Draft_ToggleDisplayMode|Toggle display mode]]: Switches the display mode of selected objects between "flat lines" and "wireframe" * [[Image:Draft_AddToGroup.png|32px]] [[Draft_AddToGroup|Add to group]]: Quickly adds selected objects to an existing group * [[Image:Draft_SelectGroup.png|32px]] [[Draft_SelectGroup|Select group contents]]: Selects the contents of a selected group * [[Image:Draft_ToggleSnap.png|32px]] [[Draft_ToggleSnap|Toggle snap]]: Toggles [[Draft Snap|object snapping]] on/off * [[Image:Draft_ToggleGrid.png|32px]] [[Draft_ToggleGrid|Toggle grid]]: Toggles the grid on/off * [[Image:Draft_ShowSnapBar.png|32px]] [[Draft_ShowSnapBar|Show snap bar]]: Shows/hides the [[Draft Snap|snapping]] toolbar * [[Image:Draft_Heal.png|32px]] [[Draft_Heal|Heal]]: Heals problematic Draft objects found in very old files * [[Image:Draft_FlipDimension.png|32px]] [[Draft_FlipDimension|Flip Dimension]]: Flips the orientation of the text of a [[Draft Dimension|dimension]] * [[Image:Draft_VisGroup.png|32px]] [[Draft_VisGroup|VisGroup]]: Creates a VisGroup in the current document <noinclude>[[Category:Template]]</noinclude>

===绘制对象===
下面是用于创建对象的工具。
* [[Image:Draft_Line.png]] [[Draft_Line|两点成线]]：用两个点绘制一条直线段 * [[Image:Draft_Wire.png]] [[Draft_Wire|折线 (多点成线)]]：绘制一条折线段 * [[Image:Draft_Circle.png]] [[Draft_Circle|圆]]：指定圆心与半径绘制圆 * [[Image:Draft_Arc.png]] [[Draft_Arc|圆弧]]：指定中心、半径、起始与终止角度绘制圆弧 * [[Image:Draft_Rectangle.png]] [[Draft_Rectangle|矩形]]：通过两个对角顶点绘制矩形 * [[Image:Draft_Polygon.png]] [[Draft_Polygon|多边形]]：通过中心与半径绘制正多边形 * [[Image:Draft_BSpline.png]] [[Draft_BSpline|B 样条曲线]]：通过一系列点绘制一条 B 样条曲线 * [[Image:Draft_Text.png]] [[Draft_Text|文本]]：绘制多行文本标注 * [[Image:Draft_Dimension.png]] [[Draft_Dimension|尺寸]]：绘制尺寸标注
===修改对象===
下面是一组可用于修改既有对象的工具。它们可处理被选中的对象，如果未有对象被选中，那么 FreeCAD 便会要求你选中欲修改的对象。
* [[Image:Draft_Move.png]] [[Draft_Move|平移]]：将一个对象或一组对象从一个位置移动到另一个位置 * [[Image:Draft_Rotate.png]] [[Draft_Rotate|旋转]]：将一个对象或一组对象围绕旋转轴从一个角度旋转到另一个角度 * [[Image:Draft_Offset.png]] [[Draft_Offset|偏置]]：将对象的各段按照给定的距离进行移动（译注：移动过程中仍保持各段的连接性，例如一个半径为 1 的圆，如果设定偏移距离为 1，那么结果是半径为 2 的圆，并且与偏移前的圆同心） * [[Image:Draft_Upgrade.png]] [[Draft_Upgrade|升级]]：将一些对象合并到更高层的对象 * [[Image:Draft_Downgrade.png]] [[Draft_Downgrade|降级]]：将对象分解为低层对象 * [[Image:Draft_Trimex.png]] [[Draft_Trimex|裁剪/延展]]: 裁剪或延伸一个对象 * [[Image:Draft_Scale.png]] [[Draft_Scale|缩放]]：围绕一个基准点缩放被选中的对象 * [[Image:Draft_Edit.png]] [[Draft_Edit|编辑]]：编译一个被选中的对象 * [[Image:Draft_PutOnSheet.png]] [[Draft_Drawing|制图]]：将所选中的对象写入[[Drawing Module|图纸]] * [[Image:Draft_Shape2DView.png]] [[Draft_Shape2DView|生成二维视图]]：由三维对象的二维投影生成制图对象 <noinclude>[[Category:Template/cn]]</noinclude>

===Zeichnen von Objekten===
Mit diesen Werkzeugen werden Objekte erstellt:
* [[Image:Draft_Line.png]] [[Draft_Line/de|2-Punkt Linie]]: Zeichnet ein Linien-segment zwischen 2 Punkten * [[Image:Draft_Wire.png]] [[Draft_Wire/de|Wire (Mehrpunkt-Linie)]]: Zeichnet eine Linie, die sich über mehrere Punkte fortsetzt * [[Image:Draft_Circle.png]] [[Draft_Circle/de|Kreis]]: Zeichnet einen Kreis ab dem Mittelpunkt mit einem Radius * [[Image:Draft_Arc.png]] [[Draft_Arc/de|Bogen]]: Zeichnet ein Bogen-segment aus Mitte,Radius, Startwinkel und Endwinkel * [[Image:Draft_Ellipse.png|32px]] [[Draft_Ellipse/de|Ellipse]]: Draws an ellipse from two corner points * [[Image:Draft_Polygon.png]] [[Draft_Polygon/de|Polygon]]: Zeichnet ein Mehreck ab dem Mittelpunkt mit einem Radius * [[Image:Draft_Rectangle.png]] [[Draft_Rectangle/de|Rechteck]]: Zeichnet ein Rechteck zwischen 2 gegenüberliegeden Punkten * [[Image:Draft_Text.png]] [[Draft_Text/de|Text]]: Erzeugt einen mehrzeiligen Texteintrag * [[Image:Draft_Dimension.png]] [[Draft_Dimension/de|Abmessung]]: Erzeugt einen Texteintrag als Maßangabe * [[Image:Draft_BSpline.png]] [[Draft_BSpline/de|BSpline]]: Zeichnet eine Kurve aus einer Serie von Punkten * [[Image:Draft_Point.png|32px]] [[Draft_Point/de|Punkt]]: Inserts a point object * [[Image:Draft_ShapeString.png|32px]] [[Draft_ShapeString/de|Shape from text...]]: The ShapeString tool inserts a compound shape * [[Image:Draft_Facebinder.png|32px]] [[Draft_Facebinder/de|Facebinder]]: Creates a new object from selected faces on existing objects * [[Image:Draft_BezCurve.png|32px]] [[Draft_BezCurve/de|Bezier Curve]]: Draws a Bezier curve from a series of points
===Objekte ändern===
Mit diesen Werkzeugen kann man Objekte verändern. Sie wirken auf angewählte Objekte, ist kein Objekt gewählt, werden Sie aufgefordert mindestens eins auszuwählen.
* [[Image:Draft_Move.png]] [[Draft_Move/de|Verschieben]]: Bewegt Objekt(e) von einem Punkt zu einem anderen * [[Image:Draft_Rotate.png]] [[Draft_Rotate/de|Drehen]]: Rotiert Objekt(e) von einem Ausgangswinkel zu einem Endwinkel * [[Image:Draft_Offset.png]] [[Draft_Offset/de|Versetzen]]: Bewegt Segmente eines Objekts um einen bestimmten Wert * [[Image:Draft_Trimex.png]] [[Draft_Trimex/de|Trim/Extend (Trimex)]]: Beschneidet oder Erweitert ein Objekt * [[Image:Draft_Upgrade.png]] [[Draft_Upgrade/de|Hochstufen]]: Vereinigt mehrere Objekte in ein Objekt der nächst höheren Ebene * [[Image:Draft_Downgrade.png]] [[Draft_Downgrade/de|Herabstufen]]: Teilt ein Objekt in einzelne der nächst niedrigeren Ebene * [[Image:Draft_Scale.png]] [[Draft_Scale/de|Skalieren]]: Dimensioniert ein ausgewähltes Objekt in Bezug zu einem bestimmten Punkt * [[Image:Draft_PutOnSheet.png]] [[Draft_Drawing/de|Zeichnung]]: Überträgt ausgewählte Objekte in eine [[Drawing Module/de|2D-Zeichnung]] * [[Image:Draft_Edit.png]] [[Draft_Edit/de|Bearbeiten]]: Verändert ein ausgewähltes Objekt * [[Image:Draft_WireToBSpline.png|32px]] [[Draft_WireToBSpline/de|Wire to BSpline]]: Converts a wire to a BSpline and vice-versa * [[Image:Draft_AddPoint.png|32px]] [[Draft_AddPoint/de|Punkt hinzufugen]]: Adds a point to a wire or BSpline * [[Image:Draft_DelPoint.png|32px]] [[Draft_DelPoint/de|Punkt entfernen]]: Deletes a point from a wire or BSpline * [[Image:Draft_Shape2DView.png]] [[Draft_Shape2DView/de|Form in 2D Ansicht]]: Creates a 2D object which is a flattened 2D view of another 3D object * [[Image:Draft_Draft2Sketch.png|32px]] [[Draft_Draft2Sketch/de|Entwurf zu Skizze]]: Converts a Draft object to Sketch and vice-versa * [[Image:Draft_Array.png|32px]] [[Draft_Array/de|Anordnung]]: Creates a polar or rectangular array from selected objects * [[Image:Draft_PathArray.png|32px]] [[Draft_PathArray/de|Path Array]]: Creates an array of objects by placing the copies along a path * [[Image:Draft_Clone.png|32px]] [[Draft_Clone/de|Klonen]]: Clones the selected objects
===Utility tools===
Additional tools available via right-click context menu, depending on the selected objects.
* [[Image:Draft_SelectPlane.png|32px]] [[Draft_SelectPlane/de|Ebene markieren]]: Sets a working plane from a standard view or a selected face * [[Image:Draft_FinishLine.png|32px]] [[Draft_FinishLine/de|Linie beenden]]: Ends the drawing of the current wire or bspline, without closing it * [[Image:Draft_CloseLine.png|32px]] [[Draft_CloseLine/de|Close line]]: Ends the drawing of the current wire or bspline, and closes it * [[Image:Draft_UndoLine.png|32px]] [[Draft_UndoLine/de|Undo line]]: Undoes the last segment of a line * [[Image:Draft_ToggleConstructionMode.png|32px]] [[Draft_ToggleConstructionMode/de|Konstruktionsmodus umschalten]]: Toggles the Draft construction mode on/off * [[Image:Draft_ToggleContinueMode.png|32px]] [[Draft_ToggleContinueMode/de|Toggle continue mode]]: Toggles the Draft continue mode on/off * [[Image:Draft_ApplyStyle.png|32px]] [[Draft_Apply/de|Aktuellen Style anwenden]]: Applies the current style and color to selected objects * [[Image:Draft_ToggleDisplayMode.png|32px]] [[Draft_ToggleDisplayMode/de|Anzeige-Modus unschalten]]: Switches the display mode of selected objects between "flat lines" and "wireframe" * [[Image:Draft_AddToGroup.png|32px]] [[Draft_AddToGroup/de|Zur Gruppe hinzufugen]]: Quickly adds selected objects to an existing group * [[Image:Draft_SelectGroup.png|32px]] [[Draft_SelectGroup/de|Wahle Gruppe]]: Selects the contents of a selected group * [[Image:Draft_ToggleSnap.png|32px]] [[Draft_ToggleSnap/de|Toggle snap]]: Toggles [[Draft Snap|object snapping]] on/off * [[Image:Draft_ToggleGrid.png|32px]] [[Draft_ToggleGrid/de|Gitternetz umschalten]]: Toggles the grid on/off * [[Image:Draft_ShowSnapBar.png|32px]] [[Draft_ShowSnapBar/de|Show snap bar]]: Shows/hides the [[Draft Snap|snapping]] toolbar * [[Image:Draft_Heal.png|32px]] [[Draft_Heal/de|Heal]]: Heals problematic Draft objects found in very old files * [[Image:Draft_FlipDimension.png|32px]] ===Dibujando objetos===
Estas son las herramientas para crear objetos.
* [[Image:Draft_Line.png]] [[Draft_Line/es|Línea de 2 puntos]]: Dibuja un segmento de línea entre 2 puntos * [[Image:Draft_Wire.png]] [[Draft_Wire/es|Polilínea (Línea de múltiples puntos)]]: Dibuja una polilínea compuesta por múltiples segmentos de línea * [[Image:Draft_Circle.png]] [[Draft_Circle/es|Circunferencia]]: Dibuja una circunferencia a partir de su centro y radio * [[Image:Draft_Arc.png]] [[Draft_Arc/es|Arco]]: Dibuja un segmento de arco a partir de su centro, radio ángulo de inicio y ángulo final * [[Image:Draft_Rectangle.png]] [[Draft_Rectangle/es|Rectángulo]]: Dibuja un rectángulo a partir de 2 puntos de su diagonal * [[Image:Draft_Polygon.png]] [[Draft_Polygon/es|Polígono]]: Dibuja un polígono regular a partir del centro y radio de la circunferencia que lo circunscribe * [[Image:Draft_BSpline.png]] [[Draft_BSpline/es|BSpline]]: Dibuja una B-Spline a partir de una serie de puntos * [[Image:Draft_Text.png]] [[Draft_Text/es|Texto]]: Dibuja una anotación de múltiples líneas de texto * [[Image:Draft_Dimension.png]] [[Draft_Dimension/es|Cota]]: Dibuja una cota dimensional * [[Image:Draft_Point.png|32px]] [[Draft_Point/es|Punto]]: Inserta un objeto punto
===Modificando objetos===
Estas son las herramientas para la edición de los objetos existentes. Trabajan sobre los objetos seleccionados, pero si no hay ningún objeto seleccionado, permiten seleccionar uno.
* [[Image:Draft_Move.png]] [[Draft_Move/es|Desplazar]]: Desplaza objeto(s) desde una ubicación a otra * [[Image:Draft_Rotate.png]] [[Draft_Rotate/es|Girar]]: Gira objeto(s) desde un ángulo de inicio a un ángulo final * [[Image:Draft_Offset.png]] [[Draft_Offset/es|Equidistancia]]: Mueve segmentos de un objeto a cierta distancia * [[Image:Draft_Upgrade.png]] [[Draft_Upgrade/es|Promocionar]]: Une objetos en un objeto de nivel superior * [[Image:Draft_Downgrade.png]] [[Draft_Downgrade/es|Degradar]]: Descompone objetos en objetos de nivel inferior * [[Image:Draft_Trimex.png]] [[Draft_Trimex/es|Recortar/Extender]]: Recorta o extiende un objeto * [[Image:Draft_Scale.png]] [[Draft_Scale/es|Escalar]]: Escala los objetos seleccionados alrededor de un punto base * [[Image:Draft_Edit.png]] [[Draft_Edit/es|Editar]]: Edita un objeto seleccionado * [[Image:Draft_PutOnSheet.png]] [[Draft_Drawing/es|Dibujar]]: Escribe los objetos seleccionados en una [[Drawing Module/es|Hoja de dibujo]] * [[Image:Draft_Shape2DView.png]] [[Draft_Shape2DView/es|Shape 2D View]]: Crea un objeto 2D que es la vista 2D proyectada de otro objeto 3D * [[Image:Draft_WireToBSpline.png|32px]] [[Draft_WireToBSpline/es|Contorno a BSpline]]: Convierte un contorno a BSpline y viceversa * [[Image:Draft_AddPoint.png|32px]] [[Draft_AddPoint/es|Añadir punto]]: Añade un punto a un contorno o una BSpline * [[Image:Draft_DelPoint.png|32px]] [[Draft_DelPoint/es|Borrar punto]]: Borra un punto de un contorno o BSpline * [[Image:Draft_Draft2Sketch.png|32px]] [[Draft_Draft2Sketch/es|Boceto a croquis]]: Convierte un objeto de Boceto a Croquis y viceversa * [[Image:Draft_Array.png|32px]] [[Draft_Array/es|Matriz]]: Crea una matriz polar o rectangular a partir de los objetos seleccionados * [[Image:Draft_Clone.png|32px]] [[Draft_Clone/es|Clonar]]: Clona los objetos seleccionados
===Herramientas de utilidad===
Herramientas adicionales disponibles desde el menú contextual del botón derecho del ratón, dependiendo de los objetos seleccionados.
* [[Image:Draft_SelectPlane.png|32px]] [[Draft_SelectPlane/es|Establecer plano de trabajo]]: Establece un plano de trabajo a partir de una vista estándar o una cara seleccionada * [[Image:Draft_FinishLine.png|32px]] [[Draft_FinishLine/es|Línea final]]: Termina el dibujo del contorno o BSpline actual, sin cerrarlo * [[Image:Draft_CloseLine.png|32px]] [[Draft_CloseLine/es|Línea de cierre]]: Termina el dibujo del contorno o BSpline actual, cerrándolo * [[Image:Draft_UndoLine.png|32px]] [[Draft_UndoLine/es|Deshacer línea]]: Deshace el último segmento de línea * [[Image:Draft_ToggleConstructionMode.png|32px]] [[Draft_ToggleConstructionMode/es|Conmutar modo de construcción]]: Conmuta el modo de construcción del Boceto activado / desactivado * [[Image:Draft_ToggleContinueMode.png|32px]] [[Draft_ToggleContinueMode/es|Conmutar modo continuo]]: Conmuta el modo continuo de Boceto activado / desactivado * [[Image:Draft_ApplyStyle.png|32px]] [[Draft_Apply/es|Aplicar estilo]]: Aplica el estilo actual y el color a los objetos seleccionados * [[Image:Draft_ToggleDisplayMode.png|32px]] [[Draft_ToggleDisplayMode/es|Conmuta el modo de visualización]]: Alterna el modo de visualización de los objetos seleccionados entre "líneas planas" y "alámbrico" * [[Image:Draft_AddToGroup.png|32px]] [[Draft_AddToGroup/es|Añadir a grupo]]: Añade rápidamente los objetos seleccionados a un grupo existente * [[Image:Draft_SelectGroup.png|32px]] [[Draft_SelectGroup/es|Seleccionar contenido de grupo]]: Selecciona el contenido de un grupo seleccionado * [[Image:Draft_ToggleSnap.png|32px]] [[Draft_ToggleSnap/es|Conmutar ajuste]]: Conmuta el [[Draft Snap/es|ajuste]] a objetos activado / desactivado * [[Image:Draft_ToggleGrid.png|32px]] [[Draft_ToggleGrid/es|Conmutar rejilla]]: Conmuta la rejilla del Boceto activado / desactivado * [[Image:Draft_ShowSnapBar.png|32px]] [[Draft_ShowSnapBar/es|Mostrar barra de ajuste]]: Muestra / oculta la barra de herramientas de [[Draft Snap/es|ajuste]] del Boceto <noinclude>[[Category:Template/es]]</noinclude>

===Dessin d'objets===
Ce sont les outils de création d'objets.
* [[Image:Draft_Line.png]] [[Draft_Line/fr|Ligne]] : Trace un segment de ligne à partir de 2 points * [[Image:Draft_Wire.png]] [[Draft_Wire/fr|Filaire]] : Trace une ligne composée de plusieurs segments de lignes * [[Image:Draft_Circle.png]] [[Draft_Circle/fr|Cercle]] : Trace un cercle à partir du centre et du rayon * [[Image:Draft_Arc.png]] [[Draft_Arc/fr|Arc]] : Trace un segment d'arc à partir du centre, rayon, angle de départ et angle d'arrivée * [[Image:Draft_Polygon.png]] [[Draft_Polygon/fr|Polygone]] : Dessine un polygone régulier à partir du centre et du rayon * [[Image:Draft_Rectangle.png]] [[Draft_Rectangle/fr|Rectangle]] : Trace un rectangle à partir de 2 points opposés * [[Image:Draft_Text.png]] [[Draft_Text/fr|Texte]] : Dessine une note en texte multiligne * [[Image:Draft_Dimension.png]] [[Draft_Dimension/fr|Cote]] : Trace une cote * [[Image:Draft_BSpline.png]] [[Draft_BSpline/fr|B-Spline]] : Dessine une courbe B-Spline à partir d'une série de points * [[Image:Draft_Point.png|32px]] [[Draft_Point/fr|Point]] : Insère un objet point * [[Image:Draft_ShapeString.png|32px]] [[Draft_ShapeString/fr|ShapeString]] : L'outil ShapeString insère une forme composée, qui représente une chaîne de texte * [[Image:Draft_Ellipse.png|32px]] [[Draft_Ellipse/fr|Ellipse]] : Dessine une ellipse à partir de deux points opposés (coins) * [[Image:Draft_Facebinder.png|32px]] [[Draft_Facebinder/fr|Contraindre des faces]] : Crée un nouvel objet sur la face de l'objet sélectionné
===Édition d'objets===
Ces outils permettent de modifier des objets existants. Ils fonctionnent sur les objets sélectionnés, s'il n'y a aucune sélection, vous serez invité à en faire une.
* [[Image:Draft_Move.png]] [[Draft_Move/fr|Déplacer]] : Déplace l'objet (ou les objets) d'un emplacement à un autre * [[Image:Draft_Rotate.png]] [[Draft_Rotate/fr|Rotation]] : Pivote l'objet (ou les objets) d'un angle de départ à un angle d'arrivée * [[Image:Draft_Offset.png]] [[Draft_Offset/fr|Décalage]] : Déplace les segments d'un objet à une certaine distance * [[Image:Draft_Trimex.png]] [[Draft_Trimex/fr|Découper/prolonger (Trimex)]] : Découpe ou prolonge un objet * [[Image:Draft_Upgrade.png]] [[Draft_Upgrade/fr|Mettre à niveau]] : Joint des objets en un objet de plus haut niveau * [[Image:Draft_Downgrade.png]] [[Draft_Downgrade/fr|Rétrograder]] : Explose des objets en objets de niveau inférieur * [[Image:Draft_Scale.png]] [[Draft_Scale/fr|Redimensionner]] : Redimensionne l'objet (ou les objets) sélectionné(s) à partir d'un point de base * [[Image:Draft_PutOnSheet.png]] [[Draft_Drawing/fr|Feuille de dessin]] : Copie les objets sélectionnés vers une [[Drawing Module/fr|feuille de dessin]] * [[Image:Draft_Edit.png]] [[Draft_Edit/fr|Éditer]] : Édite un objet sélectionné * [[Image:Draft_WireToBSpline.png|32px]] [[Draft_WireToBSpline/fr|Filaire vers B-Spline]] : Convertit un filaire (Wire) en une courbe B-Spline et vice versa * [[Image:Draft_AddPoint.png|32px]] [[Draft_AddPoint/fr|Ajouter un point]] : Ajoute un point à un filaire (Wire) ou une courbe B-Spline * [[Image:Draft_DelPoint.png|32px]] [[Draft_DelPoint/fr|Effacer un point]] : Supprime un point d'un filaire (Wire) ou courbe B-Spline * [[Image:Draft_Shape2DView.png]] [[Draft_Shape2DView/fr|Projection 2D]] : Génère une projection 2D à partir d'un objet 3D * [[Image:Draft_Draft2Sketch.png|32px]] [[Draft_Draft2Sketch/fr|Draft vers Esquisse]] : Convertit un objet Draft en esquisse (Sketcher) et vice versa * [[Image:Draft_Array.png|32px]] [[Draft_Array/fr|Réseau]] : Crée une matrice polaire ou rectangulaire de l'objet sélectionné * [[Image:Draft_Clone.png|32px]] [[Draft_Clone/fr|Clone]] : Clone les objets sélectionnés * [[Image:Draft_PathArray.png|32px]] [[Draft_PathArray/fr|Matrice de copies]] : Crée une série d'objets le long d'un tracé (chemin)
===Outils utilitaires===
Outils supplémentaires, disponibles via le menu contextuel, selon les objets sélectionnés.
* [[Image:Draft_SelectPlane.png|32px]] [[Draft_SelectPlane/fr|Plan de travail]] : Définit un plan de travail d'un point de vue standard, ou d'une face sélectionnée * [[Image:Draft_FinishLine.png|32px]] [[Draft_FinishLine/fr|Terminer la ligne]] : Termine le dessin du filaire (wire) actuel ou courbe B-Spline, sans le refermer * [[Image:Draft_CloseLine.png|32px]] [[Draft_CloseLine/fr|Fermer la ligne]] : Termine le dessin du filaire (wire) actuel ou courbe B-Spline et le ferme à la fin de l'opération * [[Image:Draft_UndoLine.png|32px]] [[Draft_UndoLine/fr|Annuler le dernier segment]] : Annule le dernier segment de la ligne * [[Image:Draft_ToggleConstructionMode.png|32px]] [[Draft_ToggleConstructionMode/fr|Basculer en mode construction]] : Active ou désactive le mode construction du croquis * [[Image:Draft_ToggleContinueMode.png|32px]] [[Draft_ToggleContinueMode/fr|Inverse le mode continuer]] : Active ou désactive le mode continuer le projet * [[Image:Draft_ApplyStyle.png|32px]] [[Draft_Apply/fr|Appliquer le style actuel]] : Applique le style actuel et la couleur aux objets sélectionnés * [[Image:Draft_ToggleDisplayMode.png|32px]] [[Draft_ToggleDisplayMode/fr|Bascule le mode d'affichage]] : Bascule le mode d'affichage des objets sélectionnés entre « Flat Lines » et « Wireframe » (mode filaire). * [[Image:Draft_AddToGroup.png|32px]] [[Draft_AddToGroup/fr|Ajouter au groupe]] : Ajoute rapidement les objets sélectionnés à un groupe existant * [[Image:Draft_SelectGroup.png|32px]] [[Draft_SelectGroup/fr|Sélectionner le groupe]] : Sélectionne le contenu d'un groupe sélectionné * [[Image:Snap_Lock.png|32px|text-top=Lock|link=Draft_Snap/fr]] [[Draft_Snap/fr|Activer/désactiver]] : Active ou désactive globalement les fonctions d’accrochage. * [[Image:Snap_Grid.png|32px|text-top=Grille|link=Draft_Snap/fr]] [[Draft_Snap/fr|Grille]] : Active ou désactive le mode grille. * [[Image:Draft_ShowSnapBar.png|32px|text-top=O/N la barre d'outil|link=Draft_Snap/fr]] [[Draft_Snap/fr|Montrer la barre d'accrochage]] : Active ou désactive la barre d'outils d'accrochages * [[Image:Draft_Heal.png|32px]] [[Draft_Heal/fr|Réparer]] : Répare les objets problématiques contenus dans les très vieux fichiers * [[Image:Draft_FlipDimension.png|32px]] [[Draft_FlipDimension/fr|Inverser la direction de la cote]] : Permet d'inverser l'orientation du texte d'une [[Draft Dimension/fr|cote]] <noinclude>[[Category:Template/fr]]</noinclude>

* [[Draft_Select/it|Seleziona]]: Alcune informazioni utili per selezionare gli oggetti e le loro parti
==== Strumenti per disegnare oggetti ====
Questi sono gli strumenti per creare gli oggetti
* [[Image:Draft_Line.png]] [[Draft_Line/it|Linea]]: Disegna un segmento delimitato da due punti. * [[Image:Draft_Wire.png]] [[Draft_Wire/it|DWire]]: Disegna una spezzata o polilinea specificando tutti i punti intermedi. * [[Image:Draft_Circle.png]] [[Draft_Circle/it|Cerchio]]: Disegna una circonferenza prendendo in input il centro e il raggio. * [[Image:Draft_Arc.png]] [[Draft_Arc/it|Arco]]: Disegna un arco di circonferenza a partire dal centro e specificando il raggio, l'angolo iniziale e l'angolo finale. * [[Image:Draft_Ellipse.png|32px]] [[Draft_Ellipse/it|Ellisse]]: Disegna una ellisse. * [[Image:Draft_Polygon.png]] [[Draft_Polygon/it|Poligono]]: Disegna un poligono regolare a partire da centro e raggio. * [[Image:Draft_Rectangle.png]] [[Draft_Rectangle/it|Rettangolo]]: Disegna un rettangolo specificando gli angoli opposti. * [[Image:Draft_Text.png]] [[Draft_Text/it|Testo]]: Disegna delle annotazioni multilinea. * [[Image:Draft_Dimension.png]] [[Draft_Dimension/it|Quota]]: Aggiunge la quotatura. * [[Image:Draft_BSpline.png]] [[Draft_BSpline/it|B-Spline]]: Interpola una traiettoria curvilinea passante per i punti specificati. * [[Image:Draft_Point.png|32px]] [[Draft_Point/it|Punto]]: Inserisce un oggetto punto. * [[Image:Draft_ShapeString.png|32px]] [[Draft_ShapeString/it|ShapeString]]: inserisce una forma composta da una stringa di testo. * [[Image:Draft_Facebinder.png|32px]] [[Draft_Facebinder/it|Facebinder]]: crea un nuovo oggetto costituito dalle facce selezionate in una forma. * [[Image:Draft_BezCurve.png|32px]] [[Draft_BezCurve/it|Curva di Bezier]]: Disegna curve di Bezier su una serie di punti
==== Strumenti per modificare gli oggetti ====
Si tratta degli strumenti per la modifica di oggetti esistenti. Lavorano su oggetti selezionati precedentemente, quando nessun oggetto è selezionato, si viene invitati a scegliere uno.
* [[Image:Draft_Move.png]] [[Draft_Move/it|Sposta]]: Sposta un o più oggetti da una posizione a un'altra * [[Image:Draft_Rotate.png]] [[Draft_Rotate/it|Ruota]]: Ruota uno o più oggetti da un angolo di partenza a un angolo finale * [[Image:Draft_Offset.png]] [[Draft_Offset/it|Scosta]]: Duplica e scosta in modo equidistante i componenti di un oggetto * [[Image:Draft_Trimex.png]] [[Draft_Trimex/it|Taglia/Estendi]]: Accorcia o estende (estrude) l'oggetto selezionato * [[Image:Draft_Upgrade.png]] [[Draft_Upgrade/it|Assembla]]: Unisce gli oggetti in un oggetto di livello superiore * [[Image:Draft_Downgrade.png]] [[Draft_Downgrade/it|Scomponi]]: Scompone gli oggetti in oggetti di livello inferiore * [[Image:Draft_Scale.png]] [[Draft_Scale/it|Scala]]: Scala gli oggetti in relazione a un punto base * [[Image:Draft_PutOnSheet.png]] [[Draft_Drawing/it|Disegno]]: Traspone gli oggetti in un [[Drawing Module/it|Foglio di disegno]] * [[Image:Draft_Edit.png]] [[Draft_Edit/it|Modifica]]: Consente di modificare un oggetto * [[Image:Draft_WireToBSpline.png|32px]] [[Draft_WireToBSpline/it|Da Wire a BSpline]]: Converte i segmenti di una linea spezzata (Wire) in curve di una linea BSpline e viceversa * [[Image:Draft_AddPoint.png|32px]] [[Draft_AddPoint/it|Aggiungi punto]]: Aggiunge un punto a una linea spezzata o a una BSpline * [[Image:Draft_DelPoint.png|32px]] [[Draft_DelPoint/it|Elimina punto]]: Elimina un punto da una spezzzata o da una BSpline * [[Image:Draft_Shape2DView.png]] [[Draft_Shape2DView/it|Vista 2D]]: Crea un oggetto 2D quale proiezione di un oggetto 3D * [[Image:Draft_Draft2Sketch.png|32px]] [[Draft_Draft2Sketch/it|Da Draft a Schizzo]]: Converte un oggetto di Draft in un oggetto di Schizzo e viceversa * [[Image:Draft_Array.png|32px]] [[Draft_Array/it|Schiera]]: Duplica e crea una schiera a matrice polare o rettangolare degli oggetti selezionati * [[Image:Draft_PathArray.png|32px]] [[Draft_PathArray/it|Path Array]]: Crea delle copie dell'oggetto selezionato distribuite su un percorso * [[Image:Draft_Clone.png|32px]] [[Draft_Clone/it|Clona]]: Clona gli oggetti selezionati
==== Strumenti di utilità ====
Ulteriori strumenti disponibili tramite il menu contestuale del tasto destro, a seconda degli oggetti selezionati.
* [[Image:Draft_SelectPlane.png|32px]] [[Draft_SelectPlane/it|Piano di lavoro]]: Consente di impostare un piano di lavoro da una vista standard o da una faccia selezionata * [[Image:Draft_FinishLine.png|32px]] [[Draft_FinishLine/it|Termina]]: Termina il disegno della polilinea o della BSpline corrente senza chiuderla * [[Image:Draft_CloseLine.png|32px]] [[Draft_CloseLine/it|Chiudi]]: Termina il disegno della polilinea o della BSpline corrente chiudendola * [[Image:Draft_UndoLine.png|32px]] [[Draft_UndoLine/it|Annulla]]: Annulla l'ultimo segmento della linea * [[Image:Draft_ToggleConstructionMode.png|32px]] [[Draft_ToggleConstructionMode/it|Modalità Costruzione]]: Attiva o disattiva la modalità "Disegno di Costruzione" * [[Image:Draft_ToggleContinueMode.png|32px]] [[Draft_ToggleContinueMode/it|Modalità Continua]]: Attiva o disattiva la modalità "Continua con lo stesso strumento" * [[Image:Draft_ApplyStyle.png|32px]] [[Draft_Apply/it|Applica stile]]: Applica lo stile e il colore attuale agli oggetti selezionati * [[Image:Draft_ToggleDisplayMode.png|32px]] [[Draft_ToggleDisplayMode/it|Visualizzazione]]: Commuta la modalità di visualizzazione degli oggetti selezionati da "flat lines" a "wireframe" (da facce a linee) * [[Image:Draft_AddToGroup.png|32px]] [[Draft_AddToGroup/it|Aggiungi al gruppo]]: Aggiunge rapidamente gli oggetti selezionati a un gruppo esistente * [[Image:Draft_SelectGroup.png|32px]] [[Draft_SelectGroup/it|Seleziona il contenuto del gruppo]]: Seleziona il contenuto di un gruppo selezionato * [[Image:Draft_ToggleSnap.png|32px]] [[Draft_ToggleSnap/it|Aggancia]]: Attiva o disattiva la funzione di [[Draft Snap/it|ancoraggio]] (snap) agli oggetti * [[Image:Draft_ToggleGrid.png|32px]] [[Draft_ToggleGrid/it|Griglia]]: Attiva o disattiva la griglia di Draft * [[Image:Draft_ShowSnapBar.png|32px]] [[Draft_ShowSnapBar/it|Barra di snap]]: Mostra o nasconde la barra degli strumenti di [[Draft Snap/it|ancoraggio]] di Draft * [[Image:Draft_Heal.png|32px]] [[Draft_Heal/it|Heal]]: Risolve i problemi individuati negli oggetti di Draft in file molto vecchi * [[Image:Draft_FlipDimension.png|32px]] [[Draft_FlipDimension/it|Flip Dimension]]: Inverte l'orientamento del testo di una [[Draft Dimension/it|dimensione]] * [[Image:Draft_VisGroup.png|32px]] [[Draft_VisGroup/it|VisGroup]]: Crea un VisGroup nel documento corrente <noinclude>[[Category:Administration/it]] [[Category:Template/it]]</noinclude>

===作図オブジェクト===
オブジェクトを作成するためのツールです。
*[[File:Draft_Line.png]] [[Draft_Line/jp|2点線分]]: 2点からなる線分を描きます *[[File:Draft_Wire.png]] [[Draft_Wire/jp|ワイヤー（複数の点からなる線分）]]: 複数点の線分で作られる線を描きます *[[File:Draft_Circle.png]] [[Draft_Circle/jp|円]]: 中心と半径から円を描きます *[[File:Draft_Arc.png]] [[Draft_Arc/jp|円弧]]: 中心、半径、開始角度と終了角度から円弧を描きます *[[File:Draft_Rectangle.png]] [[Draft_Rectangle/jp|四角形]]: ２つの対点から四角形を描きます *[[Image:Draft_Polygon.png]] [[Draft_Polygon/jp|多角形]]: 中心と半径から正多角形を描きます *[[Image:Draft_BSpline.png]] [[Draft_BSpline/jp|B-スプライン]]: 点列からB-スプラインを描きます *[[File:Draft_Text.png]] [[Draft_Text/jp|テキスト]]: 複数行のテキストの注釈を描きます *[[File:Draft_Dimension.png]] [[Draft_Dimension/jp|寸法]]: 寸法の注釈を描きます *[[Image:Draft_Point.png|32px]] [[Draft_Point/jp|点]]: 点オブジェクトを挿入します
===オブジェクトの変更===
既存のオブジェクトを変更するためのツールです。これらのツールは選択したオブジェクトに対して動作します。もしオブジェクトを選択していない場合にはオブジェクトを選択するように促します。
*[[File:Draft_Move.png]] [[Draft_Move/jp|移動]]: オブジェクト（複数可）をある位置から別の位置へ移動します *[[File:Draft_Rotate.png]] [[Draft_Rotate/jp|回転]]: 開始角から終了角へのオブジェクト（複数可）を回転します *[[File:Draft_Offset.png]] [[Draft_Offset/jp|オフセット]]: オブジェクトの線分を一定の距離だけ移動します *[[File:Draft_Upgrade.png]] [[Draft_Upgrade/jp|アップグレード]]: オブジェクトを結合し、1階層上のオブジェクトにします *[[File:Draft_Downgrade.png]] [[Draft_Downgrade/jp|ダウングレード]]: オブジェクトを解体し、1階層下のオブジェクトにします *[[File:Draft_Trimex.png]] [[Draft_Trimex/jp|トリム/延長]]: オブジェクトをトリムまたは延長します *[[File:Draft_Scale.png]] [[Draft_Scale/jp|スケール]]: 選択したオブジェクト（複数可）を基点を中心にスケールします *[[File:Draft_Edit.png]] [[Draft_Edit/jp|編集]]: 選択したオブジェクトを編集します *[[Image:Draft_PutOnSheet.png]] [[Draft_Drawing/jp|ドローイング]]: 選択されたオブジェクトを[[Drawing Module/jp|ドローイングシート]]に書き込みます *[[Image:Draft_Shape2DView.png]] [[Draft_Shape2DView/jp|2Dビュー成形]]: 別の3Dオブジェクトの平面化2Dビューであるような2Dオブジェクトを作成します *[[Image:Draft_WireToBSpline.png|32px]] [[Draft_WireToBSpline/jp|ワイヤーからB-スプラインへ]]: ワイヤーからB-スプラインへの変換、またその逆変換を行います *[[Image:Draft_AddPoint.png|32px]] [[Draft_AddPoint/jp|点の追加]]: ワイヤーまたはB-スプラインへ点を追加します *[[Image:Draft_DelPoint.png|32px]] [[Draft_DelPoint/jp|点の削除]]: ワイヤーまたはB-スプラインから点を削除します *[[Image:Draft_Draft2Sketch.png|32px]] [[Draft_Draft2Sketch/jp|ドラフトからスケッチへ]]: ドラフトオブジェクトからスケッチへの変換、またその逆変換を行います *[[Image:Draft_Array.png|32px]] [[Draft_Array/jp|配列]]: 選択されたオブジェクトを円形または矩形に並べた配列を作成します *[[Image:Draft_Clone.png|32px]] [[Draft_Clone/jp|複製]]: 選択されたオブジェクトを複製します
===ユーティリティーツール===
右クリックのコンテキストメニューから利用可能な追加ツールです。選択されているオブジェクトに依存して変わります。
* [[Image:Draft_SelectPlane.png|32px]] [[Draft_SelectPlane/jp|作業平面の設定]]: 標準ビューまたは選択された面から作業平面を設定します * [[Image:Draft_FinishLine.png|32px]] [[Draft_FinishLine/jp|ラインを終了]]: ワイヤー、B-スプラインの描画をラインが閉じないで終了します * [[Image:Draft_CloseLine.png|32px]] [[Draft_CloseLine/jp|ラインを閉じる]]: ワイヤー、B-スプラインの描画をラインを閉じて終了します * [[Image:Draft_UndoLine.png|32px]] [[Draft_UndoLine/jp|ラインをアンドゥ]]: ラインの最後の区間をアンドゥします * [[Image:Draft_ToggleConstructionMode.png|32px]] [[Draft_ToggleConstructionMode/jp|作成モードの切り替え]]: ドラフト作成モードのオン/オフを切り替えます * [[Image:Draft_ToggleContinueMode.png|32px]] [[Draft_ToggleContinueMode/jp|継続モードの切り替え]]: ドラフト継続モードのオン/オフを切り替えます * [[Image:Draft_ApplyStyle.png|32px]] [[Draft_Apply/jp|スタイルを適用]]: 選択されたオブジェクトに現在のスタイルと色を適用します * [[Image:Draft_ToggleDisplayMode.png|32px]] [[Draft_ToggleDisplayMode/jp|表示モードの切り替え]]: 選択されたオブジェクトの表示モードを"フラットライン"または"ワイヤーフレーム"に切り替えます * [[Image:Draft_AddToGroup.png|32px]] [[Draft_AddToGroup/jp|グループに追加]]: ただちに選択されたオブジェクトを既存のグループに追加します * [[Image:Draft_SelectGroup.png|32px]] [[Draft_SelectGroup/jp|グループの中身を選択]]: 選択されたグループの中身を選択します * [[Image:Draft_ToggleSnap.png|32px]] [[Draft_ToggleSnap/jp|スナップの切り替え]]: [[Draft Snap/jp|オブジェクトのスナップ]]のオン/オフを切り替えます * [[Image:Draft_ToggleGrid.png|32px]] [[Draft_ToggleGrid/jp|グリッドの切り替え]]: グリッドのオン/オフを切り替えます * [[Image:Draft_ShowSnapBar.png|32px]] [[Draft_ShowSnapBar/jp|スナップバーを表示]]: [[Draft Snap/jp|スナップ]]ツールバーの表示/非表示を切り替えます <noinclude>[[Category:Template/jp]]</noinclude>

===Ustawienia pracy===
Narzędzia konfigurujące twoje środowisko robocze.
* [[Image:Draft_Workingplane.svg|32px]] [[Draft SelectPlane/pl|Płaszczyzna robocza]]: Ustawia płaszczyznę roboczą dla kolejnych operacji
===Rysowanie obiektów===
Narzędzia do tworzenia obiektów.
* [[Image:Draft_Line.png]] [[Draft_Line/pl|Dwupunktowa linia]]: Rysuje odcinek pomiędzy dwoma punktami * [[Image:Draft_Polyline.png]] [[Draft Wire/pl|wielopunktowa linia (Polilinia)]]: Rysuje łamaną składającą się z wielu odcinków (pomiędzy wieloma punktami) * [[Image:Draft_Circle.png]] [[Draft_Circle/pl|Okrąg]]: Rysuje okrąg bazując na środku i promieniu * [[Image:Draft_Arc.png]] [[Draft_Arc/pl|Łuk]]: rysuje łuk na bazie środka, promienia, kąta początkowego i kąta końcowego * [[Image:Draft_Rectangle.png]] [[Draft_Rectangle/pl|Prostokąt]]: Rysuje prostokąt na bazie dwóch przeciwległych punktów * [[Image:Draft_Text.png]] [[Draft_Text/pl|Tekst]]: Rysuje wieloliniową adnotację tekstową * [[Image:Draft_Dimension.png]] [[Draft_Dimension/pl|Wymiar]]: Rysuje linię wymiarową
===Modyfikowanie obiektów===
Narzędzia do modyfikacji istniejących obiektów. Pracują na zaznaczonych obiektach, jeśli żaden nie jest zaznaczony, zostaniesz poproszony o zaznaczenie.
* [[Image:Draft_Move.png]] [[Draft_Move/pl|Przesuń]]: Przesuwa obiekty z jednego miejsca do drugiego * [[Image:Draft_Rotate.png]] [[Draft_Rotate/pl|Obróć]]: Obraca obiekty od kąta początkowego do końcowego * [[Image:Draft_Offset.png]] [[Draft_Offset/pl|Odsuń]]: Przenosi segmenty obiektu o określoną odległość * [[Image:Draft_Upgrade.png]] [[Draft_Upgrade/pl|Upgrade]]: Łączy obiekty do obiektu wyższego poziomu * [[Image:Draft_Downgrade.png]] [[Draft_Downgrade/pl|Downgrade]]: Rozbija obiekt na obiekty niższego poziomu * [[Image:Draft_Trimex.png]] [[Draft_Trimex/pl|Przytnij/Wydłuż (Trimex)]]: Przycina lub wydłuża obiekt * [[Image:Draft_Apply.png]] [[Draft_Apply/pl|Zastosuj styl]]: Zastosowuje aktualny kolor i grubość linii do obiektu * [[Image:Draft_Scale.png]] [[Draft_Scale/pl|Skaluj]]: Skaluje zaznaczone obiekty wokół punktu bazowego <noinclude>[[Category:Template/pl]]</noinclude>

===Drawing objects===
These are tools for creating objects.
* [[Image:Draft_Line.png]] [[Draft_Line|Line]]: Draws a line segment between 2 points * [[Image:Draft_Wire.png]] [[Draft_Wire|Wire]]: Draws a line made of multiple line segments (polyline) * [[Image:Draft_Circle.png]] [[Draft_Circle|Circle]]: Draws a circle from center and radius * [[Image:Draft_Arc.png]] [[Draft_Arc|Arc]]: Draws an arc segment from center, radius, start angle and end angle * [[Image:Draft_Ellipse.png|32px]] [[Draft_Ellipse|Ellipse]]: Draws an ellipse from two corner points * [[Image:Draft_Polygon.png]] [[Draft_Polygon|Polygon]]: Draws a regular polygon from a center and a radius * [[Image:Draft_Rectangle.png]] [[Draft_Rectangle|Rectangle]]: Draws a rectangle from 2 opposite points * [[Image:Draft_Text.png]] [[Draft_Text|Text]]: Draws a multi-line text annotation * [[Image:Draft_Dimension.png]] [[Draft_Dimension|Dimension]]: Draws a dimension annotation * [[Image:Draft_BSpline.png]] [[Draft_BSpline|BSpline]]: Draws a B-Spline from a series of points * [[Image:Draft_Point.png|32px]] [[Draft_Point|Point]]: Inserts a point object * [[Image:Draft_ShapeString.png|32px]] [[Draft_ShapeString|ShapeString]]: The ShapeString tool inserts a compound shape representing a text string at a given point in the current document * [[Image:Draft_Facebinder.png|32px]] [[Draft_Facebinder|Facebinder]]: Creates a new object from selected faces on existing objects * [[Image:Draft_BezCurve.png|32px]] [[Draft_BezCurve|Bezier Curve]]: Draws a Bezier curve from a series of points
===Modifying objects===
These are tools for modifying existing objects. They work on selected objects, but if no object is selected, you will be invited to select one.
* [[Image:Draft_Move.png]] [[Draft_Move|Move]]: Moves object(s) from one location to another * [[Image:Draft_Rotate.png]] [[Draft_Rotate|Rotate]]: Rotates object(s) from a start angle to an end angle * [[Image:Draft_Offset.png]] [[Draft_Offset|Offset]]: Moves segments of an object about a certain distance * [[Image:Draft_Trimex.png]] [[Draft_Trimex|Trim/Extend (Trimex)]]: Trims or extends an object * [[Image:Draft_Upgrade.png]] [[Draft_Upgrade|Upgrade]]: Joins objects into a higher-level object * [[Image:Draft_Downgrade.png]] [[Draft_Downgrade|Downgrade]]: Explodes objects into lower-level objects * [[Image:Draft_Scale.png]] [[Draft_Scale|Scale]]: Scales selected object(s) around a base point * [[Image:Draft_PutOnSheet.png]] [[Draft_Drawing|Drawing]]: Writes selected objects to a [[Drawing Module|Drawing sheet]] * [[Image:Draft_Edit.png]] [[Draft_Edit|Edit]]: Edits a selected object * [[Image:Draft_WireToBSpline.png|32px]] [[Draft_WireToBSpline|Wire to BSpline]]: Converts a wire to a BSpline and vice-versa * [[Image:Draft_AddPoint.png|32px]] [[Draft_AddPoint|Add point]]: Adds a point to a wire or BSpline * [[Image:Draft_DelPoint.png|32px]] [[Draft_DelPoint|Delete point]]: Deletes a point from a wire or BSpline * [[Image:Draft_Shape2DView.png]] [[Draft_Shape2DView|Shape 2D View]]: Creates a 2D object which is a flattened 2D view of another 3D object * [[Image:Draft_Draft2Sketch.png|32px]] [[Draft_Draft2Sketch|Draft to Sketch]]: Converts a Draft object to Sketch and vice-versa * [[Image:Draft_Array.png|32px]] [[Draft_Array|Array]]: Creates a polar or rectangular array from selected objects * [[Image:Draft_PathArray.png|32px]] [[Draft_PathArray|Path Array]]: Creates an array of objects by placing the copies along a path * [[Image:Draft_Clone.png|32px]] [[Draft_Clone|Clone]]: Clones the selected objects
===Utility tools===
Additional tools available via right-click context menu, depending on the selected objects.
* [[Image:Draft_SelectPlane.png|32px]] [[Draft_SelectPlane|Set working plane]]: Sets a working plane from a standard view or a selected face * [[Image:Draft_FinishLine.png|32px]] [[Draft_FinishLine|Finish line]]: Ends the drawing of the current wire or bspline, without closing it * [[Image:Draft_CloseLine.png|32px]] [[Draft_CloseLine|Close line]]: Ends the drawing of the current wire or bspline, and closes it * [[Image:Draft_UndoLine.png|32px]] [[Draft_UndoLine|Undo line]]: Undoes the last segment of a line * [[Image:Draft_ToggleConstructionMode.png|32px]] [[Draft_ToggleConstructionMode|Toggle construction mode]]: Toggles the Draft construction mode on/off * [[Image:Draft_ToggleContinueMode.png|32px]] [[Draft_ToggleContinueMode|Toggle continue mode]]: Toggles the Draft continue mode on/off * [[Image:Draft_ApplyStyle.png|32px]] [[Draft_Apply|Apply style]]: Applies the current style and color to selected objects * [[Image:Draft_ToggleDisplayMode.png|32px]] [[Draft_ToggleDisplayMode|Toggle display mode]]: Switches the display mode of selected objects between "flat lines" and "wireframe" * [[Image:Draft_AddToGroup.png|32px]] [[Draft_AddToGroup|Add to group]]: Quickly adds selected objects to an existing group * [[Image:Draft_SelectGroup.png|32px]] [[Draft_SelectGroup|Select group contents]]: Selects the contents of a selected group * [[Image:Draft_ToggleSnap.png|32px]] [[Draft_ToggleSnap|Toggle snap]]: Toggles [[Draft Snap|object snapping]] on/off * [[Image:Draft_ToggleGrid.png|32px]] [[Draft_ToggleGrid|Toggle grid]]: Toggles the grid on/off * [[Image:Draft_ShowSnapBar.png|32px]] [[Draft_ShowSnapBar|Show snap bar]]: Shows/hides the [[Draft Snap|snapping]] toolbar * [[Image:Draft_Heal.png|32px]] [[Draft_Heal|Heal]]: Heals problematic Draft objects found in very old files * [[Image:Draft_FlipDimension.png|32px]] [[Draft_FlipDimension|Flip Dimension]]: Flips the orientation of the text of a [[Draft Dimension|dimension]] * [[Image:Draft_VisGroup.png|32px]] [[Draft_VisGroup|VisGroup]]: Creates a VisGroup in the current document <noinclude>[[Category:Template/pt]]</noinclude>

* [[Image:Draft_Line.png]] [[Draft_Line|Line]]: Draws a line segment between 2 points * [[Image:Draft_Wire.png]] [[Draft_Wire|Wire]]: Draws a line made of multiple line segments (polyline) * [[Image:Draft_Circle.png]] [[Draft_Circle|Circle]]: Draws a circle from center and radius * [[Image:Draft_Arc.png]] [[Draft_Arc|Arc]]: Draws an arc segment from center, radius, start angle and end angle * [[Image:Draft_Ellipse.png|32px]] [[Draft_Ellipse|Ellipse]]: Draws an ellipse from two corner points * [[Image:Draft_Polygon.png]] [[Draft_Polygon|Polygon]]: Draws a regular polygon from a center and a radius * [[Image:Draft_Rectangle.png]] [[Draft_Rectangle|Rectangle]]: Draws a rectangle from 2 opposite points * [[Image:Draft_Text.png]] [[Draft_Text|Text]]: Draws a multi-line text annotation * [[Image:Draft_Dimension.png]] [[Draft_Dimension|Dimension]]: Draws a dimension annotation * [[Image:Draft_BSpline.png]] [[Draft_BSpline|BSpline]]: Draws a B-Spline from a series of points * [[Image:Draft_Point.png|32px]] [[Draft_Point|Point]]: Inserts a point object * [[Image:Draft_ShapeString.png|32px]] [[Draft_ShapeString|ShapeString]]: The ShapeString tool inserts a compound shape representing a text string at a given point in the current document * [[Image:Draft_Facebinder.png|32px]] [[Draft_Facebinder|Facebinder]]: Creates a new object from selected faces on existing objects * [[Image:Draft_BezCurve.png|32px]] [[Draft_BezCurve|Bezier Curve]]: Draws a Bezier curve from a series of points
