===Desenarea obiectelor===
Aceste unelte se folosesc la crearea obiectelor.
* [[Image:Draft_Line.png]] [[Draft_Line/ro|Linie din 2 puncte]]: Deseneaza un segment de linie din 2 puncte * [[Image:Draft_Wire.png]] [[Draft_Wire/ro|Polilinie]]: Deseneaza o linie din mai multe segmente * [[Image:Draft_Circle.png]] [[Draft_Circle/ro|Cerc]]: Deseneaza un cerc dupa centru si raza * [[Image:Draft_Arc.png]] [[Draft_Arc/ro|Arc]]: Deseneaza un arc dupa centru, raza, unghi de inceput si de sfarsit * [[Image:Draft_Rectangle.png]] [[Draft_Rectangle/ro|Rectangle]]: Deseneaza undreptunghi folosind capetele diagonalei * [[Image:Draft_Polygon.png]] [[Draft_Polygon/ro|Poligon]]: Deseneaza un poligon regulat dupa centru si raza * [[Image:Draft_BSpline.png]] [[Draft_BSpline/ro|BSpline]]: Deseneaza o curba (B-Spline) dintr-o serie de puncte * [[Image:Draft_Text.png]] [[Draft_Text/ro|Text]]: Deseneaza o ceseta text ce permite mai multe linii * [[Image:Draft_Dimension.png]] [[Draft_Dimension/ro|Dimensiuni]]: Deseneaza o dimensiune * [[Image:Draft_Point.png|32px]] [[Draft_Point/ro|Punct]]: Insereaza un punct
===Modificarea obiectelor===
Aceste unelte modifica obiectele existente. Tinta lor sunt obiectele selectate iar, daca nu exista nici o selectie, veti fi invitat sa selectati.
* [[Image:Draft_Move.png]] [[Draft_Move/ro|Muta]]: Muta obiectele dintr-o locatie in alta * [[Image:Draft_Rotate.png]] [[Draft_Rotate/ro|Rotire]]: Roteste obiectele de la un unghi de inceput la un unghi final * [[Image:Draft_Offset.png]] [[Draft_Offset/ro|Expandare]]: Muta segmentele unui obiect la o anumita distanta constanta * [[Image:Draft_Upgrade.png]] [[Draft_Upgrade/ro|Unire]]: Uneste obiectele intr-un singur obiect complex * [[Image:Draft_Downgrade.png]] [[Draft_Downgrade/ro|Explodare]]: Sparge un obiect complex in obiecte componente mai simple * [[Image:Draft_Trimex.png]] [[Draft_Trimex/ro|Taie/Extinde (Trimex)]]: Taie sau extinde un obiect * [[Image:Draft_Scale.png]] [[Draft_Scale/ro|Scalare]]: Scaleaza obiectele selectate in jurul punctului de baza * [[Image:Draft_Edit.png]] [[Draft_Edit/ro|Editare]]: Editeaza obiectul selectat * [[Image:Draft_PutOnSheet.png]] [[Draft_Drawing/ro|Desenare]]: Scrie obiectele selectate pe o [[Drawing Module/ro|foaie de desen]] * [[Image:Draft_Shape2DView.png]] [[Draft_Shape2DView/ro|Vizualizare 2D a formei]]: Creaza un obiect 2D care reprezinta proiectia unui obiect 3D * [[Image:Draft_WireToBSpline.png|32px]] [[Draft_WireToBSpline/ro|Polilinie in BSpline]]: Converteste o polilinie intr-o curba (BSpline) si viceversa * [[Image:Draft_AddPoint.png|32px]] [[Draft_AddPoint/ro|Adauga punct]]: Insereaza un punct intr-o polilinie sau curba (BSpline) * [[Image:Draft_DelPoint.png|32px]] [[Draft_DelPoint/ro|Sterge point]]: Sterge un punct dintr-o polilinie sau curba (BSpline) * [[Image:Draft_Draft2Sketch.png|32px]] [[Draft_Draft2Sketch/ro|Ciorna in schita]]: Converteste o ciorna in schita si viceversa * [[Image:Draft_Array.png|32px]] [[Draft_Array/ro|Multimi]]: Creaza o multime polara sau rectangulara din obiectele selectate * [[Image:Draft_Clone.png|32px]] [[Draft_Clone/ro|Clonare]]: Clonaeza obiectele selectate
===Utilitare===
Instrumente suplimentare sunt disponibile prin meniul contextual (clic-dreapta), în functie de obiectele selectate.
* [[Image:Draft_SelectPlane.png|32px]] [[Draft_SelectPlane/ro|Seteaza planului de lucru]]: Seteaza un plan de lucru din vizualizare standard sau fata selectata * [[Image:Draft_FinishLine.png|32px]] [[Draft_FinishLine/ro|Termina line]]: Incheie desenarea poliliniei sau curbei curente fara a o închide * [[Image:Draft_CloseLine.png|32px]] [[Draft_CloseLine/ro|Inchide line]]: Incheie desenarea poliliniei sau curbei curente si o inchide * [[Image:Draft_UndoLine.png|32px]] [[Draft_UndoLine/ro|Undo linie]]: Elimina ultimul segment al poliliniei * [[Image:Draft_ToggleConstructionMode.png|32px]] [[Draft_ToggleConstructionMode/ro|Comuta modul constructie]]: Comuta modul constructie in ciorna (activ/inactiv) * [[Image:Draft_ToggleContinueMode.png|32px]] [[Draft_ToggleContinueMode/ro|Comuta modul continuu]]: Comuta modul continuu (activ/inactiv) * [[Image:Draft_ApplyStyle.png|32px]] [[Draft_Apply/ro|Aplica stil]]: Aplica stilul si culoarea curente obiectlor selectate * [[Image:Draft_ToggleDisplayMode.png|32px]] [[Draft_ToggleDisplayMode/ro|Comuta modul de afisare]]: Comuta modul de afisare pentru obiectele afisate intre "linii plane" si "retele" * [[Image:Draft_AddToGroup.png|32px]] [[Draft_AddToGroup/ro|Adauga la grup]]: Adauga rapid obiectele selectate la un grup existent * [[Image:Draft_SelectGroup.png|32px]] [[Draft_SelectGroup/ro|Selecteaza grupul]]: Selecteaza elementele componente ale grupului selectat * [[Image:Draft_ToggleSnap.png|32px]] [[Draft_ToggleSnap/ro|Comuta ancorele]]: Comuta [[Draft Snap/ro|ancorarea la obiecte]] (activa/inactiva) * [[Image:Draft_ToggleGrid.png|32px]] [[Draft_ToggleGrid/ro|Comuta grila]]: Comuta grila (activa/inactiva) * [[Image:Draft_ShowSnapBar.png|32px]] [[Draft_ShowSnapBar/ro|Arata bara de ancore]]: Afiseaza sau ascnde bara de [[Draft Snap/ro|ancorare]] <noinclude>[[Category:Template/ro]]</noinclude>

===Инструмены для черчения===
Эти инструменты позволяют вам настроить рабочую среду или производят общие операции.
* [[Image:Draft_Workingplane.svg|32px]] [[Draft SelectPlane/ru|Working plane]]: Устанавливает вашу рабочую плоскость для следующих операций * [[Image:Draft_PutOnSheet.png]] [[Draft Drawing/ru|Put on Sheet]]:Записывает выбранный объект на чертежный лист SVG формата
===Графические объекты===
Эти инструменты создают объекты.
* [[Image:Draft_Line.png]] [[Draft_Line|2-point Line]]: Рисует отрезок через две точки. * [[Image:Draft_Wire.png]] [[Draft_Wire|Wire (multiple-point line)]]: Рисует кривую состоящую из отрезков * [[Image:Draft_Circle.png]] [[Draft_Circle|Circle]]: Рисует окружность с помощью заданных центра и радиуса * [[Image:Draft_Arc.png]] [[Draft_Arc|Arc]]: Рисует дугу, с помощью центра, радиуса и заданных начального и конечного угла * [[Image:Draft_Rectangle.png]] [[Draft_Rectangle|Rectangle]]: Рисует прямоугольник через две точки * [[Image:Draft_Text.png]] [[Draft_Text|Text]]: Рисует многострочный текст аннотации * [[Image:Draft_Dimension.png]] [[Draft_Dimension|Dimension]]: Рисует размерную линию
===Изменение объектов===
Эти инструменты изменяют существующие объекты. Они срабатывают на выбраных объектах, но если ни одного объекта не выбрано, то вам будет предложено выбрать один.
* [[Image:Draft_Move.png]] [[Draft_Move|Move]]: Перемещает обект(ы) из одной локации в другую * [[Image:Draft_Rotate.png]] [[Draft_Rotate|Rotate]]: Поворачивает объект(ы) от начального и до конечного угла * [[Image:Draft_Offset.png]] [[Draft_Offset|Offset]]: Перемещает сегменты объекта на заданное расстояние * [[Image:Draft_Upgrade.png]] [[Draft_Upgrade|Upgrade]]: Объеденяет объекты в более сложный объект * [[Image:Draft_Downgrade.png]] [[Draft_Downgrade|Downgrade]]: Разделяет объекты, на более простые * [[Image:Draft_Trimex.png]] [[Draft_Trimex|Trim/Extend (Trimex)]]: Уменьшает или увеличивает длинну объекта * [[Image:Draft_Apply.png]] [[Draft_Apply|Apply style]]: Устанавливает для выделенных объектов указанный цвет и длину линий * [[Image:Draft_Scale.png]] [[Draft_Scale|Scale]]: Изменяет масштаб выбранного(ых) объекта(ов) вокруг базовой точки * [[Image:Draft_Edit.png]] [[Draft_Edit|Edit]]: Редактировать выбранный объект <noinclude>[[Category:Template/ru]]</noinclude>

===Rita objekt===
Detta är verktyg för att rita objekt.
* [[Image:Draft_Line.png]] [[Draft_Line/se|2-punkt Linje]]: Ritar ett linjesegment mellan 2 punkter * [[Image:Draft_Wire.png]] [[Draft_Wire/se|Tråd (multi-punkts linje)]]: Ritar en linje som består av flera linjesegment * [[Image:Draft_Circle.png]] [[Draft_Circle/se|Cirkel]]: Ritar en cirkel med hjälp av centrum och radie * [[Image:Draft_Arc.png]] [[Draft_Arc/se|Cirkelbåge]]: Ritar en cirkelbåge med hjälp av centrum, radie, startvinkel och slutvinkel * [[Image:Draft_Rectangle.png]] [[Draft_Rectangle/se|Rektangel]]: Ritar en rektangel från 2 motsatta punkter (hörnen) * [[Image:Draft_Polygon.png]] [[Draft_Polygon/se|Polygon]]: Ritar en regelbunden polygon med center och en radie * [[Image:Draft_BSpline.png]] [[Draft_BSpline/se|BSpline]]: Ritar en B-Spline från en serie med punkter * [[Image:Draft_Text.png]] [[Draft_Text/se|Text]]: Ritar en text annotering med flera rader * [[Image:Draft_Dimension.png]] [[Draft_Dimension/se|Dimension]]: Ritar en måttsättning
===Förändra objekt===
Detta är verktyg för att förändra existerande objekt. De arbetar med valda objekt, men om inget objekt är valt, så ombes du att välja ett.
* [[Image:Draft_Move.png]] [[Draft_Move/se|Flytta]]: Flyttar objekt från en plats till en annan * [[Image:Draft_Rotate.png]] [[Draft_Rotate/se|Rotera]]: Roterar objekt från en startvinkel till en slutvinkel * [[Image:Draft_Offset.png]] [[Draft_Offset/se|Offset]]: Flyttar ett objekts segment ett visst avstånd * [[Image:Draft_Upgrade.png]] [[Draft_Upgrade/se|Uppgradera]]: Förenar objekt till ett objekt med högre nivå * [[Image:Draft_Downgrade.png]] [[Draft_Downgrade/se|Nedgradera]]: Splittrar objekt till enklare objekt * [[Image:Draft_Trimex.png]] [[Draft_Trimex/se|Trimma/förläng (Trimex)]]: Trimmar eller förlänger ett objekt * [[Image:Draft_Scale.png]] [[Draft_Scale/se|Skala]]: Skalar valda objekt runt en baspunkt * [[Image:Draft_Edit.png]] [[Draft_Edit/se|Redigera]]: Redigerar ett valt objekt * [[Image:Draft_PutOnSheet.png]] [[Draft_Drawing/se|Ritning]]: Skriver valda objekt till ett [[Drawing_Module|Ritningsark]] <noinclude>[[Category:Template/se]]</noinclude>

===Rita objekt===
Detta är verktyg för att rita objekt.
* [[Image:Draft_Line.png]] [[Draft_Line/sv|2-punkt Linje]]: Ritar ett linjesegment mellan 2 punkter * [[Image:Draft_Wire.png]] [[Draft_Wire/sv|Tråd (multi-punkts linje)]]: Ritar en linje som består av flera linjesegment * [[Image:Draft_Circle.png]] [[Draft_Circle/sv|Cirkel]]: Ritar en cirkel med hjälp av centrum och radie * [[Image:Draft_Arc.png]] [[Draft_Arc/sv|Cirkelbåge]]: Ritar en cirkelbåge med hjälp av centrum, radie, startvinkel och slutvinkel * [[Image:Draft_Ellipse.png|32px]] [[Draft_Ellipse/sv|Ellipse]]: Draws an ellipse from two corner points * [[Image:Draft_Rectangle.png]] [[Draft_Rectangle/sv|Rektangel]]: Ritar en rektangel från 2 motsatta punkter (hörnen) * [[Image:Draft_Polygon.png]] [[Draft_Polygon/sv|Polygon]]: Ritar en regelbunden polygon med center och en radie * [[Image:Draft_BSpline.png]] [[Draft_BSpline/sv|BSpline]]: Ritar en B-Spline från en serie med punkter * [[Image:Draft_Text.png]] [[Draft_Text/sv|Text]]: Ritar en text annotering med flera rader * [[Image:Draft_Dimension.png]] [[Draft_Dimension/sv|Dimension]]: Ritar en måttsättning * [[Image:Draft_Point.png|32px]] [[Draft_Point/sv|Point]]: Inserts a point object * [[Image:Draft_ShapeString.png|32px]] [[Draft_ShapeString/sv|ShapeString]]: The ShapeString tool inserts a compound shape representing a text string at a given point in the current document * [[Image:Draft_Facebinder.png|32px]] [[Draft_Facebinder/sv|Facebinder]]: Creates a new object from selected faces on existing objects * [[Image:Draft_BezCurve.png|32px]] [[Draft_BezCurve/sv|Bezier Curve]]: Draws a Bezier curve from a series of points
===Förändra objekt===
Detta är verktyg för att förändra existerande objekt. De arbetar med valda objekt, men om inget objekt är valt, så ombes du att välja ett.
* [[Image:Draft_Move.png]] [[Draft_Move/sv|Flytta]]: Flyttar objekt från en plats till en annan * [[Image:Draft_Rotate.png]] [[Draft_Rotate/sv|Rotera]]: Roterar objekt från en startvinkel till en slutvinkel * [[Image:Draft_Offset.png]] [[Draft_Offset/sv|Offset]]: Flyttar ett objekts segment ett visst avstånd * [[Image:Draft_Upgrade.png]] [[Draft_Upgrade/sv|Uppgradera]]: Förenar objekt till ett objekt med högre nivå * [[Image:Draft_Downgrade.png]] [[Draft_Downgrade/sv|Nedgradera]]: Splittrar objekt till enklare objekt * [[Image:Draft_Trimex.png]] [[Draft_Trimex/sv|Trimma/förläng (Trimex)]]: Trimmar eller förlänger ett objekt * [[Image:Draft_Scale.png]] [[Draft_Scale/sv|Skala]]: Skalar valda objekt runt en baspunkt * [[Image:Draft_Edit.png]] [[Draft_Edit/sv|Redigera]]: Redigerar ett valt objekt * [[Image:Draft_PutOnSheet.png]] [[Draft_Drawing/sv|Ritning]]: Skriver valda objekt till ett [[Drawing_Module/sv|Ritningsark]] * [[Image:Draft_PutOnSheet.png]] [[Draft_Drawing/sv|Drawing]]: Writes selected objects to a [[Drawing Module|Drawing sheet]] * [[Image:Draft_WireToBSpline.png|32px]] [[Draft_WireToBSpline/sv|Wire to BSpline]]: Converts a wire to a BSpline and vice-versa * [[Image:Draft_AddPoint.png|32px]] [[Draft_AddPoint/sv|Add point]]: Adds a point to a wire or BSpline * [[Image:Draft_DelPoint.png|32px]] [[Draft_DelPoint/sv|Delete point]]: Deletes a point from a wire or BSpline * [[Image:Draft_Shape2DView.png]] [[Draft_Shape2DView/sv|Shape 2D View]]: Creates a 2D object which is a flattened 2D view of another 3D object * [[Image:Draft_Draft2Sketch.png|32px]] [[Draft_Draft2Sketch/sv|Draft to Sketch]]: Converts a Draft object to Sketch and vice-versa * [[Image:Draft_Array.png|32px]] [[Draft_Array/sv|Array]]: Creates a polar or rectangular array from selected objects * [[Image:Draft_PathArray.png|32px]] [[Draft_PathArray/sv|Path Array]]: Creates an array of objects by placing the copies along a path * [[Image:Draft_Clone.png|32px]] [[Draft_Clone/sv|Clone]]: Clones the selected objects ===Utility tools===
Additional tools available via right-click context menu, depending on the selected objects.
* [[Image:Draft_SelectPlane.png|32px]] [[Draft_SelectPlane/sv|Set working plane]]: Sets a working plane from a standard view or a selected face * [[Image:Draft_FinishLine.png|32px]] [[Draft_FinishLine/sv|Finish line]]: Ends the drawing of the current wire or bspline, without closing it * [[Image:Draft_CloseLine.png|32px]] [[Draft_CloseLine/sv|Close line]]: Ends the drawing of the current wire or bspline, and closes it * [[Image:Draft_UndoLine.png|32px]] [[Draft_UndoLine/sv|Undo line]]: Undoes the last segment of a line * [[Image:Draft_ToggleConstructionMode.png|32px]] [[Draft_ToggleConstructionMode/sv|Toggle construction mode]]: Toggles the Draft construction mode on/off * [[Image:Draft_ToggleContinueMode.png|32px]] [[Draft_ToggleContinueMode/sv|Toggle continue mode]]: Toggles the Draft continue mode on/off * [[Image:Draft_ApplyStyle.png|32px]] [[Draft_Apply/sv|Apply style]]: Applies the current style and color to selected objects * [[Image:Draft_ToggleDisplayMode.png|32px]] [[Draft_ToggleDisplayMode/sv|Toggle display mode]]: Switches the display mode of selected objects between "flat lines" and "wireframe" * [[Image:Draft_AddToGroup.png|32px]] [[Draft_AddToGroup/sv|Add to group]]: Quickly adds selected objects to an existing group * [[Image:Draft_SelectGroup.png|32px]] [[Draft_SelectGroup/sv|Select group contents]]: Selects the contents of a selected group * [[Image:Draft_ToggleSnap.png|32px]] [[Draft_ToggleSnap/sv|Toggle snap]]: Toggles [[Draft Snap/sv|object snapping]] on/off * [[Image:Draft_ToggleGrid.png|32px]] [[Draft_ToggleGrid/sv|Toggle grid]]: Toggles the grid on/off * [[Image:Draft_ShowSnapBar.png|32px]] [[Draft_ShowSnapBar/sv|Show snap bar]]: Shows/hides the [[Draft Snap/sv|snapping]] toolbar * [[Image:Draft_Heal.png|32px]] [[Draft_Heal/sv|Heal]]: Heals problematic Draft objects found in very old files * [[Image:Draft_FlipDimension.png|32px]] [[Draft_FlipDimension/sv|Flip Dimension]]: Flips the orientation of the text of a [[Draft Dimension/sv|dimension]] <noinclude>[[Category:Template/sv]]</noinclude>

===Drawing objects===
These are tools for creating objects.
* [[Image:Draft_Line.png]] [[Draft_Line/tr|Line]]: Draws a line segment between 2 points * [[Image:Draft_Wire.png]] [[Draft_Wire/tr|Wire]]: Draws a line made of multiple line segments (polyline) * [[Image:Draft_Circle.png]] [[Draft_Circle/tr|Circle]]: Draws a circle from center and radius * [[Image:Draft_Arc.png]] [[Draft_Arc/tr|Arc]]: Draws an arc segment from center, radius, start angle and end angle * [[Image:Draft_Ellipse.png|32px]] [[Draft_Ellipse/tr|Ellipse]]: Draws an ellipse from two corner points * [[Image:Draft_Polygon.png]] [[Draft_Polygon/tr|Polygon]]: Draws a regular polygon from a center and a radius * [[Image:Draft_Rectangle.png]] [[Draft_Rectangle/tr|Rectangle]]: Draws a rectangle from 2 opposite points * [[Image:Draft_Text.png]] [[Draft_Text/tr|Text]]: Draws a multi-line text annotation * [[Image:Draft_Dimension.png]] [[Draft_Dimension/tr|Dimension]]: Draws a dimension annotation * [[Image:Draft_BSpline.png]] [[Draft_BSpline/tr|BSpline]]: Draws a B-Spline from a series of points * [[Image:Draft_Point.png|32px]] [[Draft_Point/tr|Point]]: Inserts a point object * [[Image:Draft_ShapeString.png|32px]] [[Draft_ShapeString/tr|ShapeString]]: The ShapeString tool inserts a compound shape representing a text string at a given point in the current document * [[Image:Draft_Facebinder.png|32px]] [[Draft_Facebinder/tr|Facebinder]]: Creates a new object from selected faces on existing objects * [[Image:Draft_BezCurve.png|32px]] [[Draft_BezCurve/tr|Bezier Curve]]: Draws a Bezier curve from a series of points
===Modifying objects===
These are tools for modifying existing objects. They work on selected objects, but if no object is selected, you will be invited to select one.
* [[Image:Draft_Move.png]] [[Draft_Move/tr|Move]]: Moves object(s) from one location to another * [[Image:Draft_Rotate.png]] [[Draft_Rotate/tr|Rotate]]: Rotates object(s) from a start angle to an end angle * [[Image:Draft_Offset.png]] [[Draft_Offset/tr|Offset]]: Moves segments of an object about a certain distance * [[Image:Draft_Trimex.png]] [[Draft_Trimex/tr|Trim/Extend (Trimex)]]: Trims or extends an object * [[Image:Draft_Upgrade.png]] [[Draft_Upgrade/tr|Upgrade]]: Joins objects into a higher-level object * [[Image:Draft_Downgrade.png]] [[Draft_Downgrade/tr|Downgrade]]: Explodes objects into lower-level objects * [[Image:Draft_Scale.png]] [[Draft_Scale/tr|Scale]]: Scales selected object(s) around a base point * [[Image:Draft_PutOnSheet.png]] [[Draft_Drawing/tr|Drawing]]: Writes selected objects to a [[Drawing Module|Drawing sheet]] * [[Image:Draft_Edit.png]] [[Draft_Edit/tr|Edit]]: Edits a selected object * [[Image:Draft_WireToBSpline.png|32px]] [[Draft_WireToBSpline/tr|Wire to BSpline]]: Converts a wire to a BSpline and vice-versa * [[Image:Draft_AddPoint.png|32px]] [[Draft_AddPoint/tr|Add point]]: Adds a point to a wire or BSpline * [[Image:Draft_DelPoint.png|32px]] [[Draft_DelPoint/tr|Delete point]]: Deletes a point from a wire or BSpline * [[Image:Draft_Shape2DView.png]] [[Draft_Shape2DView/tr|Shape 2D View]]: Creates a 2D object which is a flattened 2D view of another 3D object * [[Image:Draft_Draft2Sketch.png|32px]] [[Draft_Draft2Sketch/tr|Draft to Sketch]]: Converts a Draft object to Sketch and vice-versa * [[Image:Draft_Array.png|32px]] [[Draft_Array/tr|Array]]: Creates a polar or rectangular array from selected objects * [[Image:Draft_PathArray.png|32px]] [[Draft_PathArray/tr|Path Array]]: Creates an array of objects by placing the copies along a path * [[Image:Draft_Clone.png|32px]] [[Draft_Clone/tr|Clone]]: Clones the selected objects
===Utility tools===
Additional tools available via right-click context menu, depending on the selected objects.
* [[Image:Draft_SelectPlane.png|32px]] [[Draft_SelectPlane/tr|Set working plane]]: Sets a working plane from a standard view or a selected face * [[Image:Draft_FinishLine.png|32px]] [[Draft_FinishLine/tr|Finish line]]: Ends the drawing of the current wire or bspline, without closing it * [[Image:Draft_CloseLine.png|32px]] [[Draft_CloseLine/tr|Close line]]: Ends the drawing of the current wire or bspline, and closes it * [[Image:Draft_UndoLine.png|32px]] [[Draft_UndoLine/tr|Undo line]]: Undoes the last segment of a line * [[Image:Draft_ToggleConstructionMode.png|32px]] mode]]: Toggles the Draft continue mode on/off * [[Image:Draft_ApplyStyle.png|32px]] [[Draft_Apply/tr|Apply style]]: Applies the current style and color to selected objects * [[Image:Draft_ToggleDisplayMode.png|32px]] [[Draft_ToggleDisplayMode/tr|Toggle display mode]]: Switches the display mode of selected objects between "flat lines" and "wireframe" * [[Image:Draft_AddToGroup.png|32px]] [[Draft_AddToGroup/tr|Add to group]]: Quickly adds selected objects to an existing group * [[Image:Draft_SelectGroup.png|32px]] [[Draft_SelectGroup/tr|Select group contents]]: Selects the contents of a selected group * [[Image:Draft_ToggleSnap.png|32px]] [[Draft_ToggleSnap/tr|Toggle snap]]: Toggles [[Draft Snap|object snapping]] on/off * [[Image:Draft_ToggleGrid.png|32px]] [[Draft_ToggleGrid/tr|Toggle grid]]: Toggles the grid on/off * [[Image:Draft_ShowSnapBar.png|32px]] [[Draft_ShowSnapBar/tr|Show snap bar]]: Shows/hides the [[Draft These are tools for creating, configuring and exporting 2D drawing sheets
* [[Image:Drawing_New.png|32px]] [[Drawing_Open_SVG|Open scalable vector graphic]]: Opens a drawing sheet previously saved as an SVG file * [[Image:Drawing_Landscape_A3.png|32px]] [[Drawing_Landscape_A3|New A3 landscape drawing]]: Creates a new drawing sheet from FreeCAD's default A3 template * [[Image:Drawing_View.png|32px]] [[Drawing_View|Insert a view]]: Inserts a view of the selected object in the active drawing sheet * [[Image:Drawing_Annotation.png|32px]] [[Drawing_Annotation|Annotation]]: Adds an annotation to the current drawing sheet * [[Image:Drawing_Clip.png|32px]] [[Drawing_Clip|Clip]]: Adds a clip group to the current drawing sheet * [[Image:Drawing_Openbrowser.png|32px]] [[Drawing_Openbrowser|Open Browser]]: Opens a preview of the current sheet in the browser * [[Image:Drawing_Orthoviews.png|32px]] [[Drawing_Orthoviews|Ortho Views]]: Automatically creates orthographic views of an object on the current drawing sheet * [[Image:Drawing_Symbol.png|32px]] [[Drawing_Symbol|Symbol]]: Adds the contents of a SVG file as a symbol on the current drawing sheet * [[Image:Drawing_Save.png|32px]] [[Drawing_Save|Save sheet]]: Saves the current sheet as a SVG file <noinclude>[[Category:Template]]</noinclude>

下面是一组用于创建、配置与工程图纸导出的工具。
* [[Image:Drawing_New.png|32px]] [[Drawing_Open_SVG|Open scalable vector graphic]]: Opens a drawing sheet previously saved as an SVG file * [[Image:Drawing_Landscape_A3.png|32px]] [[Drawing_Landscape_A3|新建 A3 横向图纸]]：从 FreeCAD 默认的 A3 模板创建一份新的工程图纸 * [[Image:Drawing_View.png|32px]] [[Drawing_View|插入视图]]：在工作图纸中插入所选对象的一个视图 * [[Image:Drawing_Save.png|32px]] [[Drawing_Save|保存图纸]]：将当前图纸保存为 SVG 文件 <noinclude>[[Category:Template/cn]]</noinclude>

These are tools for creating, configuring and exporting 2D drawing sheets
* [[Image:Drawing_New.png|32px]] [[Drawing_Open_SVG/cs|Open scalable vector graphic]]: Opens a drawing sheet previously saved as an SVG file * [[Image:Drawing_Landscape_A3.png|32px]] [[Drawing_Landscape_A3/cs|New A3 landscape drawing]]: Creates a new drawing sheet from FreeCAD's default A3 template * [[Image:Drawing_View.png|32px]] [[Drawing_View/cs|Insert a view]]: Inserts a view of the selected object in the active drawing sheet * [[Image:Drawing_Annotation.png|32px]] [[Drawing_Annotation/cs|Annotation]]: Adds an annotation to the current drawing sheet * [[Image:Drawing_Clip.png|32px]] [[Drawing_Clip/cs|Clip]]: Adds a clip group to the current drawing sheet * [[Image:Drawing_Openbrowser.png|32px]] [[Drawing_Openbrowser/cs|Open Browser]]: Opens a preview of the current sheet in the browser * [[Image:Drawing_Orthoviews.png|32px]] [[Drawing_Orthoviews/cs|Ortho Views]]: Automatically creates orthographic views of an object on the current drawing sheet * [[Image:Drawing_Symbol.png|32px]] [[Drawing_Symbol/cs|Symbol]]: Adds the contents of a SVG file as a symbol on the current drawing sheet * [[Image:Drawing_Save.png|32px]] [[Drawing_Save/cs|Save sheet]]: Saves the current sheet as a SVG file <noinclude>[[Category:Template/cs]]</noinclude>

Diese Werkzeuge ermöglichen das Erstellen, Konfigurieren und exportieren von 2D-Zeichnungen
* [[Image:Drawing_New.png|32px]] [[Drawing_Open_SVG|Open scalable vector graphic]]: Opens a drawing sheet previously saved as an SVG file * [[Image:Drawing_Landscape_A3.png|32px]] [[Drawing_Landscape_A3|Neue A3-Zeichnung]]: Erzeugt ein neues Zeichnungs-Blatt aus FreeCAD's Standard A3 Vorlage * [[Image:Drawing_View.png|32px]] [[Drawing_View|Ansicht einfügen]]: Fügt eine/weitere Ansicht des ausgewählten Objekts in das aktive Zeichnungs-Blatt ein * [[Image:Drawing_Annotation.png|32px]] [[Drawing_Annotation|Anmerkung einfügen]]: Fügt eine Anmerkung in die aktive Zeichnung ein * [[Image:Drawing_Clip.png|32px]] [[Drawing_Clip|Ausschnitt]]: Fügt eine Ausschnittsgruppe in die aktive Zeichnung ein * [[Image:Drawing_Openbrowser.png|32px]] [[Drawing_Openbrowser|Browseransicht]]: Öffnet die angewählte Seite in der Browseransicht * [[Image:Drawing_Orthoviews.png|32px]] [[Drawing_Orthoviews|Orthografische Ansichten einfügen]]: Orthografische Projektion eines Bauteils in die aktive Zeichnung einfügen * [[Image:Drawing_Save.png|32px]] [[Drawing_Save|Speichern]]: Speichert das aktuelle Blatt als SVG-Datei <noinclude>[[Category:Template/de]]</noinclude>

Estas son las herramientas para la creación, configuración y exportación de hojas de dibujo 2D
* [[Image:Drawing_New.png|32px]] [[Drawing_Open_SVG/es|Abre SVG scalable vector graphic]]: Abre una hoja de dibujo previamente guardada en un archivo SVG * [[Image:Drawing_Landscape_A3.png|32px]] [[Drawing_Landscape_A3/es|Nueva hoja de dibujo en formato A3]]: Crea una hoja de dibujo nueva a partir de la plantilla por defecto A3 de FreeCAD * [[Image:Drawing_View.png|32px]] [[Drawing_View/es|Insertar una vista]]: Inserta una vista de los objetos seleccionados en la hoja de dibujo activa * [[Image:Drawing_Save.png|32px]] [[Drawing_Save/es|Guardar hoja de dibujo]]: Guarda la hoja de dibujo actual como un archivo SVG <noinclude>[[Category:Template/es]]</noinclude>

Ces outils permettent de créer, configurer et exporter des mises en plan 2D
* [[Image:Drawing_Open_SVG.png|32px]] [[Drawing_Open_SVG/fr|Ouvrir un fichier vectoriel SVG]]: Ouvre une feuille de dessin précédemment sauvegardée au format de fichier SVG * [[Image:Drawing_Landscape_A3.png|32px]] [[Drawing_Landscape_A3/fr|Nouvelle feuille A3 paysage]]: Créé une nouvelle feuille à partir du gabarit A3 par défaut de FreeCAD * [[Image:Drawing_View.png|32px]] [[Drawing_View/fr|Insérer une vue]]: Insère une vue de l'objet sélectionné dans la feuille active * [[Image:Drawing_Annotation.png|32px]] [[Drawing_Annotation/fr|Annotation]]: Ajoute une annotation dans la feuille de dessin courante. * [[Image:Drawing_Clip.png|32px]] [[Drawing_Clip/fr|Clip]]: Ajoute un groupe de clip dans la feuille de dessin courante * [[Image:Drawing_Openbrowser.png|32px]] [[Drawing_Openbrowser/fr|Ouverture du navigateur internet]]: Ouvre un aperçu de la feuille courante dans le navigateur. * [[Image:Drawing_Orthoviews.png|32px]] [[Drawing_Orthoviews/fr|Vue Orthogonale]]: Crée automatiquement des vues orthogonales d'un objet sur la feuille de dessin courante. * [[Image:Drawing_Save.png|32px]] [[Drawing_Save/fr|Exporter la feuille]]: Exporte la feuille dans un fichier au format SVG
[[Category:Administration/fr]]

Questi strumenti permettono di creare, configurare e esportare le proiezioni dei solidi come disegni 2D.
* [[Image:Drawing_New.png|32px]] [[Drawing_Open_SVG/it|Apri SVG]]: apre un foglio di disegno preventivamente salvato in un file SVG. * [[Image:Drawing_Landscape_A3.png|32px]] [[Drawing_Landscape_A3/it|Nuovo Disegno A3]]: crea un nuovo disegno su un foglio di default A3 orizzontale di FreeCAD. * [[Image:Drawing_View.png|32px]] [[Drawing_View/it|Inserisci una vista]]: inserisce nel foglio di lavoro attivo una vista in proiezione dell'oggetto selezionato. * [[Image:Drawing_Annotation.png|32px]] [[Drawing_Annotation/it|Annotazione]]: aggiunge una annotazione al foglio di disegno corrente. * [[Image:Drawing_Clip.png|32px]] [[Drawing_Clip/it|Clip]]: aggiunge un gruppo di clip al foglio di disegno corrente. * [[Image:Drawing_Openbrowser.png|32px]] [[Drawing_Openbrowser/it|Apri Browser]]: apre un'anteprima del foglio corrente nel browser * [[Image:Drawing_Orthoviews.png|32px]] [[Drawing_Orthoviews/it|Viste ortogonali]]: crea automaticamente le viste ortogonali di un oggetto nel foglio di disegno corrente * [[Image:Drawing_Symbol.png|32px]] [[Drawing_Symbol/it|Simbolo]]: aggiunge il contenuto di un file in formato SVG come un simbolo nel foglio di disegno corrente * [[Image:Drawing_Save.png|32px]] [[Drawing_Save/it|Salva SVG]]: salva il progetto o le sue modifiche in un file SVG. * [[Drawing_ProjectShape/it|Proietta le forme]]: proietta le forme su un piano, nella vista 3D. <noinclude>[[Category:Administration/it]] [[Category:Template/it]]</noinclude>

2D図面を作成、設定、エキスポートするためのツールです。
* [[Image:Drawing_New.png|32px]] [[Drawing_Open_SVG/jp|スケーラブルベクターグラフィックを開く]]: SVGファイルとして保存されている図面を開きます * [[Image:Drawing_Landscape_A3.png|32px]] [[Drawing_Landscape_A3/jp|A3図面の新規作成]]: FreeCADのデフォルトのA3テンプレートから新しい図面を作成します * [[Image:Drawing_View.png|32px]] [[Drawing_View/jp|ビューの挿入]]: アクティブな図面上に選択されたオブジェクトのビューを挿入します * [[Image:Drawing_Save.png|32px]] [[Drawing_Save/jp|図面の保存]]: 現在の図面をSVGファイルとして保存します <noinclude>[[Category:Template/jp]]</noinclude>

Narzędzia do tworzenia, konfigurowania i eksportowania arkuszy rysunków 2D
* [[Image:Drawing_New.png|32px]] [[Drawing_Open_SVG/pl|Open scalable vector graphic]]: Opens a drawing sheet previously saved as an SVG file * [[Image:Drawing_Landscape_A3.png|32px]] [[Drawing_Landscape_A3/pl|New A3 landscape drawing]]: Creates a new drawing sheet from FreeCAD's default A3 template * [[Image:Drawing_View.png|32px]] [[Drawing_View/pl|Insert a view]]: Inserts a view of the selected object in the active drawing sheet * [[Image:Drawing_Annotation.png|32px]] [[Drawing_Annotation/pl|Annotation]]: Adds an annotation to the current drawing sheet * [[Image:Drawing_Clip.png|32px]] [[Drawing_Clip/pl|Clip]]: Adds a clip group to the current drawing sheet * [[Image:Drawing_Openbrowser.png|32px]] [[Drawing_Openbrowser/pl|Open Browser]]: Opens a preview of the current sheet in the browser * [[Image:Drawing_Orthoviews.png|32px]] [[Drawing_Orthoviews/pl|Ortho Views]]: Automatically creates orthographic views of an object on the current drawing sheet * [[Image:Drawing_Symbol.png|32px]] [[Drawing_Symbol/pl|Symbol]]: Adds the contents of a SVG file as a symbol on the current drawing sheet * [[Image:Drawing_Save.png|32px]] [[Drawing_Save/pl|Save sheet]]: Saves the current sheet as a SVG file <noinclude>[[Category:Template/pl]]</noinclude>

Unelte pentru crearea, configurarea si exportul foilor de desen 2D
* [[Image:Drawing_New.png|32px]] [[Drawing_Open_SVG/ro|Deschide imagine vectoriala scalabila - SVG]]: Deschide o foaie de desen salvata anterior ca si fisier SVG * [[Image:Drawing_Landscape_A3.png|32px]] [[Drawing_Landscape_A3/ro|Desen nou A3 peisaj]]: Creaza o noua foaie de desen din sablonul implicit FreeCAD * [[Image:Drawing_View.png|32px]] [[Drawing_View/ro|Inserare vizualizare]]: Insereaza o vizualizare a obiectelor selectate in foaia din desenul activ * [[Image:Drawing_Save.png|32px]] [[Drawing_Save/ro|Salveaza foaie]]: Salveaza foaia curenta ca si fisier SVG <noinclude>[[Category:Template/ro]]</noinclude>

Это инструменты для создания, настройки и экспортирования 2D чертежных листов
* [[Image:Drawing_New.png|32px]] [[Drawing_Open_SVG|Open scalable vector graphic]]: Opens a drawing sheet previously saved as an SVG file * [[Image:Drawing_Landscape_A3.png|32px]] [[Drawing_Landscape_A3|Новый чертеж A3]]: Создает чертёж формата A3 c шаблоном FreeCAD по умолчанию * [[Image:Drawing_View.png|32px]] [[Drawing_View|Разместить вид]]: Помещает вид выделенного объекта на активный лист чертежа. * [[Image:Drawing_Save.png|32px]] [[Drawing_Save|Сохранить лист]]: Сохраняет указанный лист в SVG формате <noinclude>[[Category:Template/ru]]</noinclude>

Detta är verktyg för att skapa, konfigurera och exportera 2D ritningsark
* [[Image:Drawing_New.png|32px]] [[Drawing_New/se|Nytt ritningsark]]: Skapar ett nytt ritningsark från en existerande SVG fil * [[Image:Drawing_Landscape_A3.png|32px]] [[Drawing_Landscape_A3/se|Ny A3 landskapsritning]]: Skapar ett nytt ritningsark från FreeCADs standard A3 mall * [[Image:Drawing_View.png|32px]] [[Drawing_View/se|Sätt in en vy]]: Sätter in en vy av de valda objekten i det aktiva ritningsarket * [[Image:Drawing_Save.png|32px]] [[Drawing_Save/se|Spara ark]]: Sparar det nuvarande arket som en SVG fil <noinclude>[[Category:Template/se]]</noinclude>

Detta är verktyg för att skapa, konfigurera och exportera 2D ritningsark
* [[Image:Drawing_New.png|32px]] [[Drawing_Open_SVG/sv|Open scalable vector graphic]]: Opens a drawing sheet previously saved as an SVG file * [[Image:Drawing_Landscape_A3.png|32px]] [[Drawing_Landscape_A3/sv|New A3 landscape drawing]]: Creates a new drawing sheet from FreeCAD's default A3 template * [[Image:Drawing_View.png|32px]] [[Drawing_View/sv|Insert a view]]: Inserts a view of the selected object in the active drawing sheet * [[Image:Drawing_Annotation.png|32px]] [[Drawing_Annotation/sv|Annotation]]: Adds an annotation to the current drawing sheet * [[Image:Drawing_Clip.png|32px]] [[Drawing_Clip/sv|Clip]]: Adds a clip group to the current drawing sheet * [[Image:Drawing_Openbrowser.png|32px]] [[Drawing_Openbrowser/sv|Open Browser]]: Opens a preview of the current sheet in the browser * [[Image:Drawing_Orthoviews.png|32px]] [[Drawing_Orthoviews/sv|Ortho Views]]: Automatically creates orthographic views of an object on the current drawing sheet * [[Image:Drawing_Symbol.png|32px]] [[Drawing_Symbol/sv|Symbol]]: Adds the contents of a SVG file as a symbol on the current drawing sheet * [[Image:Drawing_Save.png|32px]] [[Drawing_Save/sv|Save sheet]]: Saves the current sheet as a SVG file <noinclude>[[Category:Template/sv]]</noinclude>

not used [[Category:Pages_to_delete]]

* [[Image:Fem_FemMesh.svg|32px]] [[FEM Create|Create FEM mesh]]: Opens the meshing dialog. Either select on of the predefined profiles or choose own values. * [[Image:Fem_Material.svg|32px]] [[FEM Material|Mechanical material...]]: Lets you select a material from the database [0.14] Only PLA is accepted. * [[Image:Fem_Analysis.svg|32px]] [[FEM Analysis|New mechanical analysis]]: Creates a new static mechanical analysis. If solid (in tree view) is selected '''before''' clicking on it the meshing dialog will be opened next. * [[Image:Fem_NewAnalysis.svg|32px]] [[FEM Calculation|Start calculation]]: Opens Menu to start the Calculix-Solver. * [[Image:Fem_FemMesh_createnodebypoly.svg|32px]] [[FEM DefineNodes|Define/create a nodes set]]: Creates/defines a node set. [0.14] Not implemented yet. * [[Image:Fem_ConstraintFixed.svg|32px]] [[FEM FixedConstraint|Create FEM fixed constraint]]: To define a fixed constraint on point/edge/face(s) * [[Image:Fem_ConstraintForce.svg|32px]] [[FEM ForceConstraint|Create FEM force constraint]]: To define a force in [N] applied uniform to a selectable face in definable direction. * [[Image:Fem_ConstraintBearing.svg|32px]] [[FEM BearingConstraint|Create FEM bearing constraint]]: To define a bearing constraint. * [[Image:Fem_ConstraintGear.svg|32px]] [[FEM GearConstraint|Create FEM gear constraint]]: To define a gear constraint. * [[Image:Fem_ConstraintPulley.svg|32px]] [[FEM PulleyConstraint|Create FEM pulley constraint]]: To define a pulley constraint. * [[Image:Fem_Result.svg|32px]] [[FEM ShowResult|Show result]]: To display the result of the study (v.-Mises-Stress or displacement) <noinclude>[[Category:Template]]</noinclude>

* [[Image:Fem_FemMesh.svg|32px]] [[FEM Create/it|Crea mesh FEM ]]: Apre la finestra di meshing. Selezionare uno dei profili predefiniti o impostare i valori. * [[Image:Fem_Material.svg|32px]] [[FEM Material/it|Materiale...]]: Consente di selezionare un materiale dal database [0.14] Solo PLA è accettato. * [[Image:Fem_Analysis.svg|32px]] [[FEM Analysis/it|Nuova analisi]]: Crea una nuova analisi meccanica statica. Se si seleziona un solido (nella vista ad albero) prima di fare clic su di esso, nella finestra meshing viene aperto il solido seccessivo. * [[Image:Fem_NewAnalysis.svg|32px]] [[FEM Calculation/it|Calcola]]: Apre il Menu per avviare il Calculix-Solver. * [[Image:Fem_FemMesh_createnodebypoly.svg|32px]] [[FEM DefineNodes/it|Definisci/crea un set di nodi... ]]: Definisce e crea un set di nodi. [0.14] Non ancora implementato. * [[Image:Fem_ConstraintFixed.svg|32px]] [[FEM FixedConstraint/it|Crea vincolo fisso]]: Per definire un vincolo fisso su punto / bordo / faccia (e) * [[Image:Fem_ConstraintForce.svg|32px]] [[FEM ForceConstraint/it|Crea vincolo forza]]: Per definire una forza in N applicata uniformemente ad una faccia selezionabile, nella direzione definibile. * [[Image:Fem_ConstraintBearing.svg|32px]] [[FEM BearingConstraint/it|Crea vincolo cuscinetto]]: Per definire un vincolo cuscinetto. * [[Image:Fem_ConstraintGear.svg|32px]] [[FEM GearConstraint/it|Crea vincolo ingranaggio]]: Per definire un vincolo ingranaggio. * [[Image:Fem_ConstraintPulley.svg|32px]] [[FEM PulleyConstraint/it|Crea vincolo puleggia]]: Per definire un vincolo puleggia. * [[Image:Fem_Result.svg|32px]] [[FEM ShowResult/it|Mostra i risultati]]: Per visualizzare il risultato dello studio (v.-Mises-Stress o spostamento) <noinclude>[[Category:Template/it]]</noinclude>

{|class="wikitable ct" width=100% height=100% style="float: right; width: 230px; margin-left: 1em" | | class="ctTitle"| === [[Image:{{{Name}}}.png|32px]] {{{Name}}} === |- ! class="ctOdd"|Menu location |- | class="ctEven"|{{{MenuLocation}}} |- ! class="ctOdd"|Workbenches |- | class="ctEven"|{{{Workbenches}}} |- ! class="ctOdd"|Default shortcut |- | class="ctEven"|{{{Shortcut|None}}} |- ! class="ctOdd"|See also |- | class="ctEven"|{{{SeeAlso|None}}} |- | class="ctToc"|
__TOC__ |} [[Category:User Documentation|!]] [[Category:Command Reference]] ==Usage== This Template is the main anchor on documenting GuiCommands. It should be inserted as the first line in new documents. The minimum code required for this template usage is: (sample result to right) 
{{GuiCommand|Name=SampleCommand|MenuLocation=Sample -> Command...|Workbenches=Wb1,Wb2}}
{{GuiCommand|Name=SampleCommand|MenuLocation=Sample -> Command...|Workbenches=Wb1,Wb2|Shortcut=DefaultShortcut|SeeAlso=OtherTopic}} ===Minimum Parameters=== The following parameters are used in the format [parameter]=[value], with each parameter in the list separated by a pipe symbol (|): ;Name : The properly capitalized name of the command to be documented. : The name is also used to retrieve the Icon graphic in .PNG format from the WIKI repository. ;MenuLocation : The location of the command in the FreeCAD menu structure. ;Workbenches : One or more workbenches in FreeCAD that the command and icon can be found on. ===Optional Parameters=== The following parameters are optional. If they are not included in the template code, they will default to a value of "None". ;Shortcut : The default Keyboard shortcut as found in FreeCAD. ;SeeAlso : Optional link to other related topics. ==Localization== The code required for this template is different if you are using a localized version. For more information see the [[Localisation#Translating_the_wiki|Localization]] page. * First, a localized version of this template must exist or be created. * The localized template must be named: 
Template:GuiCommand/AA
where '''''/AA''''' is the 2 letter code for the desired language, for example '''''/fr''''' = French localization. * The method for calling the localized GuiCommand template in a GuiCommand document is: 
{{GuiCommand/AA|Name=SampleCommand|Name/AA=SampleCommand/AA|MenuLocation=Sample -> Commande...|Workbenches=Wb1,Wb2}}
where '''''/AA''''' is the 2 letter code for the desired language, for example '''''/fr''''' = French localization. ** In the sample code above, the ''Name'' parameter format is critical. The ''Name=SampleCommand'' allows the correct icon file to be displayed, which is not normally localized. The ''Name/AA=SampleCommand/AA'' displays the correct localized version of the GUI command documentation. * Make sure you add the localized version of this template to the Languages list below. ==GuiCommand Model== For a complete model of a GuiCommand, see [[GuiCommand model]].

{|class="wikitable ct" width=100% height=100% style="float: right; width: 230px; margin-left: 1em" | | class="ctTitle"| === [[Image:{{{Name}}}.png|32px]] {{{Name/cs}}} === |- ! class="ctOdd"|Umístění Menu |- | class="ctEven"|{{{MenuLocation|Nikdo}}} |- ! class="ctOdd"|Workbenches |- | class="ctEven"|{{{Workbenches}}} |- ! class="ctOdd"|Výchozí zástupce |- | class="ctEven"|{{{Shortcut|Nikdo}}} |- ! class="ctOdd"|Viz také |- | class="ctEven"|{{{SeeAlso|Nikdo}}} |- | class="ctToc"|

Minimální kód pro použití této šablony je: (výsledek příkladu je vpravo) This Template is the main anchor on documenting GuiCommands. It should be inserted as the first line in new documents. The minimum code required for this template usage is: (sample result to right) 
{{GuiCommand/cs|Name=SampleCommand|Name/cs=TestCommand/cs|MenuLocation=Sample -> Command...|Workbenches=Wb1,Wb2}}
== == {{GuiCommand/cs|Name=FreeCAD04|Name/cs=Ukázka Command|MenuLocation=Sample -> Command...|Workbenches=Wb1,Wb2|Shortcut=DefaultShortcut|SeeAlso=OtherTopic}} ===Minimální parametry=== Následující parametry jsou použity ve formátu [parametr]=[hodnota], kde jsou parametry vzájemně odděleny znakem potrubí (|): ;Name : Jméno příkazu, který bude dokumentován, s velkými písmeny na začátku každého slova ve jméně : Jméno je také použito pro získání grafické ikony ve formátu .png z repozitáře WIKI ;MenuLocation : Umístění příkazu ve struktuře menu FreeCADu ;Workbenches : Jedna nebo více pracovních ploch FreeCADu ve kterých může být příkaz a ikona umístěna ===Volitelné parametery=== Následující parametry jsou volitelné. Jestliže nejsou zadány v kódu šablony, jsou defaultně nastaveny na hodnotu "None". ;Shortcut : Defaultní klávesová zkratka jaká je ve FreeCADu. ;SeeAlso : Volitelný odkaz na další související témata. ===Minimum Parameters=== The following parameters are used in the format [parameter]=[value], with each parameter in the list separated by a pipe symbol (|): ;Name : The properly capitalized name of the command to be documented. : The name is also used to retrieve the Icon graphic in .PNG format from the WIKI repository. ;MenuLocation : The location of the command in the FreeCAD menu structure. ;Workbenches : One or more workbenches in FreeCAD that the command and icon can be found on. ===Optional Parameters=== The following parameters are optional. If they are not included in the template code, they will default to a value of "None". ;Shortcut : The default Keyboard shortcut as found in FreeCAD. ;SeeAlso : Optional link to other related topics. ==Localization== The code required for this template is different if you are using a localized version. For more information see the [[Localisation#Translating_the_wiki|Localization]] page. * First, a localized version of this template must exist or be created. * The localized template must be named: 
Template:GuiCommand/AA
where '''''/AA''''' is the 2 letter code for the desired language, for example '''''/fr''''' = French localization. * The method for calling the localized GuiCommand template in a GuiCommand document is: 
{{GuiCommand/AA|Name=SampleCommand|Name/AA=SampleCommand/AA|MenuLocation=Sample -> Commande...|Workbenches=Wb1,Wb2}}
where '''''/AA''''' is the 2 letter code for the desired language, for example '''''/fr''''' = French localization. ** In the sample code above, the ''Name'' parameter format is critical. The ''Name=SampleCommand'' allows the correct icon file to be displayed, which is not normally localized. The ''Name/AA=SampleCommand/AA'' displays the correct localized version of the GUI command documentation. * Make sure you add the localized version of this template to the Languages list below. ==GuiCommand Model== For a complete model of a GuiCommand, see [[GuiCommand model]].

{|class="wikitable ct" width=100% height=100% style="float: right; width: 200px;" | | class="ctTitle"| === [[Image:{{{Name}}}.png|32px]] {{{Name/de}}} === |- ! class="ctOdd"|Menüeintrag |- | class="ctEven"|{{{MenuLocation}}} |- ! class="ctOdd"|Arbeitsbereich |- | class="ctEven"|{{{Workbenches}}} |- ! class="ctOdd"|Standardtastenkürzel |- | class="ctEven"|{{{Shortcut|None}}} |- ! class="ctOdd"|Siehe auch |- | class="ctEven"|{{{SeeAlso|None}}} |- | class="ctToc"|
__TOC__ |} [[Category:User Documentation/de|!]] [[Category:Command Reference/de]] ==Anwendung== Dieses Template ist die Standardvorlage um GuiCommands zu dokumentieren. Es sollte als erste Zeile in neue Dokumente eingefügt werden. Der minimale Code zur Verwendung dieses Templates ist (Beispiel siehe rechts): 
{{GuiCommand/de|Name=SampleCommand|Name/de=Testkommando|
      MenuLocation=Test -> Kommando...|Workbenches=Wb1,Wb2}}
{{GuiCommand/de|Name=SampleCommand|Name/de=Testkommando|MenuLocation=Test -> Kommando...|Workbenches=Wb1,Wb2}} ===Minimaler Parametersatz=== Die folgenden Parameter werden im Format [Parameter]=[Wert] verwendet, wobei die Parameter getrennt durch das Pipesymbol (|) zu einer Liste zusammengefasst werden.: ;Name : der korrekte, großgeschriebene Name des dokumentierten Kommandos : Der Name wird ebenfalls verwendet, um die Icon-Grafik im .PNG-Format aus dem Wiki-Repository zu wählen. ;MenuLocation : der Ort des Kommandos in der FreeCAD-Menüstruktur ;Workbenches : ein oder mehrere Arbeitsumgebungen in FreeCAD, die das Kommando oder Icon zur Verfügung stellen ===Optionale Parameter=== Die folgenden Parameter sind optional. Falls sie im Templatecode nicht enthalten sind, wird der voreingestellte Wert "None" verwendet: ;Shortcut : das voreingestellte Tastenkürzel in FreeCAD ;SeeAlso : optionaler Link zu ähnlichem Thema ==Übersetzung== Der für dieses Template nötige Code unterscheidet sich in übersetzten Versionen vom Original. Mehr Informationen zum Thema sind auf der [[Localisation#Translating_the_wiki|Localization]]-Seite zu finden. * Als erstes muss eine übersetzte Version des Templates erzeugt werden. * Das übersetzte Template muss 
Template:GuiCommand/AA
benannt werden, wobei '''''/AA''''' der 2-buchstabige Sprachcode, wie z.B. '''''/fr''''' = Französisch, ist. * Folgende Syntax wird verwendet, um das übersetzte GuiCommand-Template in einem GuiCommand-Dokument aufzurufen: 
{{GuiCommand/AA|Name=SampleCommand|Name/AA=SampleCommand/AA|MenuLocation=Beispiel -> Kommando...|Workbenches=Wb1,Wb2}}
Hierbei ist '''''/AA''''' wieder der 2-buchstabige Sprachcode, z.B. '''''/fr''''' = Fanzösisch. ** In obigem Beispielcode ist der Parameter ''Name'' entscheidend. Die Anweisung ''Name=SampleCommand'' erlaubt die automatische Auswahl des korrekten Icons und wird normalerweise nicht übersetzt. Die anschließende Anweisung ''Name/AA=SampleCommand/AA'' zeigt die korrekte Übersetzung aus der GUI-Kommando-Dokumentation. * Als letztes muss sichergestellt werden, dass die übersetzte Version dieses Templates in der unten stehenden Sprachliste aufgenommen wurde: {{clear}} {{languages | {{en|Template:GuiCommand}} {{de|Template:GuiCommand/de}} {{es|Template:GuiCommand/es}} {{fr|Template:GuiCommand/fr}} {{it|Template:GuiCommand/it}} {{jp|Template:GuiCommand/jp}}}} [[Category:Administration/de]] [[Category:Template/de]]

{|class="wikitable ct" width=100% height=100% style="float: right; width: 230px; margin-left: 1em" | | class="ctTitle"| === [[Image:{{{Name}}}.png|32px]] {{{Name}}} === |- ! class="ctOdd"|Menu location |- | class="ctEven"|{{{MenuLocation}}} |- ! class="ctOdd"|Workbenches |- | class="ctEven"|{{{Workbenches}}} |- ! class="ctOdd"|Default shortcut |- | class="ctEven"|{{{Shortcut|None}}} |- ! class="ctOdd"|See also |- | class="ctEven"|{{{SeeAlso|None}}} |- | class="ctToc"|
__TOC__ |} [[Category:User Documentation/en|!]] [[Category:Command Reference/en]] ==Usage== This Template is the main anchor on documenting GuiCommands. It should be inserted as the first line in new documents. The minimum code required for this template usage is: (sample result to right) 
{{GuiCommand/en|Name=SampleCommand|MenuLocation=Sample -> Command...|Workbenches=Wb1,Wb2}}
{{GuiCommand/en|Name=SampleCommand|MenuLocation=Sample -> Command...|Workbenches=Wb1,Wb2|Shortcut=DefaultShortcut|SeeAlso=OtherTopic}} ===Minimum Parameters=== The following parameters are used in the format [parameter]=[value], with each parameter in the list separated by a pipe symbol (|): ;Name : The properly capitalized name of the command to be documented. : The name is also used to retrieve the Icon graphic in .PNG format from the WIKI repository. ;MenuLocation : The location of the command in the FreeCAD menu structure. ;Workbenches : One or more workbenches in FreeCAD that the command and icon can be found on. ===Optional Parameters=== The following parameters are optional. If they are not included in the template code, they will default to a value of "None". ;Shortcut : The default Keyboard shortcut as found in FreeCAD. ;SeeAlso : Optional link to other related topics. ==Localization== The code required for this template is different if you are using a localized version. For more information see the [[Localisation#Translating_the_wiki|Localization]] page. * First, a localized version of this template must exist or be created. * The localized template must be named: 
Template:GuiCommand/AA
where '''''/AA''''' is the 2 letter code for the desired language, for example '''''/fr''''' = French localization. * The method for calling the localized GuiCommand template in a GuiCommand document is: 
{{GuiCommand/AA|Name=SampleCommand|Name/AA=SampleCommand/AA|MenuLocation=Sample -> Commande...|Workbenches=Wb1,Wb2}}
where '''''/AA''''' is the 2 letter code for the desired language, for example '''''/fr''''' = French localization. ** In the sample code above, the ''Name'' parameter format is critical. The ''Name=SampleCommand'' allows the correct icon file to be displayed, which is not normally localized. The ''Name/AA=SampleCommand/AA'' displays the correct localized version of the GUI command documentation. * Make sure you add the localized version of this template to the Languages list below. ==GuiCommand Model== For a complete model of a GuiCommand, see [[GuiCommand model]].

{|class="wikitable ct" width=100% height=100% style="float: right; width: 230px; margin-left: 1em" | | class="ctTitle"| === [[Image:{{{Name}}}.png|32px]] {{{Name}}} === |- ! class="ctOdd"|Ubicación en el Menú |- | class="ctEven"|{{{MenuLocation}}} |- ! class="ctOdd"|Entornos de trabajo |- | class="ctEven"|{{{Workbenches}}} |- ! class="ctOdd"|Atajo de teclado por defecto |- | class="ctEven"|{{{Shortcut|None}}} |- ! class="ctOdd"|Ver también |- | class="ctEven"|{{{SeeAlso|None}}} |- | class="ctToc"|

=GuiCommand/fr= {|class="wikitable ct" width=100% height=100% style="float: right; width: 230px; margin-left: 1em" | | class="ctTitle"| === [[Image:{{{Name}}}.png|32px]] {{{Name/fr}}} === |- ! class="ctOdd"|Emplacement du menu |- | class="ctEven"|{{{MenuLocation|Aucun}}} |- ! class="ctOdd"|Ateliers |- | class="ctEven"|{{{Workbenches}}} |- ! class="ctOdd"|Raccourci par défaut |- | class="ctEven"|{{{Shortcut|Aucun}}} |- ! class="ctOdd"|Voir aussi |- | class="ctEven"|{{{SeeAlso|Aucun}}} |- | class="ctToc"|
__TOC__ |} [[Category:User Documentation/fr|!]] [[Category:Command Reference/fr]] ==Utilisation== Ce modèle génère le cartouche (infobox) qui est situé à droite des pages documentant les commandes de l'interface graphique (GuiCommands). Ce cartouche inclut les informations essentielles sur la commande ainsi que la table des matières. Le modèle doit être inséré à la toute première ligne des nouveaux documents. Le code minimal requis pour l'utilisation de ce modèle est tel que ci-dessous (résultat affiché ci-contre à droite) : 
{{GuiCommand/fr|Name=SampleCommand|Name/fr=SampleCommand/fr|MenuLocation=Sample -> Commande...|Workbenches=Wb1,Wb2}}
{{GuiCommand/fr|Name=SampleCommand|Name/fr=SampleCommand/fr|MenuLocation=Sample -> Commande...|Workbenches=Wb1,Wb2}} ===Paramètres minimaux=== Les paramètres suivants sont utilisés au format [parametètre]=[valeur], avec chaque paramètre de la liste séparé par une barre verticale (|) : ;Name : Le nom de la commande à documenter, dans sa version d'origine anglaise, en respectant la capitalisation. : Le nom permet aussi d'extraire et d'afficher l'icône de la commande au format .PNG depuis le dépôt d'images du wiki. ;Name/fr : Le nom de la commande à documenter, dans sa traduction française. ;MenuLocation : L'emplacement de la commande dans la structure de menus de FreeCAD. ;Workbenches : Le ou les atelier(s) de FreeCAD où la commande peut être trouvée. ===Paramètres optionnels=== Les paramètres suivants sont optionnels. S'ils ne sont pas inclus dans le modèle, par défaut les champs correspondants afficheront « Aucun ». ;Shortcut : Le raccourci-clavier par défaut dans FreeCAD. ;SeeAlso : Lien optionnel vers des commandes connexes. ==Description== Description
[[image:FreeCAD05.png]] image

==Utilisation== # Utilisation ==Options== * {{OngletTache|Tâches}} : Onglet Tâches {{OngletTache|Texte}} : code pour l'onglet Tâche * Options ==Propriétés== * {{ProprieteVue|Propriétés}}: Propriétés Vue {{ProprieteVue|Texte}} : code pour le titre Propriété Vue * {{ProprieteDonnees|Propriétés}}: Propriétés Données {{ProprieteDonnees|Texte}} : code pour le titre Propriété Donnée ==Script== Script : (code balise pour colorer la syntaxe) code , : (code fin de balise) Exemple : (code balise pour colorer la syntaxe) code , : (code fin de balise) ==Autre (facultatif)==

{|class="wikitable ct" width=100% height=100% style="float: right; width: 230px; margin-left: 1em" | | class="ctTitle"| === [[Image:{{{Name}}}.png|32px]] {{{Name/it}}} === |- ! class="ctOdd"|Posizione nel menu |- | class="ctEven"|{{{MenuLocation|Nessuno}}} |- ! class="ctOdd"|Ambiente |- | class="ctEven"|{{{Workbenches}}} |- ! class="ctOdd"|Avvio veloce |- | class="ctEven"|{{{Shortcut|Nessuno}}} |- ! class="ctOdd"|Vedere anche |- | class="ctEven"|{{{SeeAlso|Nessuno}}} |- | class="ctToc"|
__NOTOC__ |} [[Category:User Documentation/it|!]] [[Category:Command Reference/it]] ==Utilizzo== Questo modello è il riferimento principale per la documentazione dei comandi GUI: 
{{GuiCommand/it|Name=TestCommand|Name/it=TestCommand/it|Shortcut=Ctrl+X|Workbenches=Wb1,Wb2}}
== == ==Descrizione del codice della finestra principale== Non è indispensabile inserire tutti i codici della finestra.
{{GuiCommand/it|Name=FreeCAD04|Name/it=Comando Test|Workbenches=[[Sketcher Workbench/it|Schizzo]], [[PartDesign Workbench/it|PartDesign]]|MenuLocation=Schizzo → Vincoli → Coincidenza|Shortcut=C|SeeAlso=[[Constraint Lock/it|Blocca]], [[Constraint PointOnObject/it|Punto su oggetto]]}} ===Esempio casuale:=== ''' {{ ''' = Apertura del codice della finestra GuiCommand.
''' GuiCommand/it ''' = Senza '''"/it"''' il menu è in inglese, aggiungendo '''"/it"''' si converte il menu in italiano.
''' | ''' = Separatore dei codici.
''' |Name= '''''FreeCAD04'' = Assegna il titolo alla finestra. '''Non deve essere modificato nè tradotto'''. E' anche il nome dell'icona del comando. Se esiste una immagine (.png) con quel nome, essa viene visualizzata (non utilizzare l'estensione del nome). Quando non esiste nessuna immagine (.png) con quel nome, viene visulizzato in rosso un link a un file mancante.
''' |Name/it= ''' ''Comando Test'' = Titolo in italiano che sostituisce il titolo precedente.
''' |Workbenches= ''' ''[[Sketcher Workbench/it|Schizzo]], [[PartDesign Workbench/it|PartDesign]]'' = Ambienti che utilizzano il comando ... e a cui si possono creare dei collegamenti.
''' |MenuLocation= ''' ''Schizzo → Vincoli → Coincidenza'' = Posizione del comando nel menu di FreeCAD.
''' |Shortcut= ''' ''C'' = Scorciatoia da tastiera.
''' |SeeAlso= ''' ''[[Constraint Lock/it|Blocca]], [[Constraint PointOnObject/it|Punto su oggetto]]'' = Altri comandi simili che possono fornire ulteriori informazioni... e a cui si possono creare dei collegamenti.
''' }} ''' = Chiusura del codice della finestra GuiCommand.
== == ==Descrizione== Inserire in questa posizione il testo per la descrizione del comando.
[[image:FreeCAD05.png]] Immagine descrittiva del comando.

==Utilizzo== # Descrivere il modo di utilizzo del comando. # xxxx. # Aggiungere eventuali collegamenti per la navigazione del manuale. ==Opzioni== * {{SchedaAzioni|Azione}}: Opzioni della scheda Azioni, operazioni eseguibili sull'oggetto, scostamento, rotazione, ecc. {{SchedaAzioni|Azione}} "Codice del titolo Azione" * Opzioni ==Proprietà== * {{ProprietaVista|Proprietà}}: Proprietà di visualizzazione dell'oggetto, tipo di linea, colore, ecc. {{ProprietaVista|Proprietà}} "Codice del titolo Vista" * {{ProprietaDati|Proprietà}}: Proprietà parametri dell'oggetto, nome, lunghezza, raggio, ecc. {{ProprietaDati|Proprietà}} "Codice del titolo Dati" ==Script== Script Codice del comando Esempio Esempio di utilizzo del codice ==Eventuali altre informazioni== ! {{clear}} [[Category:Command Reference/it]] [[Category:Template/it]] {{languages/it | {{en|GuiCommand_model}} {{es|GuiCommand_model/es}} {{fr|GuiCommand_model/fr}} {{jp|GuiCommand_model/jp}} }}

{|class="wikitable ct" width=100% height=100% style="float: right; width: 230px; margin-left: 1em" | | class="ctTitle"| === [[Image:{{{Name}}}.png|32px]] {{{Name/ru}}} === |- ! class="ctOdd"|Pасположение меню |- | class="ctEven"|{{{MenuLocation}}} |- ! class="ctOdd"|Workbenches |- | class="ctEven"|{{{Workbenches}}} |- ! class="ctOdd"|По умолчанию ярлык |- | class="ctEven"|{{{Shortcut|никто}}} |- ! class="ctOdd"|См. также |- | class="ctEven"|{{{SeeAlso|никто}}} |- | class="ctToc"|
__TOC__ |} [[Category:User Documentation/ru|!]] [[Category:Command Reference/ru]] ==Usage== This Template is the main anchor on documenting GuiCommands. It should be inserted as the first line in new documents. The minimum code required for this template usage is: (sample result to right) 
{{GuiCommand|Name=SampleCommand|MenuLocation=Sample -> Command...|Workbenches=Wb1,Wb2}}
{{GuiCommand/ru|Name=SampleCommand|Name/ru=SampleCommand|MenuLocation=Sample -> Command...|Workbenches=Wb1,Wb2|Shortcut=DefaultShortcut|SeeAlso=OtherTopic}} ===Minimum Parameters=== The following parameters are used in the format [parameter]=[value], with each parameter in the list separated by a pipe symbol (|): ;Name : The properly capitalized name of the command to be documented. : The name is also used to retrieve the Icon graphic in .PNG format from the WIKI repository. ;MenuLocation : The location of the command in the FreeCAD menu structure. ;Workbenches : One or more workbenches in FreeCAD that the command and icon can be found on. ===Optional Parameters=== The following parameters are optional. If they are not included in the template code, they will default to a value of "None". ;Shortcut : The default Keyboard shortcut as found in FreeCAD. ;SeeAlso : Optional link to other related topics. ==Localization== The code required for this template is different if you are using a localized version. For more information see the [[Localisation#Translating_the_wiki|Localization]] page. * First, a localized version of this template must exist or be created. * The localized template must be named: 
Template:GuiCommand/AA
where '''''/AA''''' is the 2 letter code for the desired language, for example '''''/fr''''' = French localization. * The method for calling the localized GuiCommand template in a GuiCommand document is: 
{{GuiCommand/AA|Name=SampleCommand|Name/AA=SampleCommand/AA|MenuLocation=Sample -> Commande...|Workbenches=Wb1,Wb2}}
where '''''/AA''''' is the 2 letter code for the desired language, for example '''''/fr''''' = French localization. ** In the sample code above, the ''Name'' parameter format is critical. The ''Name=SampleCommand'' allows the correct icon file to be displayed, which is not normally localized. The ''Name/AA=SampleCommand/AA'' displays the correct localized version of the GUI command documentation. * Make sure you add the localized version of this template to the Languages list below. ==GuiCommand Model== For a complete model of a GuiCommand, see [[GuiCommand model/ru|GuiCommand model]].

<noinclude> {{VeryImportantMessage|This template is used to welcome new users in of the wiki by placing it on their talk-page.}} Copy-paste-template: <nowiki>Hello <NewUserName>! {{subst:hello}} -- ~~~~</nowiki> [[Category:Administration]] </noinclude> welcome to the ''FreeCAD documentation wiki''. Thanks for participating in this project. There are a few places where new authors can find help. A good starting point is maybe [[Help:Editing|the help page]], that explains the most important editing features. If you are not familiar with wiki editing just try it in the [[FreeCADDocu:Sandbox|Sandbox]]. In general [[Wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] is a good place to find nice examples of media wiki usage.

{|border=1 class="mousemodel" !align=center width="25%"|Select !align=center width="25%"|Pan !align=center width="25%"|Zoom !align=center width="25%"|Rotate View |- align=center |[[Image:Hand_cursor.png]] |[[Image:Pan_cursor.png]] |[[Image:Zoom_cursor.png]] |[[Image:Rotate_cursor.png]] |- align=center |{{KEY|ctrl}} +[[Image:Select-mouse.svg|Alt=Mouse with left button clicked | to Select ]] |[[Image:Pan-mouse.svg |Alt=Mouse with middle button (scroll wheel) clicked | to Pan]] |[[Image:Zoom-mouse.svg |Alt=Mouse with scroll wheel rolling up or down | to Zoom in or out]] or [[Image:Rotate-mouse.svg|Alt=Mouse with middle button (scroll wheel) clicked first and held, and the left button clicked second. | to Zoom in or out]] |[[Image:Select-mouse.svg|Alt=Mouse with left button clicked | to Rotate ]] |-valign=top |Hold ctrl and press the left mouse button over an object you want to select. |Click the left mouse button and move the object around. |Use the mouse wheel to zoom in and out, or click and hold the middle mouse button and click the left mouse button. |Click and drag with the left mouse button to rotate |} <noinclude>[[Category:Template]]</noinclude>

{|border=1 class="mousemodel" !align=center width="25%"|Select !align=center width="25%"|Pan !align=center width="25%"|Zoom !align=center width="25%"|Rotate View |- align=center |[[Image:Hand_cursor.png]] |[[Image:Pan_cursor.png]] |[[Image:Zoom_cursor.png]] |[[Image:Rotate_cursor.png]] |- align=center |{{KEY|ctrl}} +[[Image:Select-mouse.svg|Alt=Mouse with left button clicked | to Select ]] |[[Image:Pan-mouse.svg |Alt=Mouse with middle button (scroll wheel) clicked | to Pan]] |[[Image:Zoom-mouse.svg |Alt=Mouse with scroll wheel rolling up or down | to Zoom in or out]] or [[Image:Rotate-mouse.svg|Alt=Mouse with middle button (scroll wheel) clicked first and held, and the left button clicked second. | to Zoom in or out]] |[[Image:Select-mouse.svg|Alt=Mouse with left button clicked | to Rotate ]] |-valign=top |Hold ctrl and press the left mouse button over an object you want to select. |Click the left mouse button and move the object around. |Use the mouse wheel to zoom in and out, or click and hold the middle mouse button and click the left mouse button. |Click and drag with the left mouse button to rotate |} <noinclude>[[Category:Template/cs]]</noinclude>

{|border=1 !align=center width="25%"|Auswählen !align=center width="25%"|Bewegen !align=center width="25%"|Zoom !align=center width="25%"|Ansicht drehen |- align=center |[[Image:Hand_cursor.png]] |[[Image:Pan_cursor.png]] |[[Image:Zoom_cursor.png]] |[[Image:Rotate_cursor.png]] |- align=center |{{KEY|Strg}} +[[Image:Select-mouse.svg|Alt=Mouse with left button clicked | to Select ]] |[[Image:Pan-mouse.svg |Alt=Mouse with middle button (scroll wheel) clicked | to Pan]] |[[Image:Zoom-mouse.svg |Alt=Mouse with scroll wheel rolling up or down | to Zoom in or out]] oder [[Image:Rotate-mouse.svg|Alt=Mouse with middle button (scroll wheel) clicked first and held, and the left button clicked second. | to Zoom in or out]] |[[Image:Select-mouse.svg|Alt=Mouse with left button clicked | to Rotate ]] |-valign=top |Halten Sie die Strg-Taste gedrückt und drücken Sie die linke Maustaste über einem Objekt, das Sie auswählen möchten. |Klicken Sie den linken Maus-Knopf und bewegen Sie das Objekt herum. |Mit dem Mausrad vergrößern oder verkleinern, oder klicken und halten Sie die mittlere Maustaste gedrückt und klicken mit der linken Maustaste. |Klicken und ziehen Sie Objekte mit der linken Maustaste zum rotieren. |} <noinclude>[[Category:Template/de]]</noinclude>

{|border=1 !align=center width="25%"|Selección !align=center width="25%"|Encuadre !align=center width="25%"|Zoom !align=center width="25%"|Rotar vista |- align=center |[[Image:Hand_cursor.png]] |[[Image:Pan_cursor.png]] |[[Image:Zoom_cursor.png]] |[[Image:Rotate_cursor.png]] |- align=center |{{KEY|ctrl}} +[[Image:Select-mouse.svg|Alt=Mouse with left button clicked | para seleccionar ]] |[[Image:Pan-mouse.svg |Alt=Mouse with middle button (scroll wheel) clicked | para encuadrar]] |[[Image:Zoom-mouse.svg |Alt=Mouse with scroll wheel rolling up or down | para hacer Zoom in o Zoom out]] o [[Image:Rotate-mouse.svg|Alt=Mouse with middle button (scroll wheel) clicked first and held, and the left button clicked second. | para hacer Zoom in o Zoom out]] |[[Image:Select-mouse.svg|Alt=Mouse with left button clicked | para Rotar la vista ]] |-valign=top |Manten pulsado CTRL y presiona el botón izquierdo del ratón sobre un objeto que quieras seleccionar. |Pulsa el botón izquierdo del ratón y mover cerca del objeto. |Utiliza la rueda del ratón para hacer zoom in y zoom out, o pulsa y manten presionado el botón central y pulsa el botón izquierdo del ratón. |Pulsa y arrastra con el botón izquierdo para rotar la vista |} <noinclude>[[Category:Template/es]]</noinclude>

{|border=1 class="mousemodel" !align=center width="25%"|Select !align=center width="25%"|Pan !align=center width="25%"|Zoom !align=center width="25%"|Rotate View |- align=center |[[Image:Hand_cursor.png]] |[[Image:Pan_cursor.png]] |[[Image:Zoom_cursor.png]] |[[Image:Rotate_cursor.png]] |- align=center |{{KEY|ctrl}} +[[Image:Select-mouse.svg|Alt=Mouse with left button clicked | to Select ]] |[[Image:Pan-mouse.svg |Alt=Mouse with middle button (scroll wheel) clicked | to Pan]] |[[Image:Zoom-mouse.svg |Alt=Mouse with scroll wheel rolling up or down | to Zoom in or out]] or [[Image:Rotate-mouse.svg|Alt=Mouse with middle button (scroll wheel) clicked first and held, and the left button clicked second. | to Zoom in or out]] |[[Image:Select-mouse.svg|Alt=Mouse with left button clicked | to Rotate ]] |-valign=top |Maintenez enfoncée la touche ctrl et appuyez sur le bouton gauche de la souris au-dessus de l'objet que vous souhaitez sélectionner. |Cliquez sur le bouton gauche de la souris et déplacer l'objet. |Utilisez la molette de la souris pour zoomer et dézoomer, ou appuyez et maintenez le bouton central de la souris et cliquez sur le bouton gauche de la souris. |Cliquez le bouton gauche de la souris et faites glisser avec pour faire pivoter |} <noinclude>[[Category:Template/fr]]</noinclude>

{|border=1 class="mousemodel" !align=center width="25%"|Selezione !align=center width="25%"|Traslazione !align=center width="25%"|Zoom !align=center width="25%"|Rotazione |- align=center |[[Image:Hand_cursor.png]] |[[Image:Pan_cursor.png]] |[[Image:Zoom_cursor.png]] |[[Image:Rotate_cursor.png]] |- align=center |{{KEY|ctrl}} +[[Image:Select-mouse.svg|Alt=Mouse with left button clicked | per selezionare ]] |[[Image:Pan-mouse.svg |Alt=Mouse with middle button (scroll wheel) clicked | per traslare]] |[[Image:Zoom-mouse.svg |Alt=Mouse with scroll wheel rolling up or down | to Zoom in or out]] o [[Image:Rotate-mouse.svg|Alt=Mouse with middle button (scroll wheel) clicked first and held, and the left button clicked second. | per ingrandire o ridurre]] |[[Image:Select-mouse.svg|Alt=Mouse with left button clicked | per ruotare la vista ]] |-valign=top |Tenere premuto Ctrl e premere il pulsante sinistro del mouse su un oggetto che si desidera selezionare. |Fare clic sul pulsante sinistro del mouse e spostare l'oggetto. |Utilizzare la rotellina del mouse per ingrandire e rimpicciolire, oppure cliccare e tenete premuto il tasto centrale del mouse e fare clic con il pulsante sinistro del mouse. |Fare clic con il tasto sinistro del mouse e trascinare per ruotare. |} <noinclude>[[Category:Administration/it]] [[Category:Template/it]]</noinclude>

{|border=1 !align=center width="25%"|選択 !align=center width="25%"|平行移動 !align=center width="25%"|拡大縮小 !align=center width="25%"|回転表示 |- align=center |[[Image:Hand_cursor.png]] |[[Image:Pan_cursor.png]] |[[Image:Zoom_cursor.png]] |[[Image:Rotate_cursor.png]] |- align=center |{{KEY|ctrl}} +[[Image:Select-mouse.svg|Alt=Mouse with left button clicked | to Select ]] |[[Image:Pan-mouse.svg |Alt=Mouse with middle button (scroll wheel) clicked | to Pan]] |[[Image:Zoom-mouse.svg |Alt=Mouse with scroll wheel rolling up or down | to Zoom in or out]] or [[Image:Rotate-mouse.svg|Alt=Mouse with middle button (scroll wheel) clicked first and held, and the left button clicked second. | to Zoom in or out]] |[[Image:Select-mouse.svg|Alt=Mouse with left button clicked | to Rotate ]] |-valign=top |Ctrlを押したまま選択したいオブジェクトの上で左マウスボタンをクリックしてください |左マウスボタンをクリックしてオブジェクトの周りを動かしてください |拡大縮小にはマウスホイールを使うか、中央マウスボタンを押したまま左マウスボタンをクリックしてください。 |回転には左マウスボタンをクリックしてからドラッグしてください。 |} <noinclude>[[Category:Template/jp]]</noinclude>

Используйте этот шаблон для всех страниц, которые вы перевели, например: {{languages/ru | {{en|About_FreeCAD}} {{es|About_FreeCAD/es}} {{fr|About_FreeCAD/fr}} {{pl|About_FreeCAD/pl}} {{se|About_FreeCAD/se}} {{de|About_FreeCAD/de}} (другие языки, если доступны "in alphabetic order, except english that goes first") }} [[Category:Template/ru]]

{{Note|title|contents}}: Use this template to display a block of text inside a grey box
not used [[Category:Pages_to_delete]]
TÂCHES '''{{{1}}}''' ---- Utilisez ce modèle lorsque vous souhaitez afficher un onglet Tâche, par exemple : {{OngletTache|Texte}} [[Category:Administration/fr]]

* [[Image:OpenSCAD_ColorCodeShape.png|32px]] [[OpenSCAD_ColorCodeShape|Color Code Shape]]: Change the Color of selected or all Shapes based on their validity * [[Image:OpenSCAD_ReplaceObject.png|32px]] [[OpenSCAD_ReplaceObject|Replace Object]]: Replace an object in the Feature Tree. Please select old, new and parent object * [[Image:OpenSCAD_RemoveSubtree.png|32px]] [[OpenSCAD_RemoveSubtree|Remove Subtree]]: Removes the selected objects and all children that are not referenced from other objects * [[Image:OpenSCAD_RefineShapeFeature.png|32px]] [[OpenSCAD_RefineShapeFeature|Refine Shape Feature]]: Create Refine Shape Feature * [[Image:OpenSCAD_IncreaseTolerance.png|32px]] [[OpenSCAD_IncreaseTolerance|Increase Tolerance Feature]]: * [[Image:OpenSCAD_Edgestofaces.png|32px]] [[OpenSCAD_Edgestofaces|Convert Edges To Faces]]: Convert Edges to Faces. Useful to prepare imported DXF geometry for extrusion. * [[Image:OpenSCAD_ExpandPlacements.png|32px]] [[OpenSCAD_ExpandPlacements|Expand Placements]]: Expand all placements downwards the FeatureTree * [[Image:OpenSCAD_ExplodeGroup.png|32px]] [[OpenSCAD_ExplodeGroup|Explode Group]]: * [[Image:OpenSCAD_AddOpenSCADElement.png|32px]] [[OpenSCAD_AddOpenSCADElement|Add OpenSCAD Element]]: Add an OpenSCAD element by entering OpenSCAD code into the task panel and executing the OpenSCAD binary (requires OpenSCAD to be installed on your computer) Note: This icon will initially not appear (even if OpenSCAD is installed on your computer), you must also configure FreeCAD. [[https://sourceforge.net/apps/mediawiki/free-cad/index.php?title=OpenSCAD_AddOpenSCADElement#Initial_set_up_from_within_FreeCAD See here for more details]] * [[Image:OpenSCAD_MeshBoolean.png|32px]] [[OpenSCAD_MeshBoolean|Mesh Boolean...]]: * [[Image:OpenSCAD_Hull.png|32px]] [[OpenSCAD_Hull|Hull]]: * [[Image:OpenSCAD_Minkowski.png|32px]] [[OpenSCAD_Minkowski|Minkowski]]: <noinclude>[[Category:Template]]</noinclude>

* [[Image:OpenSCAD_ColorCodeShape.png|32px]] [[OpenSCAD_ColorCodeShape/es|ColorCodeShape]]: Cambia el color de la selección o todas las formas basadas en su validez * [[Image:OpenSCAD_Edgestofaces.png|32px]] [[OpenSCAD_Edgestofaces/es|Aristas a caras]]: Convierte aristas a caras. Útil para preparar geometría DXF importada para su extrusión. * [[Image:OpenSCAD_RefineShapeFeature.png|32px]] [[OpenSCAD_RefineShapeFeature/es|Refinar operación de forma]]: Crea una operación de forma refinada * [[Image:OpenSCAD_ExpandPlacements.png|32px]] [[OpenSCAD_ExpandPlacements/es|Expandir ubicación]]: Expande todas las ubicaciones por debajo del árbol de operaciones * [[Image:OpenSCAD_ReplaceObject.png|32px]] [[OpenSCAD_ReplaceObject/es|Reemplazar objeto]]: Reemplaza una objeto en el árbol de operaciones. Por favor, selecciona los objetos antiguos, nuevos y padres * [[Image:OpenSCAD_RemoveSubtree.png|32px]] [[OpenSCAD_RemoveSubtree/es|Eliminar sub-árbol]]: Elimina los objetos seleccionados y todos sus descendientes que no estén referenciados desde otros objetos * [[Image:OpenSCAD_AddOpenSCADElement.png|32px]] [[OpenSCAD_AddOpenSCADElement/es|Añadir elementos OpenSCAD]]: Añade un elemento OpenSCAD introduciendo código OpenSCAD en el panel de tareas y ejecutando el binario de OpenSCAD (requiere de OpenSCAD) <noinclude>[[Category:Template/es]]</noinclude>

* [[Image:OpenSCAD_ColorCodeShape.png|32px]] [[OpenSCAD_ColorCodeShape/fr|ColorCodeShape]]: Change la couleur de la sélection, ou toutes les formes en fonction de leurs validités. * [[Image:OpenSCAD_ReplaceObject.png|32px]] [[OpenSCAD_ReplaceObject/fr|ReplaceObject]]: Remplacer un objet dans l'arborescence des fonctionnalités. Veuillez sélectionner les anciennes, les nouvelles et les objets parents. * [[Image:OpenSCAD_RemoveSubtree.png|32px]] [[OpenSCAD_RemoveSubtree/fr|RemoveSubtree]]: Supprime les objets sélectionnés, et, toute la descendance qui n'est pas référencée et provenant d'autres objets. * [[Image:OpenSCAD_RefineShapeFeature.png|32px]] [[OpenSCAD_RefineShapeFeature/fr|RefineShapeFeature]]: Créer et affiner les caractéristiques de la forme. * [[Image:OpenSCAD_IncreaseTolerance.png|32px]] [[OpenSCAD_IncreaseTolerance/fr|Increase Tolerance Feature]]: * [[Image:OpenSCAD_Edgestofaces.png|32px]] [[OpenSCAD_Edgestofaces/fr|Edgestofaces]]: Convertir les Bords en Faces. Utile pour préparer les formes géométriques '''DXF''' importées, pour les extruder. * [[Image:OpenSCAD_ExpandPlacements.png|32px]] [[OpenSCAD_ExpandPlacements/fr|ExpandPlacements]]: Développe toutes les étapes vers le bas. * [[Image:OpenSCAD_ExplodeGroup.png|32px]] [[OpenSCAD_ExplodeGroup/fr|Explode Group]]: * [[Image:OpenSCAD_AddOpenSCADElement.png|32px]] [[OpenSCAD_AddOpenSCADElement/fr|AddOpenSCADElement]]: Ajoute un élément OpenSCAD en entrant le code OpenSCAD dans le panneau de tâches et exécute le binaire OpenSCAD (OpenSCAD doit être installé sur votre ordinateur) Remarque: Cet icône pas (même si OpenSCAD est installé sur votre ordinateur), vous devez également configurer FreeCAD. [https://sourceforge.net/apps/mediawiki/free-cad/index.php?title=OpenSCAD_AddOpenSCADElement#Initial_set_up_from_within_FreeCAD Voir ici pour plus de détails] * [[Image:OpenSCAD_MeshBoolean.png|32px]] [[OpenSCAD_MeshBoolean/fr|Mesh Boolean...]]: * [[Image:OpenSCAD_Hull.png|32px]] [[OpenSCAD_Hull/fr|Hull]]: * [[Image:OpenSCAD_Minkowski.png|32px]] [[OpenSCAD_Minkowski/fr|Minkowski]]: <noinclude>[[Category:Template/fr]]</noinclude>

* [[Image:OpenSCAD_ColorCodeShape.png|32px]] [[OpenSCAD_ColorCodeShape/it|Codice Colore Forma]]: Cambia il colore della forma selezionata o di tutte le forme in base alla loro validità * [[Image:OpenSCAD_ReplaceObject.png|32px]] [[OpenSCAD_ReplaceObject/it|Sostituisci Oggetto]]: Sostituisce un oggetto nell'albero delle operazioni. Selezionare l'oggetto vecchio, il nuovo e il genitore * [[Image:OpenSCAD_RemoveSubtree.png|32px]] [[OpenSCAD_RemoveSubtree/it|Elimina Ramo]]: Rimuove gli oggetti selezionati e tutti i suoi figli che non sono referenziati da altri oggetti * [[Image:OpenSCAD_RefineShapeFeature.png|32px]] [[OpenSCAD_RefineShapeFeature/it|Affina Forma]]: Crea una operazione di affinatura della forma * [[Image:OpenSCAD_IncreaseTolerance.png|32px]] [[OpenSCAD_IncreaseTolerance/it|Increase Tolerance Feature]]: * [[Image:OpenSCAD_Edgestofaces.png|32px]] [[OpenSCAD_Edgestofaces/it|Bordi in Facce]]: Converte i bordi (contorni) in facce. Utile per preparare la geometria DXF importata per essere estrusa. * [[Image:OpenSCAD_ExpandPlacements.png|32px]] [[OpenSCAD_ExpandPlacements/it|Espandi Posizioni]]: Espande tutte le posizioni della struttura delle operazioni verso il basso * [[Image:OpenSCAD_ExplodeGroup.png|32px]] [[OpenSCAD_ExplodeGroup/it|Explode Group]]: * [[Image:OpenSCAD_AddOpenSCADElement.png|32px]] [[OpenSCAD_AddOpenSCADElement/it|Aggiungi Elementi OpenSCAD]]: Aggiunge un elemento OpenSCAD inserendo il codice OpenSCAD nel pannello delle azioni ed esegue il binario di OpenSCAD (richiede OpenSCAD installato) Nota: Inizialmente non apparirà questa icona (anche se OpenSCAD è installato sul computer), è necessario configurare anche FreeCAD. [[https://sourceforge.net/apps/mediawiki/free-cad/index.php?title=OpenSCAD_AddOpenSCADElement#Initial_set_up_from_within_FreeCAD Vedere qui per maggiori dettagli]] * [[Image:OpenSCAD_MeshBoolean.png|32px]] [[OpenSCAD_MeshBoolean/it|Mesh Boolean...]]: * [[Image:OpenSCAD_Hull.png|32px]] [[OpenSCAD_Hull/it|Hull]]: * [[Image:OpenSCAD_Minkowski.png|32px]] [[OpenSCAD_Minkowski/it|Minkowski]]: <noinclude>[[Category:Administration/it]] [[Category:Template/it]]</noinclude>
