'''{{{1}}}'''<noinclude> ----
Use this template where you want to show a parameter, for example: <nowiki>{{Parameter|Length}}</nowiki>
[[Category:Administration]] </noinclude>
not used [[Category:Pages_to_delete]]

===Vue combinée → Projet → Vue===
[[Image:Part_Boolean_Proprietes_Vue.png|240px|left]] {{TitreProprietes|Base}} * {{ProprieteVue|Bounding Box}} : Permet de visualiser l'occupation, et, les dimensions hors tout, de l'objet dans l'espace. Valeur {{FALSE}}, ou {{TRUE}} (Défaut, {{FALSE}}). * {{ProprieteVue|Control Point}} : Valeur {{FALSE}}, ou {{TRUE}} (Défaut, {{FALSE}}). * {{ProprieteVue|Deviation}} : (Défaut, '''0,50'''). * {{ProprieteVue|Display Mode}} : Mode d'affichage de la forme, '''Flat lines, Shaded, Wireframe, Points''' [[Image:Vue_DisplayModePartDesign_fr_00.png|96px]]. (Défaut, '''Flat lines'''). * {{ProprieteVue|Lighting}} : Éclairage '''One side, Two side''' [[Image:Vue_Lighting_fr_00.png|96px]]. (Défaut, '''Two side'''). * {{ProprieteVue|Line Color}} : Donne la couleur de la ligne (bords). (Défaut, '''25, 25, 25'''). * {{ProprieteVue|Line Width}} : Donne l'épaisseur de la ligne (bords). (Défaut, '''2'''). * {{ProprieteVue|Point Color}} : Donne la couleur des points (extrémités de la forme). (Défaut, '''25, 25, 25'''). * {{ProprieteVue|Point Size}} : Donne la dimension des points. (Défaut, '''2'''). * {{ProprieteVue|Selectable}} : Autorise la sélection de la forme. Valeur {{FALSE}}, ou {{TRUE}} (Defaut, {{TRUE}}). * {{ProprieteVue|Shape Color}} : Donne la couleur de la forme. (Défaut, '''204, 204, 204'''). * {{ProprieteVue|Transparency}} : Règle le degrés de transparence de la forme, de '''0''' à '''100'''. (Défaut, '''0'''). * {{ProprieteVue|Visibility}} : Détermine la visibilité de la forme (comme la barre {{KEY|ESPACE}}). Valeur {{FALSE}}, ou {{TRUE}} (Défaut, {{TRUE}}). {{clear}} ===Vue combinée → Projet → Données===
[[Image:Part_Boolean_Proprietes_Donnees.png|240px|left]] {{TitreProprietes|Base}} {{ProprieteDonnees|Label}} : Nom de l'objet, modifiable à volonté. {{ProprieteDonnees|Placement}} : [('''0,00 0,00 1,00''');'''0,00''';('''0,00 0,00 0,00''')], donne l'ensemble des données '''Axis, Angle''', et, '''Position''' ci dessous.
Si vous sélectionnez, le titre '''Placement''', un bouton avec {{KEY|trois petits points}} s'affiche [[Image:Tache_Placement_01_fr_00.png|256px|Options Placement]], en cliquant sur ce bouton {{KEY|''' ... '''}}, vous avez accès à la fenêtre d'options '''[[Tasks_Placement/fr|Tâche Placement]]'''. * {{ProprieteDonnees|Angle}} : Angle de rotation en degrés, par rapport aux coordonnées '''X, Y, Z''' * {{ProprieteDonnees|Axis}} : Sélection de l'axe(s) de rotation de travail '''X, Y''', ou '''Z'''. (Défaut, '''Z = 1 = actif''') * {{ProprieteDonnees|Position}} : Déplacement des coordonnées '''X, Y, Z''', par rapport aux points d'origine '''0, 0, 0'''. {{clear}} [[Category:Template/fr]]
not used [[Category:Pages_to_delete]]
not used [[Category:Pages_to_delete]]

===''' Base '''=== * {{ProprieteVue|Bounding Box}} : Permet de visualiser l'occupation, et, les dimensions hors tout, de l'objet dans l'espace. Valeur {{FALSE}}, ou {{TRUE}} (Défaut, {{FALSE}}). * {{ProprieteVue|Control Point}} : Valeur {{FALSE}}, ou {{TRUE}} (Défaut, {{FALSE}}). * {{ProprieteVue|Deviation}} : * {{ProprieteVue|Display Mode}} : Mode d'affichage de la forme, '''Flat lines, Shaded, Wireframe, Points''' [[IMAGE:Vue_DisplayModePartDesign_fr_00.png|96px]]. (Défaut, '''Flat lines'''). * {{ProprieteVue|Lighting}} : Éclairage '''One side, Two side''' [[IMAGE:Vue_Lighting_fr_00.png|96px]]. (Défaut, '''Two side'''). * {{ProprieteVue|Line Color}} : Donne la couleur de la ligne (bords) (Défaut, '''25, 25, 25'''). * {{ProprieteVue|Line Width}} : Donne l'épaisseur de la ligne (bords) (Défaut, '''2'''). * {{ProprieteVue|Point Color}} : Donne la couleur des points (extrémités de la forme) (Défaut, '''25, 25, 25'''). * {{ProprieteVue|Point Size}} : Donne la dimension des points (Défaut, '''2'''). * {{ProprieteVue|Selectable}} : Autorise la sélection de la forme. Valeur {{FALSE}}, ou {{TRUE}} (Défaut, {{TRUE}}). * {{ProprieteVue|Shape Color}} : Donne la couleur de la forme (Défaut, '''204, 204, 204'''). * {{ProprieteVue|Transparency}} : Règle le degrés de transparence de la forme, de '''0''' à '''100''' (Défaut, '''0'''). * {{ProprieteVue|Visibility}} : Détermine la visibilité de la forme (comme la barre {{KEY|ESPACE}}). Valeur {{FALSE}}, ou {{TRUE}} (Défaut, {{TRUE}}). {{clear}} [[Category:Administration/fr]]
not used [[Category:Pages_to_delete]]
not used [[Category:Pages_to_delete]]

revision.text:
====Extra====
Alcune funzionalità opzionali che sono state create per l'ambiente Progettazione Parte (PartDesign Workbench):
* [[Image:PartDesign_WizardShaft.png|32px]] [[PartDesign_WizardShaft/it|Progettazione guidata di un Albero]]: Genera un albero (di trasmissione) da una tabella di valori e consente di analizzare forze e momenti
* [[Image:PartDesign_InternalExternalGear.svg|32px]] [[PartDesign_InvoluteGear/it|Involute gear]]: permette di creare ingranaggi <noinclude>[[Category:Administration/it]] [[Category:Template/it]]</noinclude> <noinclude><languages/></noinclude>

====追加====
パートデザインワークベンチのために作成されたいくつかのオプション機能です。
* [[Image:PartDesign_WizardShaft.png|32px]] [[PartDesign_WizardShaft/jp|シャフト設計ウィザード]]: 表の値からシャフトを生成し、力とモーメントを解析することができます。 <noinclude>[[Category:Template/jp]]</noinclude>

===Properties=== There are two types of feature properties, accessible through tabs at the bottom of the Property editor: : {{PropertyView|View}} : properties related to the ''visual'' display of the object. : {{PropertyData|Data}} : properties related to the ''physical'' parameters of an object. ===View=== [[Image:PartDesign_Revolution_en_03.png|300px|left]] {{Property_Tab_View}} {{clear}} ===Data=== [[Image:PartDesign_Revolution_en_04.png|300px|left]] {{TitleProperty|Base}} {{PropertyData|Angle}} : The argument '''Angle''', indicates the angle that will be used with the option '''Axis''' (below). Here, an angle is defined. The angle on the axis is set with the option '''Axis'''.
The object takes the specified angle around the specified axis.
An example, if you create an object with a required revolution should be rotate functionality of a certain amount, in order to enable it to take the same angle that another element existing. {{PropertyData|Axis}} : This option specifies the axis/axes to rotate the created object. The exact value of rotation comes from the angle (see above) option.
This option takes three arguments, these arguments, are transmitted in the form of numbers, '''x, y''' or '''z'''. Adding a value, more of an axis, will the rotation to each specified axis angle.
For example, with a '''Angle of 15 °''' : specifying, '''1.0 for x''' and '''2.0 for y''', will rotate '''15 ° and 30 °''' in the y-axis and the x-axis (final position), {{PropertyData|Base}} : This option specifies the offset in either axes '''x, y, or z''', and accept any number as the argument for each field. {{PropertyData|Label}} : The Label is the name given to the operation, this name can be changed at convenience. {{PropertyData|Placement}} : '''[(0.00 0.00 1.00);0.00;(0.00 0.00 0.00)]''' Summary below data. Every feature has a placement that can be controlled through the Data Properties table. It controls the placement of the part with respect to the coordinate system. NOTE: The placement options do not affect the physical dimensions of the feature, but merely its position in space!
If you select the title '''Placement''' [[Image:Tache_Placement_01_fr_00.png|256px|Options Placement]], a button with {{KEY|three small points}} appears, clicking this button {{KEY| '''...'''}}, you have access to the options window''' [[Tasks_Placement|Tasks_Placement]]'''. {{PropertyData|Angle}} : The Angle argument specifies the angle to be used with the [[#Axis|axis]] option (below). An angle is set here, and the axis that the angle acts upon is set with the axis option. The feature is rotated by the specified angle, about the specified axis. A usage example might be if you created a revolution feature as required, but then needed to rotate the whole feature by some amount, in order to allow it to line-up with another pre-existing feature. {{PropertyData|Axis}} : This option specifies the axis/axes about which the created feature is to be rotated. The exact value of rotation comes from the angle option (above). This option takes three arguments, which are passed as numbers to either the x, y, or z boxes in the tool. Adding a value to more than one of the axes will cause the part to be rotated by the angle in each axis. For example, with an angle of 15° set, specifying a value of 1.0 for x, and 2.0 for y will cause the finished part to be rotated 15° in the x-axis AND 30° in the y-axis. {{PropertyData|Position}} : This option specifies the base point to which all dimensions refer. This option takes three arguments, which are passed as numbers to either the x, y, or z boxes in the tool. Adding a value to more than one of the boxes will cause the part to be translated by the number of units along the corresponding axis. {{clear}} '''PS: The displayed properties can vary, depending on the tool used.''' [[Category:Template]]

[[Image:revolve_toolbar.png|left]] Existen dos tipos de propiedades de operaciones, accesibles a través de pestañas en la parte inferior de la tabla de propiedades: Propiedades de '''Vista''' y propiedades de '''Datos'''. Todas las propiedades de la operación que puedan ser accesibles a través del letrero de diálogo que se abre cuando editas la operación aparecen en la pestaña de '''Datos'''.
===Ubicación===
Todas las operaciones tienen una ubicación que puede controlarse por medio de la tabla de propiedades de datos. Controla la ubicación de la pieza con respecto al sistema de coordenadas. NOTA: Las opciones de ubicación no afectan a las dimensiones físicas de la operación, tan sólo es posible moverlas en el espacio!
====Ángulo====
El argumento de ángulo especifica el ángulo a utilizar con la opción de [[#Ejes|ejes]] (más abajo). Se establece un ángulo aquí, y el eje sobre el que actúa el ángulo se establece con la opción de eje. La operación se rota el ángulo especificado, sobre el eje indicado. Un ejemplo de utilización podría ser si creas una operación de revolución, pero luego necesitas rotar la operación completa una cantidad, de modo que le permita alinearse con otra operación pre-existente.
====EJES====
Esta opción especifica los ejes sobre los cuales la operación creada se va a rotar. El valor exacto de la rotación viene de la opción de ángulo (arriba). Esta opción toma tres argumentos, que se pasan como números a las cuadros de texto de X, Y o Z en la herramienta. La adición de un valor a más de uno de estos ejes hará que la pieza sea girada por el ángulo en cada eje. Por ejemplo, con un ángulo establecido de 15°, especificando un valor de 1.0 para X, y 2.0 para Y hará que la pieza resultante sea rotada 15° en el eje X y 30° en el eje Y.
====Posición====
Esta opción especifica el punto base al cual se refieren todas las dimensiones. Esta opción toma tres argumentos, que son pasados como números a los cuadros de texto de X, Y y Z en la herramienta. Añadiendo un valor a más de uno de los cuadros de texto se hará que la pieza sea trasladada el número de unidades a lo largo del eje correspondiente. <noinclude>[[Category:Template/es]]</noinclude>

==== I dati delle proprietà ==== Ci sono due tipi di dati delle proprietà delle operazioni e sono contenuti nelle corrispondenti schede. * Le Proprieta Vista riguardano la '''Visualizzazione''' delle caratteristiche dell'oggetto selezionato. * Le Proprieta Dati riguardano i dati '''Fisici''' dell'oggetto selezionato. Quando si seleziona un oggetto, viene visualizzata una finestra di dialogo, selezionare la scheda desiderata cliccando sulle linguette che si trovano nella parte inferiore della tabella Proprietà. Tutte le proprietà delle operazioni a cui è possibile accedere tramite la finestra di dialogo che si apre per modificare l'operazione sono visualizzate nella scheda dei '''Dati'''. ==== Vista ==== {| | [[Image:PartDesign_Revolution_it_03.png|right]] | {{Property_Tab_View/it}} |} ==== Dati ==== {| | [[Image:PartDesign_Revolution_it_04.png|right]] | {{KEY/it|Base}}
* {{ProprietaDati|Angle}} : L'argomento Angolo specifica l'angolo da utilizzare con l'opzione Axis. In questa opzione si stabilisce un angolo, poi sotto, con l'opzione Axis, si imposta l'asse sul quale si vuole utilizzare questo angolo. L'operazione viene ruotata dell'angolo specificato, attorno all'asse specificato. Un esempio di utilizzo potrebbe essere quando si crea una operazione rivoluzione, ma poi serve ruotare l'intera operazione di un certo valore, per allinearla con una diversa operazione preesistente. * {{ProprietaDati|Axis}} : Questa opzione specifica l'asse o gli assi su cui l'operazione creata deve essere ruotata. Il valore di rotazione esatto viene dalla opzione angolo (sopra). Questa opzione ha tre argomenti, che vengono passati come numeri alle rispettive caselle di testo X, Y, Z dello strumento. Inserendo un valore in più di uno degli assi si causa la ruotazione della parte del corrispondente angolo per ogni asse. Per esempio, con un angolo impostato pari a 15°, specificando un valore di 1,0 per X, e di 2,0 per Y causa una rotazione finale del pezzo di 15° sull'asse X e di 30° sull'asse Y. * {{ProprietaDati|Base}} : Questa opzione specifica lo scostamento sugli assi '''x, y, e z''', e accetta qualsiasi numero come argomento per ogni campo. * {{ProprietaDati|Label}} : Label è il nome attribuito all'operazione, questo nome può essere modificato a discrezione. * {{ProprietaDati|Placement}} : '''[(0.00 0.00 1.00);0.00;(0.00 0.00 0.00)]''' Sommario dei dati di posizione. Ogni operazione ha una posizione che può essere controllata tramite la tabella delle proprietà dei Dati. Essa controlla il posizionamento della parte rispetto al sistema di coordinate. NOTA: Le opzioni di posizionamento non influiscono sulle dimensioni fisiche dell'operazione, ma semplicemente sulla sua posizione nello spazio!
Quando si seleziona il titolo '''Placement''' [[Image:Tache_Placement_01_fr_00.png|256px|Options Placement]], appare un pulsante con tre puntini, cliccando su questo pulsante {{KEY/it| '''...'''}}, si accede alla finestra delle azioni di ''' [[Tasks_Placement/it|Posizionamento]]'''. * {{ProprietaDati|Angle}} : L'argomento Angolo specifica l'angolo da utilizzare con l'opzione Axis. In questa opzione si stabilisce un angolo, poi sotto, con l'opzione Axis, si imposta l'asse sul quale si vuole utilizzare questo angolo. L'operazione viene ruotata dell'angolo specificato, attorno all'asse specificato. Un esempio di utilizzo potrebbe essere quando si crea una operazione rivoluzione, ma poi serve ruotare l'intera operazione di un certo valore, per allinearla con una diversa operazione preesistente. * {{ProprietaDati|Axis}} : Questa opzione specifica l'asse o gli assi su cui l'operazione creata deve essere ruotata. Il valore di rotazione esatto viene dalla opzione angolo (sopra). Questa opzione ha tre argomenti, che vengono passati come numeri alle rispettive caselle di testo X, Y, Z dello strumento. Inserendo un valore in più di uno degli assi si causa la ruotazione della parte del corrispondente angolo per ogni asse. Per esempio, con un angolo impostato pari a 15°, specificando un valore di 1,0 per X, e di 2,0 per Y causa una rotazione finale del pezzo di 15° sull'asse X e di 30° sull'asse Y. * {{ProprietaDati|Position}} : Questa opzione specifica il punto base, ovvero, il punto a cui tutte le dimensioni si riferiscono. Questa opzione ha tre argomenti, che vengono passati come numeri alle rispettive caselle di testo X, Y, Z dello strumento. Inserendo un valore in una o più caselle si produce una traslazione della parte sull'asse corrispondente, pari al numero di unità indicate. |} '''Le proprietà presenti nelle schede possono variare secondo lo strumento utilizzato.''' {| | [[Image:PartDesignPlacementLocked_it.png|right]] | Esempio di Placement disattivato.
Nel caso della figura a fianco, sulla faccia superiore del cubo è stato mappato uno schizzo contenente un cerchio e poi è stato utilizzato lo strumento Pad per creare il cilindro. Le geometrie sono connesse come mostrato nel grafico delle dipendenze, quindi: * il cubo può essere liberamente riposizionato, e tutte le altre geometrie seguono il cubo, * lo schizzo '''non''' può essere mosso dalla faccia su cui è stato creato, * il cilindro '''non''' può essere spostato direttamente, ma per muoverlo è necessario riposizionare il cerchio nello schizzo da cui è stato generato. |} {{clear}} [[Category:Template/it]] [[Category:Administration/it]]

[[Image:revolve_toolbar.png|left]] フィーチャーのプロパティには二つのタイプがあり、Propertyテーブルの下にあるタブを使ってアクセスすることができます：'''View'''プロパティと'''Data'''プロパティです。フィーチャーを編集した時に開くダイアログからアクセスできるフィーチャーのプロパティは全て'''Data'''タブに表示されます。
===配置（Placement）=== 全てのフューチャーは配置情報をもっていてDataプロパティテーブルから制御することが可能です。部品の配置情報は座標系を使って制御します。注意：配置（Placement）オプションはフィーチャーの物理的な寸法には影響を与えません。たんに空間内での位置を制御するだけです！ ====角度（Angle）==== 角度情報は[[#Axis|軸（Axis）]]オプション（下記）で使用される角度を指定します。ここで角度を設定し、軸（Axis）オプションで角度処理で使用される軸を設定します。 フィーチャーを指定された軸の周りに対して指定された角度だけ回転させます。 典型的な使用例は必要になった回転体を作成する場合でしょうが、既に存在するフィーチャーと位置を合わせるためにフィーチャー全体を一定量だけ回転させる必要がある場合にも使用できます。 ====軸（Axis）==== このオプションは作成したフィーチャーを回転させる際に使用する軸を指定します。回転量に関しては角度（Angle）オプション（上記）で指定された値が使用されます。 このオプションは三つの値をとり、ツール上のx、y、zのそれぞれの入力欄に数値が指定されます。一つ以上の軸に対して値を指定すると各軸の周りに指定した角度だけパーツを回転させます。 例えば角度15°を設定して、xに1.0を、yに2.0を指定すると作成済みのパーツがx軸周りに15°、y軸周りに30°回転します。 ====位置（Position）==== 位置（Position）は全ての寸法が参照する基点を指定します。このオプションは三つの値をとり、ツール上のx、y、zのそれぞれの入力欄に数値が指定されます。一つ以上の入力欄に対して値を指定すると対応する軸に沿って指定された単位量だけパーツが移動します。 <noinclude>[[Category:Template/jp]]</noinclude>

====Construction tools====
These are tools for creating solid objects or removing material from an existing solid object.
* [[Image:PartDesign_Pad.png|32px]] [[PartDesign_Pad|Pad]]: Extrudes a solid object from a selected sketch. * [[Image:PartDesign_Pocket.png|32px]] [[PartDesign_Pocket|Pocket]]: Creates a pocket from a selected sketch. The sketch must be mapped to an existing solid object's face. * [[Image:PartDesign_Revolution.png|32px]] [[PartDesign_Revolution|Revolution]]: Creates a solid by revolving a sketch around an axis. The sketch must be a closed profile to get a solid object. * [[Image:PartDesign_Groove.png|32px]] [[PartDesign_Groove|Groove]]: Creates a groove by revolving a sketch around an axis. The sketch must be mapped to an existing solid object's face.
====Modification tools====
These are tools for modifying existing objects. They will allow you to choose which object to modify.
* [[Image:PartDesign_Fillet.png|32px]] [[PartDesign_Fillet|Fillet]]: Fillets (rounds) edges of an object. * [[Image:PartDesign_Chamfer.png|32px]] [[PartDesign_Chamfer|Chamfer]]: Chamfers edges of an object. * [[Image:PartDesign_Draft.png|32px]] [[PartDesign_Draft|Draft]]: Applies angular draft to faces of an object.
====Transformation tools====
These are tools for transforming existing features. They will allow you to choose which features to transform.
* [[Image:PartDesign_Mirrored.png|32px]] [[PartDesign_Mirrored|Mirrored]]: Mirrors features on a plane or face. * [[Image:PartDesign_LinearPattern.png|32px]] [[PartDesign_LinearPattern|Linear Pattern]]: Creates a linear pattern of features. * [[Image:PartDesign_PolarPattern.png|32px]] [[PartDesign_PolarPattern|Polar Pattern]]: Creates a polar pattern of features. * [[Image:PartDesign_Scaled.png|32px]] [[PartDesign_Scaled|Scaled]]: Scales features to a different size. * [[Image:PartDesign_MultiTransform.png|32px]] [[PartDesign_MultiTransform|MultiTransform]]: Allows creating a pattern with any combination of the other transformations. <noinclude>[[Category:Template]]</noinclude>

====建模工具====
这些工具用于实体建模。
* [[Image:PartDesign_Pad.png|32px]] [[PartDesign_Pad|拉伸]]: 将选中的草图拉伸成实体。 * [[Image:PartDesign_Pocket.png|32px]] [[PartDesign_Pocket|挖槽]]: 根据草图将某实体挖一个槽，草图必须被映射到已存的某个实体对象的表面上。 * [[Image:PartDesign_Revolution.png|32px]] [[PartDesign_Revolution|旋转体]]: 将一个草图围绕一个轴向旋转成一个实体对象。草图必须为封闭轮廓。
====修改工具====
这些工具用于对所选择的对象进行修改。
* [[Image:Part_Fillet.png|32px]] [[PartDesign_Fillet|圆角]]: 将对象的边沿圆角处理。 * [[Image:Part_Chamfer.png|32px]] [[PartDesign_Chamfer|倒角]]: 将对象的边沿倒角处理。 <noinclude>[[Category:Template/cn]]</noinclude>

====Construction tools====
These are tools for creating solid objects or removing material from an existing solid object.
* [[Image:PartDesign_Pad.png|32px]] [[PartDesign_Pad/cs|Pad]]: Extrudes a solid object from a selected sketch. * [[Image:PartDesign_Pocket.png|32px]] [[PartDesign_Pocket/cs|Pocket]]: Creates a pocket from a selected sketch. The sketch must be mapped to an existing solid object's face. * [[Image:PartDesign_Revolution.png|32px]] [[PartDesign_Revolution/cs|Revolution]]: Creates a solid by revolving a sketch around an axis. The sketch must be a closed profile to get a solid object. * [[Image:PartDesign_Groove.png|32px]] [[PartDesign_Groove/cs|Groove]]: Creates a groove by revolving a sketch around an axis. The sketch must be mapped to an existing solid object's face.
====Modification tools====
These are tools for modifying existing objects. They will allow you to choose which object to modify.
* [[Image:PartDesign_Fillet.png|32px]] [[PartDesign_Fillet/cs|Fillet]]: Fillets (rounds) edges of an object. * [[Image:PartDesign_Chamfer.png|32px]] [[PartDesign_Chamfer/cs|Chamfer]]: Chamfers edges of an object. * [[Image:PartDesign_Draft.png|32px]] [[PartDesign_Draft/cs|Draft]]: Applies angular draft to faces of an object.
====Transformation tools====
These are tools for transforming existing features. They will allow you to choose which features to transform.
* [[Image:PartDesign_Mirrored.png|32px]] [[PartDesign_Mirrored/cs|Mirrored]]: Mirrors features on a plane or face. * [[Image:PartDesign_LinearPattern.png|32px]] [[PartDesign_LinearPattern/cs|Linear Pattern]]: Creates a linear pattern of features. * [[Image:PartDesign_PolarPattern.png|32px]] [[PartDesign_PolarPattern/cs|Polar Pattern]]: Creates a polar pattern of features. * [[Image:PartDesign_Scaled.png|32px]] [[PartDesign_Scaled/cs|Scaled]]: Scales features to a different size. * [[Image:PartDesign_MultiTransform.png|32px]] [[PartDesign_MultiTransform/cs|MultiTransform]]: Allows creating a pattern with any combination of the other transformations. <noinclude>[[Category:Template/cs]]</noinclude>

====Construction tools====
These are tools for creating solid objects or removing material from an existing solid object.
* [[Image:PartDesign_Pad.png|32px]] [[PartDesign_Pad/de|Pad]]: Extrudes a solid object from a selected sketch. * [[Image:PartDesign_Pocket.png|32px]] [[PartDesign_Pocket/de|Pocket]]: Creates a pocket from a selected sketch. The sketch must be mapped to an existing solid object's face. * [[Image:PartDesign_Revolution.png|32px]] [[PartDesign_Revolution/de|Revolution]]: Creates a solid by revolving a sketch around an axis. The sketch must be a closed profile to get a solid object. * [[Image:PartDesign_Groove.png|32px]] [[PartDesign_Groove/de|Groove]]: Creates a groove by revolving a sketch around an axis. The sketch must be mapped to an existing solid object's face.
====Modification tools====
These are tools for modifying existing objects. They will allow you to choose which object to modify.
* [[Image:PartDesign_Fillet.png|32px]] [[PartDesign_Fillet/de|Fillet]]: Fillets (rounds) edges of an object. * [[Image:PartDesign_Chamfer.png|32px]] [[PartDesign_Chamfer/de|Chamfer]]: Chamfers edges of an object. * [[Image:PartDesign_Draft.png|32px]] [[PartDesign_Draft/de|Draft]]: Applies angular draft to faces of an object.
====Transformation tools====
These are tools for transforming existing features. They will allow you to choose which features to transform.
* [[Image:PartDesign_Mirrored.png|32px]] [[PartDesign_Mirrored/de|Mirrored]]: Mirrors features on a plane or face. * [[Image:PartDesign_LinearPattern.png|32px]] [[PartDesign_LinearPattern/de|Linear Pattern]]: Creates a linear pattern of features. * [[Image:PartDesign_PolarPattern.png|32px]] [[PartDesign_PolarPattern/de|Polar Pattern]]: Creates a polar pattern of features. * [[Image:PartDesign_Scaled.png|32px]] [[PartDesign_Scaled/de|Scaled]]: Scales features to a different size. * [[Image:PartDesign_MultiTransform.png|32px]] [[PartDesign_MultiTransform/de|MultiTransform]]: Allows creating a pattern with any combination of the other transformations. <noinclude>[[Category:Template/de]]</noinclude>

====Herramientas de construcción====
Estas son herramientas para la creación de objetos sólidos o eliminar material de un objeto sólido existente.
* [[Image:PartDesign_Pad.png|32px]] [[PartDesign_Pad/es|Saliente]]: Extruye un objeto sólido a partir de un croquis seleccionado. * [[Image:PartDesign_Pocket.png|32px]] [[PartDesign_Pocket/es|Cajera]]: Crea una cajera a partir de un croquis seleccionado. El croquis debe estar referenciado a una cara de un objeto sólido existente. * [[Image:PartDesign_Revolution.png|32px]] [[PartDesign_Revolution/es|Revolución]]: Crea un sólido revolucionando un croquis alrededor de un eje. El croquis debe ser un perfil cerrado para obtener un objeto sólido. * [[Image:PartDesign_Groove.png|32px]] [[PartDesign_Groove/es|Muesca]]: Crea una muesca revolucionando un croquis alrededor de un eje. El croquis debe apuntar a la cara de un objeto sólido existente.
====Herramientas de edición====
Estas son herramientas para modificar objetos existentes. Te permitirán seleccionar el onjeto a modificar.
* [[Image:PartDesign_Fillet.png|32px]] [[PartDesign_Fillet/es|Redondeo]]: Redondea aristas de un objeto. * [[Image:PartDesign_Chamfer.png|32px]] [[PartDesign_Chamfer/es|Chaflán]]: Crea chaflanes en las aristas de un objeto.
====Herramientas de transformación====
Estas son herramientas para transformar operaciones existentes. Permitirán seleccionar que operaciones transformar.
* [[Image:PartDesign_Mirrored.png|32px]] [[PartDesign_Mirrored/es|Simetría]]: Operaciones simétricas sobre un plano o cara. * [[Image:PartDesign_LinearPattern.png|32px]] [[PartDesign_LinearPattern/es|Matriz lineal]]: Crea una matriz lineal de operaciones. * [[Image:PartDesign_PolarPattern.png|32px]] [[PartDesign_PolarPattern/es|Matriz polar]]: Crea una matriz polar de operaciones. * [[Image:PartDesign_Scaled.png|32px]] [[PartDesign_Scaled/es|Escala]]: Escala operaciones a un tamaño diferente. * [[Image:PartDesign_MultiTransform.png|32px]] [[PartDesign_MultiTransform/es|MultiTransformación]]: Permite crear un patrón con cualquier combinación de las otras transformaciones. <noinclude>[[Category:Template/es]]</noinclude>

====Outils de construction====
Ces outils permettent de créer des objets solides ou d'enlever de la matière d'un solide existant.
* [[Image:PartDesign_Pad.png|32px]] [[PartDesign_Pad/fr|Protrusion]]: Extrude un objet solide à partir de l'esquisse sélectionnée. * [[Image:PartDesign_Pocket.png|32px]] [[PartDesign_Pocket/fr|Cavité]]: Créé une cavité à partir de l'esquisse sélectionnée. L'esquisse doit être appliquée sur une face plane d'un solide existant. * [[Image:PartDesign_Revolution.png|32px]] [[PartDesign_Revolution/fr|Révolution]]: Créé un solide par révolution d'une esquisse autour d'un axe. L'esquisse doit former un profil fermé pour qu'un solide soit généré. * [[Image:PartDesign_Groove.png|32px]] [[PartDesign_Groove/fr|Enlèvement de matière par révolution]]: Crée une rainure par révolution d'une esquisse sur un axe. L'esquisse doit être appliquée sur une face plane d'un solide existant.
====Outils de modification====
Ces outils permettent de modifier des objets existants.
* [[Image:PartDesign_Fillet.png|32px]] [[PartDesign_Fillet/fr|Congé]]: Applique un congé sur les arêtes sélectionnées d'un objet. * [[Image:PartDesign_Chamfer.png|32px]] [[PartDesign_Chamfer/fr|Chanfrein]]: Applique un chanfrein sur les arêtes sélectionnées d'un objet. * [[Image:PartDesign_Draft.png|32px]] [[PartDesign_Draft/fr|Dépouille]]: Applique une pente angulaire aux faces d'un objet.
====Outils de transformation====
Ce sont des outils de transformation de fonctions. Ils vous permettront de choisir la fonction à transformer.
* [[Image:PartDesign_Mirrored.png|32px]] [[PartDesign_Mirrored/fr|Symétrie]]: Crée une fonction de symétrie. * [[Image:PartDesign_LinearPattern.png|32px]] [[PartDesign_LinearPattern/fr|Répétition Linéaire]]: Crée une fonction de répétition linéaire. * [[Image:PartDesign_PolarPattern.png|32px]] [[PartDesign_PolarPattern/fr|Répétition Polaire]]: Crée une fonction de répétition polaire. * [[Image:PartDesign_MultiTransform.png|32px]] [[PartDesign_MultiTransform/fr|Transformation multiple]]: Créé une fonction de transformation multiple. <noinclude>[[Category:Template/fr]]</noinclude>

====Strumenti di costruzione====
Sono gli strumenti per creare oggetti solidi o rimuovere del materiale da un oggetto solido esistente.
* [[Image:PartDesign_Pad.png|32px]] [[PartDesign_Pad/it|Estrusione]]: Estrude un oggetto solido da uno schizzo selezionato. * [[Image:PartDesign_Pocket.png|32px]] [[PartDesign_Pocket/it|Scavo]]: Crea una tasca da uno schizzo selezionato. Lo schizzo deve essere posizionato sulla superficie di un oggetto solido esistente. * [[Image:PartDesign_Revolution.png|32px]] [[PartDesign_Revolution/it|Rivoluzione]]: Crea un solido ruotando un disegno attorno ad un asse. Per ottenere un oggetto solido, il disegno deve avere un profilo chiuso. * [[Image:PartDesign_Groove.png|32px]] [[PartDesign_Groove/it|Scanalatura]]: Crea una scanalatura ruotando uno schizzo attorno ad un asse. Il disegno deve essere mappato sulla faccia di un oggetto solido esistente.
====Strumenti di modifica====
Sono gli strumenti per modificare gli oggetti esistenti. Essi permettono di scegliere quale oggetto modificare.
* [[Image:PartDesign_Fillet.png|32px]] [[PartDesign_Fillet/it|Raccordo]]: Raccorda (arrotonda) i bordi di un oggetto. * [[Image:PartDesign_Chamfer.png|32px]] [[PartDesign_Chamfer/it|Smusso]]: Smussa i bordi di un oggetto. * [[Image:PartDesign_Draft.png|32px]] [[PartDesign_Draft/it|Sformo]]: Applica uno sformo angolare alle facce di un oggetto.
====Strumenti di trasformazione====
Sono gli strumenti per trasformare gli elementi esistenti. Essi permettono di scegliere quale elemento trasformare.
* [[Image:PartDesign_Mirrored.png|32px]] [[PartDesign_Mirrored/it|Rifletti]]: Operazione di simmetria su un piano o una faccia. * [[Image:PartDesign_LinearPattern.png|32px]] [[PartDesign_LinearPattern/it|Schiera lineare]]: Crea una schiera lineare di elementi. * [[Image:PartDesign_PolarPattern.png|32px]] [[PartDesign_PolarPattern/it|Schiera polare]]: Crea una schiera polare di elementi. * [[Image:PartDesign_Scaled.png|32px]] [[PartDesign_Scaled/it|Scala]]: Scala gli elementi in un formato differente. * [[Image:PartDesign_MultiTransform.png|32px]] [[PartDesign_MultiTransform/it|MultiTrasformazione]]: Permette di creare una trasformazione con qualsiasi combinazione delle altre trasformazioni. <noinclude>[[Category:Administration/it]] [[Category:Template/it]]<languages/></noinclude>

====作成ツール====
ソリッドオブジェクトの作成、既存のソリッドオブジェクトからのマテリアル削除を行うためのツールです。
* [[Image:PartDesign_Pad.png|32px]] [[PartDesign_Pad/jp|パッド]]: 選択されたスケッチからソリッドオブジェクトを押し出します。 * [[Image:PartDesign_Pocket.png|32px]] [[PartDesign_Pocket/jp|ポケット]]: 選択されたスケッチからポケットを作成します。スケッチは既存のソリッドオブジェクトの面にマッピングされている必要があります。 * [[Image:PartDesign_Revolution.png|32px]] [[PartDesign_Revolve/jp|回転]]: 軸の周りにスケッチを回転させてソリッドを作成します。ソリッドオブジェクトを得るためにはスケッチは閉じた面である必要があります。 * [[Image:PartDesign_Groove.png|32px]] [[PartDesign_Groove/jp|溝]]: 軸の周りにスケッチを回転させて溝を作成します。スケッチは既存のソリッドオブジェクトの面にマッピングされている必要があります
====修正ツール====
既存のオブジェクトの修正のためのツールです。修正するオブジェクトは選択できます。
* [[Image:PartDesign_Fillet.png|32px]] [[PartDesign_Fillet/jp|フィレット]]: オブジェクトの縁をフィレット（丸め込み）します。 * [[Image:PartDesign_Chamfer.png|32px]] [[PartDesign_Chamfer/jp|面取り]]: オブジェクトの縁を面取りします。
====変換ツール====
既存のフィーチャーを変換するためのツールです。変換するオブジェクトは選択できます。
* [[Image:PartDesign_Mirrored.png|32px]] [[PartDesign_Mirrored/jp|ミラー]]: 面、平面に対してフィーチャーを鏡像反転します。 * [[Image:PartDesign_LinearPattern.png|32px]] [[PartDesign_LinearPattern/jp|線状整列]]: フィーチャーを線状に並べます。 * [[Image:PartDesign_PolarPattern.png|32px]] [[PartDesign_PolarPattern/jp|円状整列]]: フィーチャーを円状に並べます。 * [[Image:PartDesign_Scaled.png|32px]] [[PartDesign_Scaled/jp|拡大縮小]]: フィーチャーを異なるサイズに拡大縮小します。 * [[Image:PartDesign_MultiTransform.png|32px]] [[PartDesign_MultiTransform/jp|マルチ変換]]: 他の変換を任意に組み合わせたパターンを作成できます。 <noinclude>[[Category:Template/jp]]</noinclude>

===Primitives===
These are tools for creating primitive objects.
* [[Image:Part_Box.png|32px]] [[Part_Box|Box]]: Draws a box by specifying its dimensions * [[Image:Part_Cone.png|32px]] [[Part_Cone|Cone]]: Draws a cone by specifying its dimensions * [[Image:Part_Cylinder.png|32px]] [[Part_Cylinder|Cylinder]]: Draws a cylinder by specifying its dimensions * [[Image:Part_Sphere.png|32px]] [[Part_Sphere|Sphere]]: Draws a sphere by specifying its dimensions * [[Image:Part_Torus.png|32px]] [[Part_Torus|Torus]]: Draws a torus (ring) by specifying its dimensions * [[Image:Part_CreatePrimitives.png|32px]] [[Part_CreatePrimitives|CreatePrimitives]]: A tool to create various parametric geometric primitives * [[Image:Part_Shapebuilder.png|32px]] [[Part_Shapebuilder|Shapebuilder]]: A tool to create more complex shapes from various parametric geometric primitives
===Modifying objects===
These are tools for modifying existing objects. They will allow you to choose which object to modify.
* [[Image:Part_Booleans.png|32px]] [[Part_Booleans|Booleans]]: Performs boolean operations on objects * [[Image:Part_Fuse.png|32px]] [[Part_Fuse|Fuse]]: Fuses (unions) two objects * [[Image:Part_Common.png|32px]] [[Part_Common|Common]]: Extracts the common (intersection) part of two objects * [[Image:Part_Cut.png|32px]] [[Part_Cut|Cut]]: Cuts (subtracts) one object from another * [[Image:Part_Extrude.png|32px]] [[Part_Extrude|Extrude]]: Extrudes planar faces of an object * [[Image:Part_Fillet.png|32px]] [[Part_Fillet|Fillet]]: Fillets (rounds) edges of an object * [[Image:Part_Revolve.png|32px]] [[Part_Revolve|Revolve]]: Creates a solid by revolving another object (not solid) around an axis * [[Image:Part_Section.png|32px]] [[Part_Section|Section]]: Creates a section by intersecting an object with a section plane * [[Image:Part_SectionCross.png|32px]] [[Part_SectionCross|Cross sections...]]: * [[Image:Part_Chamfer.png|32px]] [[Part_Chamfer|Chamfer]]: Chamfers edges of an object * [[Image:Part_Mirror.png|32px]] [[Part_Mirror|Mirror]]: Mirrors the selected object on a given mirror plane * [[Image:Part_RuledSurface.png|32px]] [[Part_RuledSurface|Ruled Surface]]: * [[Image:Part_Sweep.png|32px]] [[Part_Sweep|Sweep]]: Sweeps one or more profiles along a path * [[Image:Part_Loft.png|32px]] [[Part_Loft|Loft]]: Lofts from one profile to another * [[Image:Part_Offset.png|32px]] [[Part_Offset|Offset]]: Creates a scaled copy of the original object. * [[Image:Part_Thickness.png|32px]] [[Part_Thickness|Thickness]]: Assign a thickness to the faces of a shape.
===Other tools===
* [[Image:Part ImportCAD.png|32px]] [[Part ImportCAD|Import CAD]] * [[Image:Part ExportCAD.png|32px]] [[Part ExportCAD|Export CAD]] * [[Image:Part ShapeFromMesh.png|32px]] [[Part ShapeFromMesh|Shape from Mesh]] * [[Part ConvertToSolid|Convert to solid]] * [[Part ReverseShapes|Reverse shapes]] * [[Part CreateSimpleCopy|Create simple copy]] * [[Image:Part RefineShape.png|32px]] [[Part RefineShape|Refine shape]] * [[Image:Part CheckGeometry.png|32px]] [[Part CheckGeometry|Check geometry]] * [[Std Measure Menu|Measure]]
<noinclude>[[Category:Template]]</noinclude>

===基本对象===
下面是用于创建基本对象的工具。
* [[Image:Part_Box.png|32px]] [[Part_Box|箱体]]：通过设定尺寸绘制一个箱体 * [[Image:Part_Cone.png|32px]] [[Part_Cone|圆锥体]]：通过设定尺寸绘制一个圆锥体 * [[Image:Part_Cylinder.png|32px]] [[Part_Cylinder|圆柱体]]：设定尺寸绘制一个圆柱体 * [[Image:Part_Sphere.png|32px]] [[Part_Sphere|球体]]：设定尺寸绘制一个球体 * [[Image:Part_Torus.png|32px]] [[Part_Torus|圆环体]]：设定尺寸绘制一个圆环体
===修改对象===
下面是一些可修改既有对象的工具。它们需要你选中欲处理的对象。
* [[Image:Part_Booleans.png|32px]] [[Part_Booleans|布尔运算]]：对选中的对象进行布尔运算（并、交、差） * [[Image:Part_Fuse.png|32px]] [[Part_Fuse|融合]]：对两个对象求并运算，合二为一 * [[Image:Part_Common.png|32px]] [[Part_Common|求交]]：提取两个对象的相交区域 * [[Image:Part_Cut.png|32px]] [[Part_Cut|剪切]]：从一个对象中去除另外一个对象与之相交的区域 * [[Image:Part_Extrude.png|32px]] [[Part_Extrude|拉伸]]：将一个对象的平面区域拉伸为实体 * [[Image:Part_Fillet.png|32px]] [[Part_Fillet|倒圆角]]：在对象的边界倒圆角 * [[Image:Part_Revolve.png|32px]] [[Part_Revolve|旋转体]]：将一个对象围绕一个轴向旋转成一个新的对象 * [[Image:Part_Section.png|32px]] [[Part_Section|截面]]：用一个截平面与一个对象求交，生成截面 * [[Image:Part_Chamfer.png|32px]] [[Part_Chamfer|倒斜角]]：在对象的边界倒斜角 * [[Image:Part_Mirror.png|32px]] [[Part_Mirror|镜像]]：对被选中的对象沿给定的轴向进行镜像复制 <noinclude>[[Category:Template/cn]]</noinclude>

===Primitives===
These are tools for creating primitive objects.
* [[Image:Part_Box.png|32px]] [[Part_Box/cs|Box]]: Draws a box by specifying its dimensions * [[Image:Part_Cone.png|32px]] [[Part_Cone/cs|Cone]]: Draws a cone by specifying its dimensions * [[Image:Part_Cylinder.png|32px]] [[Part_Cylinder/cs|Cylinder]]: Draws a cylinder by specifying its dimensions * [[Image:Part_Sphere.png|32px]] [[Part_Sphere/cs|Sphere]]: Draws a sphere by specifying its dimensions * [[Image:Part_Torus.png|32px]] [[Part_Torus/cs|Torus]]: Draws a torus (ring) by specifying its dimensions * [[Image:Part_CreatePrimitives.png|32px]] [[Part_CreatePrimitives/cs|CreatePrimitives]]: A tool to create various parametric geometric primitives * [[Image:Part_Shapebuilder.png|32px]] [[Part_Shapebuilder/cs|Shapebuilder]]: A tool to create more complex shapes from various parametric geometric primitives
===Modifying objects===
These are tools for modifying existing objects. They will allow you to choose which object to modify.
* [[Image:Part_Booleans.png|32px]] [[Part_Booleans/cs|Booleans]]: Performs boolean operations on objects * [[Image:Part_Fuse.png|32px]] [[Part_Fuse/cs|Fuse]]: Fuses (unions) two objects * [[Image:Part_Common.png|32px]] [[Part_Common/cs|Common]]: Extracts the common (intersection) part of two objects * [[Image:Part_Cut.png|32px]] [[Part_Cut/cs|Cut]]: Cuts (subtracts) one object from another * [[Image:Part_Extrude.png|32px]] [[Part_Extrude/cs|Extrude]]: Extrudes planar faces of an object * [[Image:Part_Fillet.png|32px]] [[Part_Fillet/cs|Fillet]]: Fillets (rounds) edges of an object * [[Image:Part_Revolve.png|32px]] [[Part_Revolve/cs|Revolve]]: Creates a solid by revolving another object (not solid) around an axis * [[Image:Part_Section.png|32px]] [[Part_Section/cs|Section]]: Creates a section by intersecting an object with a section plane * [[Image:Part_Chamfer.png|32px]] [[Part_Chamfer/cs|Chamfer]]: Chamfers edges of an object * [[Image:Part_Mirror.png|32px]] [[Part_Mirror/cs|Mirror]]: Mirrors the selected object on a given mirror plane * [[Image:Part_RuledSurface.png|32px]] [[Part_RuledSurface/cs|Ruled Surface]]: * [[Image:Part_Sweep.png|32px]] [[Part_Sweep/cs|Sweep]]: Sweeps one or more profiles along a path * [[Image:Part_Loft.png|32px]] [[Part_Loft/cs|Loft]]: Lofts from one profile to another <noinclude>[[Category:Template/cs]]</noinclude>

===Primitive===
Diese Werkzeuge erstellen primitive Objekte.
* [[Image:Part_Box.png|32px]] [[Part_Box/de|Quader]]: Erzeugt einen Quarder mittels Angabe der Dimensionen * [[Image:Part_Cone.png|32px]] [[Part_Cone/de|Kegel]]: Erzeugt einen Kegel mittels Angabe der Dimensionen * [[Image:Part_Cylinder.png|32px]] [[Part_Cylinder|Cylinder]]: Erzeugt einen Zylinder mittels Angabe der Dimensionen * [[Image:Part_Sphere.png|32px]] [[Part_Sphere|Sphere]]: Erzeugt eine Kugel mittels Angabe der Dimensionen * [[Image:Part_Torus.png|32px]] [[Part_Torus|Torus]]: Erzeugt einen Torus (Ring) mittels Angabe der Dimensionen * [[Image:Part_CreatePrimitives.png|32px]] [[Part_CreatePrimitives/de|CreatePrimitives]]: A tool to create various parametric geometric primitives * [[Image:Part_Shapebuilder.png|32px]] [[Part_Shapebuilder/de|Shapebuilder]]: A tool to create more complex shapes from various parametric geometric primitives
===Verändern von Objekten===
Mit diesen Werkzeugen können Objekte verändert werden. Es ist möglich zu wählen, welches Objekt geändert werden soll.
* [[Image:Part_Booleans.png|32px]] [[Part_Booleans/de|Boolesche Operationen]]: Führt boolsche Operationen an Objekten durch * [[Image:Part_Fuse.png|32px]] [[Part_Fuse/de|Fuse]]: Lässt mehrere Objekte mitteinander verschmelzen * [[Image:Part_Common.png|32px]] [[Part_Common/de|Common]]: Generiert das Geinsame (intersection) von 2 gewählten Objekten * [[Image:Part_Cut.png|32px]] [[Part_Cut/de|Cut]]: Schneidet (subtrahiert) ein Objekt von einem anderen * [[Image:Part_Extrude.png|32px]] [[Part_Extrude/de|Extrude]]: Entwickelt einen Körper aus einer planen Zeichnung * [[Image:Part_Fillet.png|32px]] [[Part_Fillet/de|Fillet]]: Rundet die Ecken eines Objekts ab * [[Image:Part_Revolve.png|32px]] [[Part_Revolve/de|Revolve]]: Erstellt ein Objekt durch dessen Wiederholung um eine Achse herum * [[Image:Part_Section.png|32px]] [[Part_Section/de|Section]]: Erstellt einen Schnitt durch ein Objekt in einer Schnittebene * [[Image:Part_Chamfer.png|32px]] [[Part_Chamfer/de|Chamfer]]: Schrägt (fasen) die Ecken eines Objekts * [[Image:Part_Mirror.png|32px]] [[Part_Mirror/de|Mirror]]: Spiegelt ein Objekt um eine anzunehmende Achse * [[Image:Part_RuledSurface.png|32px]] [[Part_RuledSurface/de|Ruled Surface]]: * [[Image:Part_Sweep.png|32px]] [[Part_Sweep/de|Sweep]]: Sweeps one or more profiles along a path * [[Image:Part_Loft.png|32px]] [[Part_Loft/de|Loft]]: Lofts from one profile to another <noinclude>[[Category:Template/de]]</noinclude>

===Primitivas===
Estas son las herramientas para crear primitivas de objetos.
* [[Image:Part_Box.png|32px]] [[Part_Box/es|Caja]]: Dibuja una caja especificando sus dimensiones * [[Image:Part_Cone.png|32px]] [[Part_Cone/es|Cono]]: Dibuja un cono especificando sus dimensiones * [[Image:Part_Cylinder.png|32px]] [[Part_Cylinder/es|Cilindro]]: Dibuja un cilindro especificando sus dimensiones * [[Image:Part_Sphere.png|32px]] [[Part_Sphere/es|Esfera]]: Dibuja una esfera especificando sus dimensiones * [[Image:Part_Torus.png|32px]] [[Part_Torus/es|Toro]]: Dibuja un toro (anillo) especificando sus dimensiones
===Modificando objetos===
Estas son las herramientas para modificar los objetos existentes. Permiten seleccionar los objetos a modificar.
* [[Image:Part_Booleans.png|32px]] [[Part_Booleans/es|Operaciones Booleanas]]: Realiza operaciones Booleanas sobre los objetos * [[Image:Part_Fuse.png|32px]] [[Part_Fuse/es|Fusión]]: Fusión (unión) de dos objetos * [[Image:Part_Common.png|32px]] [[Part_Common/es|Intersección]]: Extrae la parte común (intersección) de dos objetos * [[Image:Part_Cut.png|32px]] [[Part_Cut/es|Diferencia]]: Corta (resta) un objeto de otro * [[Image:Part_Extrude.png|32px]] [[Part_Extrude/es|Extrusión]]: Extruye caras planas de un objeto * [[Image:Part_Fillet.png|32px]] [[Part_Fillet/es|Redondear]]: Redondea las aristas de un objeto * [[Image:Part_Revolve.png|32px]] [[Part_Revolve/es|Revolución]]: Crea un objeto haciendo que gire otro objeto alrededor de un eje * [[Image:Part_Section.png|32px]] [[Part_Section/es|Sección]]: Crea una sección por la intersección de un objeto con un plano de sección * [[Image:Part_Chamfer.png|32px]] [[Part_Chamfer/es|Chaflán]]: Crea un chaflán en las aristas de un objeto * [[Image:Part_Mirror.png|32px]] [[Part_Mirror/es|Simetría]]: Crea una simetría de los objetos seleccionados alrededor de un plano de simetría dado <noinclude>[[Category:Template/es]]</noinclude>

===Primitives===
Voici les outils permettant de créer des primitives.
* [[Image:Part_Box.png|32px]] [[Part_Box/fr|Cube]]: Dessine un cube en spécifiant ses dimensions. * [[Image:Part_Cone.png|32px]] [[Part_Cone/fr|Cône]]: Dessine un cône en spécifiant ses dimensions. * [[Image:Part_Cylinder.png|32px]] [[Part_Cylinder/fr|Cylindre]]: Dessine un cylindre en spécifiant ses dimensions. * [[Image:Part_Sphere.png|32px]] [[Part_Sphere/fr|Sphère]]: Dessine une sphère en spécifiant ses dimensions. * [[Image:Part_Torus.png|32px]] [[Part_Torus/fr|Tore]]: Dessine un tore (anneau) en spécifiant ses dimensions. * [[Image:Part_CreatePrimitives.png|32px]] [[Part_CreatePrimitives/fr|CreatePrimitives]]: Outil pour créer différentes primitives géométriques paramétriques. * [[Image:Part_Shapebuilder.png|32px]] [[Part_Shapebuilder/fr|Shapebuilder]]: Outil pour créer des formes complexes, de plusieurs primitives géométriques paramétriques.
===Modifier les objets===
Voici les outils permettant de modifier les objets existants. Ils vous permettront de choisir quels objets modifier.
* [[Image:Part_Booleans.png|32px]] [[Part_Booleans/fr|Opérations booléennes]]: Réalise les principales opérations booléennes sur des objets. * [[Image:Part_Fuse.png|32px]] [[Part_Fuse/fr|Union]]: Fusionne (additionne) deux objets. * [[Image:Part_Common.png|32px]] [[Part_Common/fr|Intersection]]: Extrait la partie commune (intersection) de deux solides. * [[Image:Part_Cut.png|32px]] [[Part_Cut/fr|Soustraction]]: Soustrait un objet à un autre. * [[Image:Part_Extrude.png|32px]] [[Part_Extrude/fr|Extrusion]]: Extrude les faces planes d'un objet. * [[Image:Part_Fillet.png|32px]] [[Part_Fillet/fr|Congé]]: Réalise un congé (arrondi) sur les arêtes d'un objet. * [[Image:Part_Revolve.png|32px]] [[Part_Revolve/fr|Révolution]]: Crée un objet par révolution d'un autre objet autour d'un axe. * [[Image:Part_Section.png|32px]] [[Part_Section/fr|Coupe]]: Crée une coupe par l'intersection d'un objet avec un plan de coupe. * [[Image:Part_SectionCross.png|32px]] [[Part_SectionCross/fr|Coupes de plusieurs sections ...]]: * [[Image:Part_Chamfer.png|32px]] [[Part_Chamfer/fr|Chanfrein]]: Chanfreine les arêtes d'un objet. * [[Image:Part_Mirror.png|32px]] [[Part_Mirror/fr|Miroir]]: Réalise la symétrie axiale de l'objet sélectionné autour d'un axe donné. * [[Image:Part_RuledSurface.png|32px]] [[Part_RuledSurface|Ruled Surface]]: * [[Image:Part_Sweep.png|32px]] [[Part_Sweep/fr|Balayage]]: Balayage d'une ou plusieurs sections le long d'un chemin (tracé). * [[Image:Part_Loft.png|32px]] [[Part_Loft/fr|Lissage]]: Lissage d'une série de profils.
===Autres outils===
* [[Image:Part ImportCAD.png|32px]] [[Part ImportCAD/fr|Import CAD]] * [[Image:Part ExportCAD.png|32px]] [[Part ExportCAD/fr|Export CAD]] * [[Image:Part ShapeFromMesh.png|32px]] [[Part ShapeFromMesh/fr|Shape from Mesh]] * [[Part ConvertToSolid/fr|Convert to solid]] * [[Part ReverseShapes/fr|Reverse shapes]] * [[Part CreateSimpleCopy/fr|Create simple copy]] * [[Image:Part RefineShape.png|32px]] [[Part RefineShape/fr|Refine shape]] * [[Image:Part CheckGeometry.png|32px]] [[Part CheckGeometry/fr|Check geometry]] * [[Std Measure Menu|Measure/fr]]

==== Primitive ====
Questi sono strumenti per creare oggetti primitivi.
* [[Image:Part_Box.png|32px]] [[Part_Box/it|Prisma]]: disegna parallepipedi specificandone le dimensioni * [[Image:Part_Cone.png|32px]] [[Part_Cone/it|Cono]]: disegna solidi conici. * [[Image:Part_Cylinder.png|32px]] [[Part_Cylinder/it|Cilindro]]: disegna solidi cilindrici. * [[Image:Part_Sphere.png|32px]] [[Part_Sphere/it|Sfera]]: disegna sfere. * [[Image:Part_Torus.png|32px]] [[Part_Torus/it|Toro]]: disegna anelli. * [[Image:Part_CreatePrimitives.png|32px]] [[Part_CreatePrimitives/it|Crea Primitive]]: strumento per creare varie primitive geometriche parametriche * [[Image:Part_Shapebuilder.png|32px]] [[Part_Shapebuilder/it|Generatore di forma]]: strumento per creare delle forme complesse da primitive geometriche parametriche
==== Modificare gli oggetti ====
Questi sono gli strumenti per modificare gli oggetti esistenti. Essi permettono di scegliere l'oggetto da modificare.
* [[Image:Part_Booleans.png|32px]] [[Part_Booleans/it|Booleana]]: Esegue operazioni booleane sugli oggetti * [[Image:Part_Fuse.png|32px]] [[Part_Fuse/it|Fondi]]: Fonde (unisce) due oggetti * [[Image:Part_Common.png|32px]] [[Part_Common/it|Interseca]]: Estrae la parte comune (intersezione) di due oggetti * [[Image:Part_Cut.png|32px]] [[Part_Cut/it|Sottrai]]: Taglia (sottrae) un oggetto da un altro * [[Image:Part_Extrude.png|32px]] [[Part_Extrude/it|Estrudi]]: Estrude le facce planari di un oggetto * [[Image:Part_Revolve.png|32px]] [[Part_Revolve/it|Rivoluziona]]: Crea un oggetto tramite la rotazione di un altro oggetto attorno ad un asse * [[Image:Part_Mirror.png|32px]] [[Part_Mirror/it|Specchia]]: Riflette l'oggetto selezionato rispetto ad un asse stabilito * [[Image:Part_Section.png|32px]] [[Part_Section/it|Seziona]]: Crea una sezione intersecando un oggetto con un altro oggetto * [[Image:Part_SectionCross.png|32px]] [[Part_SectionCross/it|Sezioni...]]: Crea una sezione intersecando un oggetto con uno o più piani di sezione * [[Image:Part_Fillet.png|32px]] [[Part_Fillet/it|Raccorda]]: Raccorda (arrotonda) i bordi di un oggetto * [[Image:Part_Chamfer.png|32px]] [[Part_Chamfer/it|Smussa]]: Smussa i bordi di un oggetto * [[Image:Part_RuledSurface.png|32px]] [[Part_RuledSurface/it|Superficie rigata]]: Crea una superficie tra due linee * [[Image:Part_Sweep.png|32px]] [[Part_Sweep/it|Sweep]]: Estrude un profilo seguendo un percorso determinato (vers 0.13) * [[Image:Part_Loft.png|32px]] [[Part_Loft/it|Loft]]: Crea una estrusione tra due sagome diverse (vers 0.13) * [[Image:Part_Offset.png|32px]] [[Part_Offset/it|Offset]]: Crea una copia scalata dell'oggetto originale. * [[Image:Part_Thickness.png|32px]] [[Part_Thickness/it|Spessore]]: Attribuisce uno spessore alle facce di una forma.
===Altri strumenti===
* [[Image:Part ImportCAD.png|32px]] [[Part ImportCAD/it|Importa CAD]] * [[Image:Part ExportCAD.png|32px]] [[Part ExportCAD/it|Esporta CAD]] * [[Image:Part ShapeFromMesh.png|32px]] [[Part ShapeFromMesh/it|Crea forma da mesh]] * [[Part ConvertToSolid/it|Converti in solido]] * [[Part ReverseShapes/it|Inverti forme]] * [[Part CreateSimpleCopy/it|Crea una copia semplice]] * [[Image:Part RefineShape.png|32px]] [[Part RefineShape/it|Affina forma]] * [[Image:Part CheckGeometry.png|32px]] [[Part CheckGeometry/it|Controlla geometria]] * [[Std Measure Menu/it|Misure]] <noinclude>[[Category:Administration/it]] [[Category:Template/it]]</noinclude>

===プリミティブ===
プリミティブオブジェクトを作成するためのツールです。
* [[Image:Part_Box.png|32px]] [[Part_Box/jp|ボックス]]: 寸法を指定してボックスを描きます * [[Image:Part_Cone.png|32px]] [[Part_Cone/jp|円錐]]: 寸法を指定して円錐を描きます * [[Image:Part_Cylinder.png|32px]] [[Part_Cylinder/jp|円筒]]: 寸法を指定して円筒を描きます * [[Image:Part_Sphere.png|32px]] [[Part_Sphere/jp|球]]: 寸法を指定して球を描きます * [[Image:Part_Torus.png|32px]] [[Part_Torus/jp|トーラス]]: 寸法を指定してトーラス（円環）を描きます
===オブジェクトの変更===
既存のオブジェクトを変更するためのツールです。変更するオブジェクトを選択して使用します。
* [[Image:Part_Booleans.png|32px]] [[Part_Booleans/jp|ブーリアン]]: オブジェクトのブーリアン演算を行います * [[Image:Part_Fuse.png|32px]] [[Part_Fuse/jp|結合]]: 二つのオブジェクトを結合します（和集合） * [[Image:Part_Common.png|32px]] [[Part_Common/jp|共通部]]: 二つのオブジェクトの共通部分を抽出します（共通集合） * [[Image:Part_Cut.png|32px]] [[Part_Cut/jp|切り取り]]: オブジェクトを別のオブジェクトから切り取ります（減算） * [[Image:Part_Extrude.png|32px]] [[Part_Extrude/jp|押し出し]]: オブジェクトの平面を押し出します * [[Image:Part_Fillet.png|32px]] [[Part_Fillet/jp|フィレット]]: オブジェクトのエッジをフィレット処理（丸め処理）します * [[Image:Part_Revolve.png|32px]] [[Part_Revolve/jp|回転体]]: 別のオブジェクトを軸周りに回転させてオブジェクトを作成します * [[Image:Part_Section.png|32px]] [[Part_Section/jp|分割]]: 分割面をオブジェクトに交差させることで切断面を作成します * [[Image:Part_Chamfer.png|32px]] [[Part_Chamfer/jp|面取り]]: オブジェクトのエッジを面取りします * [[Image:Part_Mirror.png|32px]] [[Part_Mirror/jp|ミラー]]: 指定された鏡面に対して選択されたオブジェクトの鏡像を作成します <noinclude>[[Category:Template/jp]]</noinclude>

===Prymitywy===
Narzędzia do tworzenia prymitywów.
* [[Image:Part_Box.png|32px]] [[Part_Box/pl|Sześcian]]: Rysuje sześcian przez ustawienie jego wymiarów * [[Image:Part_Cone.png|32px]] [[Part_Cone/pl|Stożek]]: Rysuje stożek przez ustawienie jego wymiarów * [[Image:Part_Cylinder.png|32px]] [[Part_Cylinder/pl|Walec]]: Rysuje walec przez ustawienie jego wymiarów * [[Image:Part_Sphere.png|32px]] [[Part_Sphere/pl|Kula]]: Rysuje kulę przez ustawienie jej wymiarów * [[Image:Part_Torus.png|32px]] [[Part_Torus/pl|Torus]]: Rysuje torus przez ustawienie jego wymiarów
===Modyfikacja obiektów===
Narzędzia do modyfikacji istniejących obiektów.
* [[Image:Part_Booleans.png|32px]] [[Part_Booleans/pl|Operacje Boole'a]]: Umożliwia operacje Boole'a na obiektach * [[Image:Part_Fuse.png|32px]] [[Part_Fuse/pl|Łączenie]]: Połączenia (suma) dwóch obiektów * [[Image:Part_Common.png|32px]] [[Part_Common/pl|Część wspólna]]: Wyciąga część wspólną (iloczyn) dwóch obiektów * [[Image:Part_Cut.png|32px]] [[Part_Cut/pl|Wycięcie]]: Wycina (różnica) jeden obiekt z drugiego * [[Image:Part_Extrude.png|32px]] [[Part_Extrude/pl|Wyciągnięcie]]: Wyciąga płaskie powierzchnie obiektu * [[Image:Part_Fillet.png|32px]] [[Part_Fillet/pl|Zaokrąglenie]]: Zaokrągla krawędzie obiektu * [[Image:Part_Revolve.png|32px]] [[Part_Revolve/pl|Obrót]]: Tworzy obiekt przez obrót innego obiektu wokół osi * [[Image:Part_Section.png|32px]] [[Part_Section/pl|Przekrój]]: Tworzy przekrój przez przecięcie obiektu płaszczyzną <noinclude>[[Category:Template/pl]]</noinclude>

===Primitive===
Acestea sunt unelte pentru crearea de primitive grafice.
* [[Image:Part_Box.png|32px]] [[Part_Box/ro|Caseta]]: Deseneaza o caseta prin specificarea dimensiunile sale * [[Image:Part_Cone.png|32px]] [[Part_Cone/ro|Con]]: Deseneaza un con prin specificarea dimensiunile sale * [[Image:Part_Cylinder.png|32px]] [[Part_Cylinder/ro|Cilindru]]: Deseneaza un cilindru prin specificarea dimensiunile sale * [[Image:Part_Sphere.png|32px]] [[Part_Sphere/ro|Sfera]]: Deseneaza o sfera prin specificarea dimensiunile sale * [[Image:Part_Torus.png|32px]] [[Part_Torus/ro|Tor]]: Deseneaza un tor (inel) prin specificarea dimensiunile sale * [[Image:Part_CreatePrimitives.png|32px]] [[Part_CreatePrimitives/ro|Creaza primitive]]: Unealta pentru crearea primitivelor geometrice bazate pe parametrii * [[Image:Part_Shapebuilder.png|32px]] [[Part_Shapebuilder/ro|Creaza forme]]: Unealta pentru crearea formelor complexe din primitive geometrice bazate pe parametrii
===Modificarea obiectelor===
Acestea sunt unelte pentru modificarea obiectelor existente. Ele permit alegerea obiectelor cu care se lucreaza.
* [[Image:Part_Booleans.png|32px]] [[Part_Booleans/ro|Logice]]: Efectueaza operatii logice asupra obiectelor * [[Image:Part_Fuse.png|32px]] [[Part_Fuse/ro|Fuziune]]: Uneste doua obiecte * [[Image:Part_Common.png|32px]] [[Part_Common/ro|Comun]]: Extrage partea comuna a doua obiecte * [[Image:Part_Cut.png|32px]] [[Part_Cut/ro|Decupare]]: Substrage on obiect din celalalt * [[Image:Part_Extrude.png|32px]] [[Part_Extrude/ro|Extrudare]]: Extrudeaza fetele plane ale unui obiect * [[Image:Part_Fillet.png|32px]] [[Part_Fillet/ro|Panglica]]: Rotunjeste marginile unui obiect * [[Image:Part_Revolve.png|32px]] [[Part_Revolve/ro|Rotatie]]: Creaza un obiect prin rotirea altui obiect in jurul unei axe * [[Image:Part_Section.png|32px]] [[Part_Section/ro|Sectiune]]: Creaza o sectiune prin intersectarea unui obiect cu planul de sectionare * [[Image:Part_Chamfer.png|32px]] [[Part_Chamfer/ro|Tesire]]: Teseste marginile unui obiect * [[Image:Part_Mirror.png|32px]] [[Part_Mirror/ro|Oglindire]]: Oglindeste obiectul selectat fata de un plan * [[Image:Part_Sweep.png|32px]] [[Part_Sweep/ro|Curatare]]: Curata unul sau mai multe profile de-a lungul unei cai * [[Image:Part_Loft.png|32px]] [[Part_Loft/ro|Pod]]: Uneste un profil de altul <noinclude>[[Category:Template/ro]]</noinclude>

===Примитивы===
Эти инструменты создают примитивные объекты.
* [[Image:Part_Box.png|32px]] [[Part_Box/ru|Box]]: Рисует прямоугольный параллелепипед с указанными размерами * [[Image:Part_Cone.png|32px]] [[Part_Cone/ru|Cone]]: Рисует конус с указанными размерами * [[Image:Part_Cylinder.png|32px]] [[Part_Cylinder/ru|Cylinder]]: Рисует цилиндр с указанными размерами * [[Image:Part_Sphere.png|32px]] [[Part_Sphere/ru|Sphere]]: Рисует сферу с указанными размерами * [[Image:Part_Torus.png|32px]] [[Part_Torus/ru|Torus]]: Рисует тор (кольцо) с указанными размерами * [[Image:Part_CreatePrimitives.png|32px]] [[Part_CreatePrimitives/ru|CreatePrimitives]]: A tool to create various parametric geometric primitives * [[Image:Part_Shapebuilder.png|32px]] [[Part_Shapebuilder/ru|Shapebuilder]]: A tool to create more complex shapes from various parametric geometric primitives
===Изменение объектов===
Это инструменты для изменениясуществующих объектов. Они позваляют вам выбирать какой объект вы будете изменять.
* [[Image:Part_Booleans.png|32px]] [[Part_Booleans/ru|Booleans]]: Производит логические операции над объектами * [[Image:Part_Fuse.png|32px]] [[Part_Fuse/ru|Fuse]]: Сплавляет (объединяет) два объекта * [[Image:Part_Common.png|32px]] [[Part_Common/ru|Common]]: Извлекает общую часть (пересечение) двух объектов * [[Image:Part_Cut.png|32px]] [[Part_Cut/ru|Cut]]: Обрезает (вычитает) один объект из другого * [[Image:Part_Extrude.png|32px]] [[Part_Extrude/ru|Extrude]]: Вытягивает плоские грани объекта * [[Image:Part_Fillet.png|32px]] [[Part_Fillet/ru|Fillet]]: Сгругляет ребра объекта * [[Image:Part_Revolve.png|32px]] [[Part_Revolve/ru|Revolve]]: Создает объект вращением одного объекта вокруг оси * [[Image:Part_Section.png|32px]] [[Part_Section/ru|Section]]: Создает сечение, как пересечением секущей плоскости и объекта * [[Image:Part_Chamfer.png|32px]] [[Part_Chamfer/ru|Chamfer]]: Chamfers edges of an object * [[Image:Part_Mirror.png|32px]] [[Part_Mirror/ru|Mirror]]: Mirrors the selected object on a given mirror plane * [[Image:Part_RuledSurface.png|32px]] [[Part_RuledSurface/ru|Ruled Surface]]: * [[Image:Part_Sweep.png|32px]] [[Part_Sweep/ru|Sweep]]: Sweeps one or more profiles along a path * [[Image:Part_Loft.png|32px]] [[Part_Loft/ru|Loft]]: Lofts from one profile to another <noinclude>[[Category:Template/ru]]</noinclude>

===Primitiver===
Detta är verktyg för att skapa primitivobjekt.
* [[Image:Part_Box.png|32px]] [[Part_Box/se|Låda]]: Ritar en låda genom att ge dess dimensioner * [[Image:Part_Cone.png|32px]] [[Part_Cone/se|Kon]]: Ritar en kon genom att ge dess dimensioner * [[Image:Part_Cylinder.png|32px]] [[Part_Cylinder/se|Cylinder]]: Ritar en cylinder genom att ge dess dimensioner * [[Image:Part_Sphere.png|32px]] [[Part_Sphere/se|Sfär]]: Ritar en sfär genom att ge dess dimensioner * [[Image:Part_Torus.png|32px]] [[Part_Torus/se|Torus]]: Ritar en torus (ring) genom att ge dess dimensioner
===Förändra objekt===
Detta är verktyg för att förändra existerande objekt. De kommer att låta dig välja vilka objekt som du vill förändra.
* [[Image:Part_Booleans.png|32px]] [[Part_Booleans/se|Boolesk]]: Utför booleska operationer på objekt * [[Image:Part_Fuse.png|32px]] [[Part_Fuse/se|Förena]]: Förenar två objekt * [[Image:Part_Common.png|32px]] [[Part_Common/se|Gemensamt]]: Tar bort den gemensamma (skärningen) delen mellan två objekt * [[Image:Part_Cut.png|32px]] [[Part_Cut/se|Klipp]]: Klipper (tar bort) ett objekt från ett annat * [[Image:Part_Extrude.png|32px]] [[Part_Extrude/se|Extrudera]]: Extruderar plana ytor på ett objekt * [[Image:Part_Fillet.png|32px]] [[Part_Fillet/se|Fasning]]: Fasar (rundar) kanterna på ett objekt * [[Image:Part_Revolve.png|32px]] [[Part_Revolve/se|Rotera]]: Skapar ett objekt genom att rotera ett annat objekt runt en axel * [[Image:Part_Section.png|32px]] [[Part_Section/se|Sektionera]]: Skapar en sektion genom att skära ett objekt med ett sektioneringsplan * [[Image:Part_Chamfer.png|32px]] [[Part_Chamfer/se|Fasning]]: Fasar (klipper) kanter på ett objekt * [[Image:Part_Mirror.png|32px]] [[Part_Mirror/se|Spegling]]: Speglar de valda objekten runt en given axel <noinclude>[[Category:Template/se]]</noinclude>

===Primitiver===
Detta är verktyg för att skapa primitivobjekt.
* [[Image:Part_Box.png|32px]] [[Part_Box/sv|Låda]]: Ritar en låda genom att ge dess dimensioner * [[Image:Part_Cone.png|32px]] [[Part_Cone/sv|Kon]]: Ritar en kon genom att ge dess dimensioner * [[Image:Part_Cylinder.png|32px]] [[Part_Cylinder/sv|Cylinder]]: Ritar en cylinder genom att ge dess dimensioner * [[Image:Part_Sphere.png|32px]] [[Part_Sphere/sv|Sfär]]: Ritar en sfär genom att ge dess dimensioner * [[Image:Part_Torus.png|32px]] [[Part_Torus/sv|Torus]]: Ritar en torus (ring) genom att ge dess dimensioner
===Förändra objekt===
Detta är verktyg för att förändra existerande objekt. De kommer att låta dig välja vilka objekt som du vill förändra.
* [[Image:Part_Booleans.png|32px]] [[Part_Booleans/sv|Boolesk]]: Utför booleska operationer på objekt * [[Image:Part_Fuse.png|32px]] [[Part_Fuse/sv|Förena]]: Förenar två objekt * [[Image:Part_Common.png|32px]] [[Part_Common/sv|Gemensamt]]: Tar bort den gemensamma (skärningen) delen mellan två objekt * [[Image:Part_Cut.png|32px]] [[Part_Cut/sv|Klipp]]: Klipper (tar bort) ett objekt från ett annat * [[Image:Part_Extrude.png|32px]] [[Part_Extrude/sv|Extrudera]]: Extruderar plana ytor på ett objekt * [[Image:Part_Fillet.png|32px]] [[Part_Fillet/sv|Fasning]]: Fasar (rundar) kanterna på ett objekt * [[Image:Part_Revolve.png|32px]] [[Part_Revolve/sv|Rotera]]: Skapar ett objekt genom att rotera ett annat objekt runt en axel * [[Image:Part_Section.png|32px]] [[Part_Section/sv|Sektionera]]: Skapar en sektion genom att skära ett objekt med ett sektioneringsplan * [[Image:Part_Chamfer.png|32px]] [[Part_Chamfer/sv|Fasning]]: Fasar (klipper) kanter på ett objekt * [[Image:Part_Mirror.png|32px]] [[Part_Mirror/sv|Spegling]]: Speglar de valda objekten runt en given axel <noinclude>[[Category:Template/sv]]</noinclude>

revision.text: {{{ 1 }}} ---- Use this template when you want to display a title on the Properties tab, for example : {{Properties_Title|Base}} [[Category:Administration]]
not used [[Category:Pages_to_delete]]

A '''property''' is a piece of information like a number or a text string that is attached to a FreeCAD document or an object in a document. Properties can be viewed and - if allowed - modified with the [[Property editor]].
Properties play a very important part in FreeCAD, since it is from the beginning made to work with parametric objects, which are objects defined only by their properties.
Custom [[scripted objects]] in FreeCAD can have properties of the following types:
Boolean Float FloatList FloatConstraint Angle Distance Integer IntegerConstraint Percent Enumeration IntegerList String StringList Link LinkList Matrix Vector VectorList Placement PlacementLink Color ColorList Material Path File FileIncluded PartShape FilletContour Circle <noinclude>[[Category:Template]]</noinclude>

A '''property''' is a piece of information like a number or a text string that is attached to a FreeCAD document or an object in a document. Properties can be viewed and - if allowed - modified with the [[Property editor]].
Properties play a very important part in FreeCAD, since it is from the beginning made to work with parametric objects, which are objects defined only by their properties.
Custom [[scripted objects]] in FreeCAD can have properties of the following types:
Boolean Float FloatList FloatConstraint Angle Distance Integer IntegerConstraint Percent Enumeration IntegerList String StringList Link LinkList Matrix Vector VectorList Placement PlacementLink Color ColorList Material Path File FileIncluded PartShape FilletContour Circle <noinclude>[[Category:Template/cs]]</noinclude>

Eine '''Objekteigenschaft''' ist eine Information, wie eine Ziffer oder ein Text, angehängt an ein FreeCAD-Dokument oder an ein Objekt in einem Dokument. Objekteigenschaft können betrachtet werden und - falls Berechtigung vorhanden - auch geändert werden, im [[Property editor/de|Eigenschaften-editor]].
Eigenschaften spielen eine ausgesprochen wichtige Rolle in FreeCAD, da diese von Anfang an nötig sind, um mit parametrischen Objekten zu arbeiten, da solche Objekte '''nur''' durch ihre Eigenschaften definiert werden.
Selbsterstellte Objekte [[scripted objects]] in FreeCAD können Objekteigenschaften der folgenden Typen besitzen:
Boolean Float FloatList FloatConstraint Angle Distance Integer IntegerConstraint Percent Enumeration IntegerList String StringList Link LinkList Matrix Vector VectorList Placement PlacementLink Color ColorList Material Path File FileIncluded PartShape FilletContour Circle <noinclude>[[Category:Template/de]]</noinclude>

A '''property''' is a piece of information like a number or a text string that is attached to a FreeCAD document or an object in a document. Properties can be viewed and - if allowed - modified with the [[Property editor]].
Properties play a very important part in FreeCAD, since it is from the beginning made to work with parametric objects, which are objects defined only by their properties.
Custom [[scripted objects]] in FreeCAD can have properties of the following types:
Boolean Float FloatList FloatConstraint Angle Distance Integer IntegerConstraint Percent Enumeration IntegerList String StringList Link LinkList Matrix Vector VectorList Placement PlacementLink Color ColorList Material Path File FileIncluded PartShape FilletContour Circle <noinclude>[[Category:Template/en]]</noinclude>

Una ''propiedad'' es un pedazo de información, tal como un número o una cadena de texto, que se adjunta a un documento de FreeCAD o a un objeto en un documento. Las propiedades pueden ser vistas y modificadas (sólo si tienes permisos para ello) con el [[property editor/es|Editor de propiedades]].
Las Propiedades juegan un papel muy importante en FreeCAD, ya que el programa fue concebido desde el principio para trabajar con objetos paramétricos, que son objetos definidos únicamente por sus propiedades.
En FreeCAD, los [[scripted objects/es|Archivos de guión para crear objetos]] personalizados por el usuario pueden tener propiedades de los siguientes tipos:
Boolean Float FloatList FloatConstraint Angle Distance Integer IntegerConstraint Percent Enumeration IntegerList String StringList Link LinkList Matrix Vector VectorList Placement PlacementLink Color ColorList Material Path File FileIncluded PartShape FilletContour Circle <noinclude>[[Category:Template/es]]</noinclude>

Une '''propriété''' est une pièce d'information comme un nombre ou une chaîne de texte, qui est rattachée à un document FreeCAD ou un objet dans un document. Les propriétés peuvent être affichées et - si c'est permis - modifiées avec l'[[property editor/fr|éditeur de propriétés]].
Les propriétés jouent un rôle important dans FreeCAD, puisqu'il est conçu dès le départ pour travailler avec des objets paramétriques, qui sont des objets définis seulement par leurs propriétés.
Les [[scripted objects/fr|objets scriptés]] personnalisés dans FreeCAD peuvent avoir des propriétés des types suivants :
Boolean Float FloatList FloatConstraint Angle Distance Integer IntegerConstraint Percent Enumeration IntegerList String StringList Link LinkList Matrix Vector VectorList Placement PlacementLink Color ColorList Material Path File FileIncluded PartShape FilletContour Circle <noinclude>[[Category:Template/fr]]</noinclude>

Una '''Proprietà''' è una parte di informazione sotto forma di numero o di stringa di testo che viene allegata a un documento FreeCAD oppure a un oggetto in un documento. Le proprietà possono essere visualizzate e, se consentito, modificate con l'[[Property editor/it|Editor delle proprietà]].
In FreeCAD le proprietà svolgono un ruolo molto importante in quanto esso è concepito per lavorare con oggetti parametrici, ovvero oggetti definiti solo dalle loro proprietà.
In FreeCAD gli [[scripted objects/it|oggetti script]] personalizzati possono avere proprietà dei seguenti tipi:
Boolean Float FloatList FloatConstraint Angle Distance Integer IntegerConstraint Percent Enumeration IntegerList String StringList Link LinkList Matrix Vector VectorList Placement PlacementLink Color ColorList Material Path File FileIncluded PartShape FilletContour Circle <noinclude>[[Category:Administration/it]] [[Category:Template/it]]</noinclude>

'''Właściwość''' jest kawałkiem informacji jak liczba czy ciąg znaków, który jest dołączony do dokumentu FreeCADa lub obiektu w dokumencie. Właściwości mogą być przeglądane i (jeśli to dozwolone) modyfikowane w [[property editor/pl|edytorze właściwości]].
Właściwości są bardzo ważną częścią FreeCADa, od kiedy zaczynamy pracę z parametrycznymi obiektami, które są zdefiniowane przez ich właściwości.
Własne [[scripted objects/pl|obiekty skryptowane]] mogą mieć właściwości następujących typów:
Boolean Float FloatList FloatConstraint Angle Distance Integer IntegerConstraint Percent Enumeration IntegerList String StringList Link LinkList Matrix Vector VectorList Placement PlacementLink Color ColorList Material Path File FileIncluded PartShape FilletContour Circle <noinclude>[[Category:Template/pl]]</noinclude>

A '''property''' is a piece of information like a number or a text string that is attached to a FreeCAD document or an object in a document. Properties can be viewed and - if allowed - modified with the [[Property editor]].
Properties play a very important part in FreeCAD, since it is from the beginning made to work with parametric objects, which are objects defined only by their properties.
Custom [[scripted objects]] in FreeCAD can have properties of the following types:
Boolean Float FloatList FloatConstraint Angle Distance Integer IntegerConstraint Percent Enumeration IntegerList String StringList Link LinkList Matrix Vector VectorList Placement PlacementLink Color ColorList Material Path File FileIncluded PartShape FilletContour Circle <noinclude>[[Category:Template/ro]]</noinclude>

'''Свойство''' это кусочек информации например число илии строка текста, которая прилагается к документу FreeCAD или объекту в документе. Свойства могут быть просмотрены и - если это разрешено - изменены с помощью [[property editor/ru|редактора свойств]].
Свойства играю важную роль в FreeCAD, так как они нужны для начало работы с параметрическими объектами, которые являются объектами определенными только их свойствами.
Пользовательски [[scripted objects/ru|параметрические объекты]] в FreeCAD могут обладать свойствами следующих типов:
Boolean Float FloatList FloatConstraint Angle Distance Integer IntegerConstraint Percent Enumeration IntegerList String StringList Link LinkList Matrix Vector VectorList Placement PlacementLink Color ColorList Material Path File FileIncluded PartShape FilletContour Circle <noinclude>[[Category:Template/ru]]</noinclude>

En '''egenskap''' är en informationsbit som till exempel ett nummer eller en textsträng som hör till ett FreeCAD dokument eller ett objekt i ett dokument. Egenskaper kan visas och - om det är tillåtet - ändras med [[property editor/sv|egenskapsredigeraren]].
Egenskaper spelar en mycket viktig roll i FreeCAD, eftersom det från början är gjort för att arbeta med parametriska objekt, vilket är objekt som endast definieras av deras egenskaper.
Anpassade [[scripted objects/sv|skript objekt]] i FreeCAD kan ha egenskaper av följande typer:
Boolean Float FloatList FloatConstraint Angle Distance Integer IntegerConstraint Percent Enumeration IntegerList String StringList Link LinkList Matrix Vector VectorList Placement PlacementLink Color ColorList Material Path File FileIncluded PartShape FilletContour Circle <noinclude>[[Category:Template/sv]]</noinclude>

A '''property''' is a piece of information like a number or a text string that is attached to a FreeCAD document or an object in a document. Properties can be viewed and - if allowed - modified with the [[Property editor]].
Properties play a very important part in FreeCAD, since it is from the beginning made to work with parametric objects, which are objects defined only by their properties.
Custom [[scripted objects]] in FreeCAD can have properties of the following types:
Boolean Float FloatList FloatConstraint Angle Distance Integer IntegerConstraint Percent Enumeration IntegerList String StringList Link LinkList Matrix Vector VectorList Placement PlacementLink Color ColorList Material Path File FileIncluded PartShape FilletContour Circle <noinclude>[[Category:Template/tr]]</noinclude>

VIEW'''{{{1}}}''' ---- Use this template where you want to show a View property, for example: {{PropertyView|Length}} [[Category:Administration]]
not used [[Category:Pages_to_delete]]

{{TitleProperty|Base}}
* {{PropertyView|Bounding Box}} : To view the occupation, and, overall, of the object dimensions in space. Value {{FALSE}}, or {{TRUE}} (Default, {{FALSE}}).
* {{PropertyView|Control Point}} : Value {{FALSE}}, or {{TRUE}} (Default, {{FALSE}}).
* {{PropertyView|Deviation}} :
* {{PropertyView|Display Mode}} :Display mode of the form, '''Flat lines, Shaded, Wireframe, Points''' [[IMAGE:Vue_DisplayModePartDesign_fr_00.png|96px]]. (Default, '''Flat lines''').
* {{PropertyView|Lighting}} : Lighting '''One side, Two side''' [[IMAGE:Vue_Lighting_fr_00.png|96px]]. (Default, '''Two side''').
* {{PropertyView|Line Color}} : Gives the color of the line (edges) (Default, '''25, 25, 25''').
* {{PropertyView|Line Width}} : Gives the thickness of the line (edges) (Default, '''2''').
* {{PropertyView|Point Color}} : Gives the color of the points (ends of the form) (Default, '''25, 25, 25''').
* {{PropertyView|Point Size}} : Gives the size of the points (Default, '''2''').
* {{PropertyView|Selectable}} : Allows the selection of the form. Value {{FALSE}}, ou {{TRUE}} (Default, {{TRUE}}).
* {{PropertyView|Shape Color}} : Give the color shape (default, '''204, 204, 204''').
* {{PropertyView|Transparency}} : Sets the degree of transparency in the form of '''0''' to '''100''' (Default, '''0''').
* {{PropertyView|Visibility}} : Determines the visibility of the form (like the bar {{KEY|SPACE}}). Value {{FALSE}}, or {{TRUE}} (Default, {{TRUE}}).
{{clear}}
<noinclude>[[Category:Administration]]</noinclude>

{{KEY/it|Base}}
* {{ProprietaVista|Bounding Box}} : Contenitore, serve per visualizzare la zona occupata, e le dimensioni complessive degli oggetti nello spazio. Valore False, o True (Default, False).
* {{ProprietaVista|Control Point}} : Punto di controllo. Valore False, o True (Default, False).
* {{ProprietaVista|Deviation}} :
* {{ProprietaVista|Display Mode}} : Modalità di visualizzazione della forma, Flat lines, Shaded, Wireframe, Points. (Default, Flat lines).
* {{ProprietaVista|Lighting}} : Illuminazione One side, Two side. (Default, Two side).
* {{ProprietaVista|Line Color}} : Colore della linea (edges) (Default, 25, 25, 25).
* {{ProprietaVista|Line Width}} : Spessore della linea (edges) (Default, 2).
* {{ProprietaVista|Point Color}} : Colore dei punti (finali) (Default, 25, 25, 25).
* {{ProprietaVista|Point Size}} : Dimenione dei punti (Default, 2).
* {{ProprietaVista|Selectable}} : Selezionabile, consente la selezione della forma. Valore False, o True (Default, True).
* {{ProprietaVista|Shape Color}} : Colore della forma (default, 204, 204, 204).
* {{ProprietaVista|Transparency}} : Grado di trasparenza della forma, variabile da 0 a 100 (Default, 0).
* {{ProprietaVista|Visibility}} : Visualizza o nasconde la forma, come la barra {{KEY|SPAZIO}}. Valore False, o True (Default, True).
{{clear}} <noinclude>[[Category:Administration]] [[Category:Template/it]]</noinclude>

[[Category:Template]]

===Raytracing project tools===
These are the main tools for exporting your 3D work to external renderers
* [[Image:Raytracing_New.png|32px]] [[Raytracing_New|New PovRay project]]: Insert new PovRay project in the document * [[Image:Raytracing_Lux.png|32px]] [[Raytracing_Lux|New LuxRender project]]: Insert new LuxRender project in the document * [[Image:Raytracing_InsertPart.png|32px]] [[Raytracing_InsertPart|Insert part]]: Insert a view of a Part in a raytracing project * [[Image:Raytracing_ResetCamera.png|32px]] [[Raytracing_ResetCamera|Reset camera]]: Matches the camera position of a raytracing project to the current view * [[Image:Raytracing_ExportProject.png|32px]] [[Raytracing_ExportProject|Export project]]: Exports a raytracing project to a scene file for rendering in an external renderer * [[Image:Raytracing_Render.png|32px]] [[Raytracing_Render|Render]]: Renders a raytracing project with an external renderer
===Utilities===
These are helper tools to perform specific tasks manually
* [[Image:Raytracing_Export.png|32px]] [[Raytracing_Export|Export view to povray]]: Write the active 3D view with camera and all its content to a povray file * [[Image:Raytracing_Camera.png|32px]] [[Raytracing_Camera|Export camera to povray]]: Export the camera position of the active 3D view in POV-Ray format to a file * [[Image:Raytracing_Part.png|32px]] [[Raytracing_Part|Export part to povray]]: Write the selected Part (object) as a povray file <noinclude>[[Category:Template]]</noinclude>

下面这些工具可将你的三维设计成果面向外部渲染工具导出
* [[Image:Raytracing_New.png|32px]] [[Raytracing_New|新建 PovRay 项目]]：在文档中插入新的 PovRay 项目 * [[Image:Raytracing_Export.png|32px]] [[Raytracing_Export|导出 povray 视图]]：将活动的三维视图（包含相机及其他信息）写入一份 povray 文件 * [[Image:Raytracing_Camera.png|32px]] [[Raytracing_Camera|将相机导出至 povray 文件]]：将活动的三维视图对应的相机位置以 POV-Ray 格式写入一份文件 * [[Image:Raytracing_Part.png|32px]] [[Raytracing_Part|将零件导出至 povray 文件]]：将所选零件（对象）信息写入一份 povray 文件 <noinclude>[[Category:Template/cn]]</noinclude>

Dies sind Werkzeuge zum Export Ihrer 3D-Arbeit zu externen Renderern

Estas son las herramientas para exportar tu trabajo 3D a aplicaciones de renderizado externas
