* [[Image:Sketcher_CreatePoint.png|32px]] [[Sketcher_Point/pt|Point]]: Draws a point * [[Image:Sketcher_Arc.png|32px]] [[Sketcher_Arc/pt|Arc]]: Draws an arc segment from center, radius, start angle and end angle * [[Image:Sketcher_Circle.png|32px]] [[Sketcher_Circle/pt|Circle]]: Draws a circle from center and radius * [[Image:Sketcher_Line.png|32px]] [[Sketcher_Line/pt|2-point Line]]: Draws a line segment from 2 points * [[Image:Sketcher_CreatePolyline.png|32px]] [[Sketcher_Polyline/pt|Polyline (multiple-point line)]]: Draws a line made of multiple line segments * [[Image:Sketcher_CreateRectangle.png|32px]] [[Sketcher_Rectangle/pt|Rectangle]]: Draws a rectangle from 2 opposite points * [[Image:Sketcher_CreateFillet.png|32px]] [[Sketcher_Fillet/pt|Fillet]]: Makes a fillet between two lines joined at one point. Select both lines or click on the corner point, then activate the tool. * [[Image:Sketcher_Trimming.png|32px]] [[Sketcher_Trimming/pt|Trimming]]: Trims a line, circle or arc with respect to the clicked point. * [[Image:Sketcher_External.png|32px]] [[Sketcher_External/pt|External Geometry]]: Creates an edge linked to external geometry. * [[Image:Sketcher_AlterConstruction.png|32px]] [[Sketcher_ConstructionMode/pt|Construction Mode]]: Toggles an element to/from construction mode. A construction object will not be used in a 3D geometry operation.
====Sketcher Constraints====
Constraints are used to set rules between sketch elements, and to lock the sketch along the vertical and horizontal axes.
* [[Image:Sketcher_ConstrainLock.png‎|32px]] [[Constraint_Lock/pt|Lock]]: Creates a lock constraint on the selected item by setting vertical and horizontal dimensions relative to the origin (dimensions can be edited afterwards). * [[Image:Constraint_PointOnPoint.png|32px]] [[Constraint_PointOnPoint/pt|Coincident]]: Creates a coincident (point-on-point) constraint between two selected points. * [[Image:Constraint_PointOnObject.png|32px]] [[Constraint_PointOnObject/pt|Point On Object]]: Creates a point-on-object constraint on selected items. * [[Image:Constraint_HorizontalDistance.png‎|32px]] [[Constraint_HorizontalDistance/pt|Horizontal Distance]]: Fixes the horizontal distance between 2 points or line ends. If only one item is selected, the distance is set to the origin. * [[Image:Constraint_VerticalDistance.png|32px]] [[Constraint_VerticalDistance/pt|Vertical Distance]]: Fixes the vertical distance between 2 points or line ends. If only one item is selected, the distance is set to the origin. * [[Image:Constraint_Vertical.png|32px]] [[Constraint_Vertical/pt|Vertical]]: Creates a vertical constraint to the selected lines or polylines elements. More than one object can be selected. * [[Image:Constraint_Horizontal.png|32px]] [[Constraint_Horizontal/pt|Horizontal]]: Creates a horizontal constraint to the selected lines or polylines elements. More than one object can be selected. * [[Image:Constraint_Length.png|32px]] [[Constraint_Length/pt|Length]]: Creates a length constraint on a selected line. * [[Image:Constraint_Radius.png|32px]] [[Constraint_Radius/pt|Radius]]: Creates a radius constraint on a selected arc or circle. * [[Image:Constraint_Parallel.png|32px]] [[Constraint_Parallel/pt|Parallel]]: Creates a parallel constraint between two selected lines. * [[Image:Constraint_Perpendicular.png|32px]] [[Constraint_Perpendicular/pt|Perpendicular]]: Creates a perpendicular constraint between two selected lines. * [[Image:Constraint_InternalAngle.png|32px]] [[Constraint_InternalAngle/pt|InternalAngle]]: Creates an internal angle constraint between two selected lines. * [[Image:Constraint_Tangent.png|32px]] [[Constraint_Tangent/pt|Tangent]]: Creates a tangent constraint between two selected entities, or a colinear constraint between two line segments. * [[Image:Constraint_EqualLength.png|32px]] [[Constraint_EqualLength/pt|Equal Length]]: Creates an equality constraint between two selected entities. If used on circle or arcs, the radius will be set equal. * [[Image:Constraint_Symmetric.png|32px]] [[Constraint_Symmetric/pt|Symmetric]]: Creates‎ a symmetric constraint between 2 points with respect to a line.
====Other====
* [[Image:Sketcher_NewSketch.png‎‎|32px]] [[Sketcher_NewSketch/pt|New Sketch]]: Creates‎ a new sketch on a selected face or plane. If none were selected, the default work plane XY will be used. * [[Image:Sketcher_ViewSketch.png‎|32px]] [[Sketcher_ViewSketch/pt|View sketch]]: Sets the model view perpendicular to the sketch plane. * [[Image:Sketcher_MapSketch.png‎|32px]] [[Sketcher_MapSketch/pt|Map sketch]]: maps a sketch to the previously selected face of a solid. * [[Image:Sketcher_LeaveSketch.png|32px]] [[Sketcher_LeaveSketch/pt|Leave Sketch]]: Leave the Sketch editing mode. * [[Sketcher_Reorient/pt|Sketcher Reorient]]: Allows you to change the position of a sketch * [[Sketcher_Validate/pt|Valida sketch]]: It allows you to check if there are in the tolerance of different points and to match them. <noinclude>[[Category:Template/pt]]</noinclude>

====Sketcher Geometries====
These are tools for creating objects.
* [[Image:Sketcher_CreatePoint.png|32px]] [[Sketcher_Point/pt-br|Point]]: Draws a point * [[Image:Sketcher_Arc.png|32px]] [[Sketcher_Arc/pt-br|Arc]]: Draws an arc segment from center, radius, start angle and end angle * [[Image:Sketcher_Circle.png|32px]] [[Sketcher_Circle/pt-br|Circle]]: Draws a circle from center and radius * [[Image:Sketcher_Line.png|32px]] [[Sketcher_Line/pt-br|2-point Line]]: Draws a line segment from 2 points * [[Image:Sketcher_CreatePolyline.png|32px]] [[Sketcher_Polyline/pt-br|Polyline (multiple-point line)]]: Draws a line made of multiple line segments * [[Image:Sketcher_CreateRectangle.png|32px]] [[Sketcher_Rectangle/pt-br|Rectangle]]: Draws a rectangle from 2 opposite points * [[Image:Sketcher_CreateFillet.png|32px]] [[Sketcher_Fillet/pt-br|Fillet]]: Makes a fillet between two lines joined at one point. Select both lines or click on the corner point, then activate the tool. * [[Image:Sketcher_Trimming.png|32px]] [[Sketcher_Trimming/pt-br|Trimming]]: Trims a line, circle or arc with respect to the clicked point. * [[Image:Sketcher_External.png|32px]] [[Sketcher_External/pt-br|External Geometry]]: Creates an edge linked to external geometry. * [[Image:Sketcher_AlterConstruction.png|32px]] [[Sketcher_ConstructionMode/pt-br|Construction Mode]]: Toggles an element to/from construction mode. A construction object will not be used in a 3D geometry operation.
====Sketcher Constraints====
Constraints are used to set rules between sketch elements, and to lock the sketch along the vertical and horizontal axes.
* [[Image:Sketcher_ConstrainLock.png‎|32px]] [[Constraint_Lock/pt-br|Lock]]: Creates a lock constraint on the selected item by setting vertical and horizontal dimensions relative to the origin (dimensions can be edited afterwards). * [[Image:Constraint_PointOnPoint.png|32px]] [[Constraint_PointOnPoint/pt-br|Coincident]]: Creates a coincident (point-on-point) constraint between two selected points. * [[Image:Constraint_PointOnObject.png|32px]] [[Constraint_PointOnObject/pt-br|Point On Object]]: Creates a point-on-object constraint on selected items. * [[Image:Constraint_HorizontalDistance.png‎|32px]] [[Constraint_HorizontalDistance/pt-br|Horizontal Distance]]: Fixes the horizontal distance between 2 points or line ends. If only one item is selected, the distance is set to the origin. * [[Image:Constraint_VerticalDistance.png|32px]] [[Constraint_VerticalDistance/pt-br|Vertical Distance]]: Fixes the vertical distance between 2 points or line ends. If only one item is selected, the distance is set to the origin. * [[Image:Constraint_Vertical.png|32px]] [[Constraint_Vertical/pt-br|Vertical]]: Creates a vertical constraint to the selected lines or polylines elements. More than one object can be selected. * [[Image:Constraint_Horizontal.png|32px]] [[Constraint_Horizontal/pt-br|Horizontal]]: Creates a horizontal constraint to the selected lines or polylines elements. More than one object can be selected. * [[Image:Constraint_Length.png|32px]] [[Constraint_Length/pt-br|Length]]: Creates a length constraint on a selected line. * [[Image:Constraint_Radius.png|32px]] [[Constraint_Radius/pt-br|Radius]]: Creates a radius constraint on a selected arc or circle. * [[Image:Constraint_Parallel.png|32px]] [[Constraint_Parallel/pt-br|Parallel]]: Creates a parallel constraint between two selected lines. * [[Image:Constraint_Perpendicular.png|32px]] [[Constraint_Perpendicular/pt-br|Perpendicular]]: Creates a perpendicular constraint between two selected lines. * [[Image:Constraint_InternalAngle.png|32px]] [[Constraint_InternalAngle/pt-br|InternalAngle]]: Creates an internal angle constraint between two selected lines. * [[Image:Constraint_Tangent.png|32px]] [[Constraint_Tangent/pt-br|Tangent]]: Creates a tangent constraint between two selected entities, or a colinear constraint between two line segments. * [[Image:Constraint_EqualLength.png|32px]] [[Constraint_EqualLength/pt-br|Equal Length]]: Creates an equality constraint between two selected entities. If used on circle or arcs, the radius will be set equal. * [[Image:Constraint_Symmetric.png|32px]] [[Constraint_Symmetric/pt-br|Symmetric]]: Creates‎ a symmetric constraint between 2 points with respect to a line.
====Other====
* [[Image:Sketcher_NewSketch.png‎‎|32px]] [[Sketcher_NewSketch/pt-br|New Sketch]]: Creates‎ a new sketch on a selected face or plane. If none were selected, the default work plane XY will be used. * [[Image:Sketcher_ViewSketch.png‎|32px]] [[Sketcher_ViewSketch/pt-br|View sketch]]: Sets the model view perpendicular to the sketch plane. * [[Image:Sketcher_MapSketch.png‎|32px]] [[Sketcher_MapSketch/pt-br|Map sketch]]: maps a sketch to the previously selected face of a solid. * [[Image:Sketcher_LeaveSketch.png|32px]] [[Sketcher_LeaveSketch/pt-br|Leave Sketch]]: Leave the Sketch editing mode. * [[Sketcher_Reorient/pt-br|Sketcher Reorient]]: Allows you to change the position of a sketch * [[Sketcher_Validate/pt-br|Valida sketch]]: It allows you to check if there are in the tolerance of different points and to match them. <noinclude>[[Category:Template/pt-br]]</noinclude>

====Sketcher Объекты====
Эти инструменты создают объекты.
* [[Image:Sketcher_Arc.svg|32px]] [[Sketcher_Arc|Дуга]]: Рисует сегмент дуги по заданным центру, радиусу, начальному и конечному углу * [[Image:Sketcher_Circle.svg|32px]] [[Sketcher_Circle|Окружность]]: Рисует окружность по центру и радиусу * [[Image:Sketcher_Line.svg|32px]] [[Sketcher_Line|Отрезок]]: Рисует отрезок через две точки * [[Image:Sketcher_Polyline.svg|32px]] [[Sketcher Polyline|Polyline (multiple-point line)]]: Рисует кривую состоящую из отрезков * [[Image:Sketcher_Rectangle.svg|32px]] [[Sketcher_Rectangle|Прямоугольник]]: Рисует прямоугольник по двум противоположным * [[Image:Sketcher_CreateFillet.png|32px]] [[Sketcher_Fillet|Скругление]]: Создает скругление между двумя пересекающимися линиями. Чтобы активировать инструмент, выберете обе линии или щелкните на точке пересечения. * [[Image:Sketcher_AlterConstruction.png|32px]] [[Sketcher_ConstructionMode|Вспомогательная геометрия]]: Переводит элемент в/из режима вспомогательной геометрии. Вспомогательные объекты не используются в операциях с трехмерной геометрией.
====Sketcher Ограничения====
Ограничения используются для задания правил между элементами эскиза, и для блокировки эскиза вдоль вертикальной и горизонтальной осей.
* [[Image:Constraint_Lock.svg‎|32px]] [[Constraint_Lock|Блокировать]]: Создает блокирующие ограничение на выбранном объекте, фиксируя размеры относительно начало координат (позже,размеры могут быть изменены). * [[Image:Constraint_PointOnPoint.svg‎|32px]] [[Constraint_PointOnPoint|Совпадение]]: Создает ограничение совпадение (точка с точкой) между двумя точками. * [[Image:Constraint_PointOnObject.svg‎|32px]] [[Constraint_PointOnObject|Точка на объекте]]: Создает ограничение заставляющее точку находится на выбранном объекте. * [[Image:Constraint_HorizontalDistance.svg‎|32px]] [[Constraint_HorizontalDistance|Удален по горизонтали]]: Фиксирует горизонтальное расстояние между двумя точками или концами линий. Если выбран только один объект, расстояние рассчитывается от начала координат. * [[Image:Constraint_VerticalDistance.svg‎|32px]] [[Constraint_VerticalDistance|Удален по вертикали]]: Фиксирует вертикальное расстояние между двумя точками или концами линий. Если выбран только один объект, расстояние рассчитывается от начала координат. * [[Image:Constraint_Vertical.svg‎|32px]] [[Constraint_Vertical|Вертикально]]: Создает ограничение вертикальности для линии или элемента polyline. Можно выбрать больше одного объекта. * [[Image:Constraint_Horizontal.svg‎|32px]] [[Constraint_Horizontal|Горизонтально]]: Создает ограничение горизонтальности для линии или элемента polyline. Можно выбрать больше одного объекта. * [[Image:Constraint_Length.svg‎|32px]] [[Constraint_Length|Длинна]]: Создает ограничение на размер указанной линии. * [[Image:Constraint_Radius.svg‎|32px]] [[Constraint_Radius|Радиус]]: Создает ограничение на размер радиуса указанной дуги, или окружности. * [[Image:Constraint_Parallel.svg‎|32px]] [[Constraint_Parallel|Параллельно]]: Создает ограничение параллельности двух выбранных линий. * [[Image:Constraint_Perpendicular.svg‎|32px]] [[Constraint_Perpendicular|Перпендикулярно]]: Создает ограничение перпендикулярности двух выбранных линий. * [[Image:Constraint_InternalAngle.svg‎|32px]] [[Constraint_InternalAngle|Внутренний угол]]: Создает ограничение заданного внутреннего угла между двумя линиями. * [[Image:Constraint_Tangent.svg‎|32px]] [[Constraint_Tangent|Касательная]]: Создает ограничения касания между двумя объектами, или ограничение коллинеарность между двумя отрезками. * [[Image:Constraint_EqualLength.svg‎|32px]] [[Constraint_EqualLength|Равной длинны]]: Создает ограничение между двумя указанными объектами. Если используются дуги или окружности, то равными должны быть их радиусы. * [[Image:Constraint_Symmetric.svg‎|32px]] [[Constraint_Symmetric|Симметрично]]: Создает ограничение симметрии между двумя точками по отношению к линии.
====Остальное====
* [[Image:Sketcher_NewSketch.png‎‎|32px]] [[Sketcher_NewSketch|Новый эскиз]]: Создать новый эскиз на выбранной плоскости или грани. Если ничего не выбрано, по умолчанию используется плоскость XY. * [[Image:Sketcher_LeaveSketch.svg‎|32px]] [[Sketcher_LeaveSketch|Выйти из эскиза]]: покинуть режим редактирования Эскиза. <noinclude>[[Category:Template/ru]]</noinclude>

====Sketcher Geometries====
These are tools for creating objects.
* [[Image:Sketcher_CreatePoint.png|32px]] [[Sketcher_Point/sv|Point]]: Draws a point * [[Image:Sketcher_Arc.png|32px]] [[Sketcher_Arc/sv|Arc]]: Draws an arc segment from center, radius, start angle and end angle * [[Image:Sketcher_Circle.png|32px]] [[Sketcher_Circle/sv|Circle]]: Draws a circle from center and radius * [[Image:Sketcher_Line.png|32px]] [[Sketcher_Line/sv|2-point Line]]: Draws a line segment from 2 points * [[Image:Sketcher_CreatePolyline.png|32px]] [[Sketcher_Polyline/sv|Polyline (multiple-point line)]]: Draws a line made of multiple line segments * [[Image:Sketcher_CreateRectangle.png|32px]] [[Sketcher_Rectangle/sv|Rectangle]]: Draws a rectangle from 2 opposite points * [[Image:Sketcher_CreateFillet.png|32px]] [[Sketcher_Fillet/sv|Fillet]]: Makes a fillet between two lines joined at one point. Select both lines or click on the corner point, then activate the tool. * [[Image:Sketcher_Trimming.png|32px]] [[Sketcher_Trimming/sv|Trimming]]: Trims a line, circle or arc with respect to the clicked point. * [[Image:Sketcher_External.png|32px]] [[Sketcher_External/sv|External Geometry]]: Creates an edge linked to external geometry. * [[Image:Sketcher_AlterConstruction.png|32px]] [[Sketcher_ConstructionMode/sv|Construction Mode]]: Toggles an element to/from construction mode. A construction object will not be used in a 3D geometry operation.
====Sketcher Constraints====
Constraints are used to set rules between sketch elements, and to lock the sketch along the vertical and horizontal axes.
* [[Image:Sketcher_ConstrainLock.png‎|32px]] [[Constraint_Lock/sv|Lock]]: Creates a lock constraint on the selected item by setting vertical and horizontal dimensions relative to the origin (dimensions can be edited afterwards). * [[Image:Constraint_PointOnPoint.png|32px]] [[Constraint_PointOnPoint/sv|Coincident]]: Creates a coincident (point-on-point) constraint between two selected points. * [[Image:Constraint_PointOnObject.png|32px]] [[Constraint_PointOnObject/sv|Point On Object]]: Creates a point-on-object constraint on selected items. * [[Image:Constraint_HorizontalDistance.png‎|32px]] [[Constraint_HorizontalDistance/sv|Horizontal Distance]]: Fixes the horizontal distance between 2 points or line ends. If only one item is selected, the distance is set to the origin. * [[Image:Constraint_VerticalDistance.png|32px]] [[Constraint_VerticalDistance/sv|Vertical Distance]]: Fixes the vertical distance between 2 points or line ends. If only one item is selected, the distance is set to the origin. * [[Image:Constraint_Vertical.png|32px]] [[Constraint_Vertical/sv|Vertical]]: Creates a vertical constraint to the selected lines or polylines elements. More than one object can be selected. * [[Image:Constraint_Horizontal.png|32px]] [[Constraint_Horizontal/sv|Horizontal]]: Creates a horizontal constraint to the selected lines or polylines elements. More than one object can be selected. * [[Image:Constraint_Length.png|32px]] [[Constraint_Length/sv|Length]]: Creates a length constraint on a selected line. * [[Image:Constraint_Radius.png|32px]] [[Constraint_Radius/sv|Radius]]: Creates a radius constraint on a selected arc or circle. * [[Image:Constraint_Parallel.png|32px]] [[Constraint_Parallel/sv|Parallel]]: Creates a parallel constraint between two selected lines. * [[Image:Constraint_Perpendicular.png|32px]] [[Constraint_Perpendicular/sv|Perpendicular]]: Creates a perpendicular constraint between two selected lines. * [[Image:Constraint_InternalAngle.png|32px]] [[Constraint_InternalAngle/sv|InternalAngle]]: Creates an internal angle constraint between two selected lines. * [[Image:Constraint_Tangent.png|32px]] [[Constraint_Tangent/sv|Tangent]]: Creates a tangent constraint between two selected entities, or a colinear constraint between two line segments. * [[Image:Constraint_EqualLength.png|32px]] [[Constraint_EqualLength/sv|Equal Length]]: Creates an equality constraint between two selected entities. If used on circle or arcs, the radius will be set equal. * [[Image:Constraint_Symmetric.png|32px]] [[Constraint_Symmetric/sv|Symmetric]]: Creates‎ a symmetric constraint between 2 points with respect to a line.
====Other====
* [[Image:Sketcher_NewSketch.png‎‎|32px]] [[Sketcher_NewSketch/sv|New Sketch]]: Creates‎ a new sketch on a selected face or plane. If none were selected, the default work plane XY will be used. * [[Image:Sketcher_ViewSketch.png‎|32px]] [[Sketcher_ViewSketch/sv|View sketch]]: Sets the model view perpendicular to the sketch plane. * [[Image:Sketcher_MapSketch.png‎|32px]] [[Sketcher_MapSketch/sv|Map sketch]]: maps a sketch to the previously selected face of a solid. * [[Image:Sketcher_LeaveSketch.png|32px]] [[Sketcher_LeaveSketch/sv|Leave Sketch]]: Leave the Sketch editing mode. * [[Sketcher_Reorient/sv|Sketcher Reorient]]: Allows you to change the position of a sketch * [[Sketcher_Validate/sv|Valida sketch]]: It allows you to check if there are in the tolerance of different points and to match them. <noinclude>[[Category:Template/sv]]</noinclude>

{|border=1 class="mousemodel" !align=center width="25%"|Select !align=center width="25%"|Pan !align=center width="25%"|Zoom !align=center width="25%"|Rotate View |- align=center |[[Image:Hand_cursor.png]] |[[Image:Pan_cursor.png]] |[[Image:Zoom_cursor.png]] |[[Image:Rotate_cursor.png]] |- align= center |[[Image:Select-touchpad.png | 70px | Alt=Touchpad with left button clicked | to Select ]] |{{KEY|shift}}+[[Image:Touchpad.png | 70px | Alt=Touchpad with no button clicked | to Pan]] |{{KEY|PgUp}} / {{KEY|PgDn}} |{{KEY|alt}}+[[Image:Touchpad.png | 70px | Alt=Touchpad with no button clicked | to Rotate]] |-valign=top |Appuyez sur le bouton gauche de la souris au-dessus de l'objet que vous souhaitez sélectionner. |Maintenez appuyée la touche Maj et déplacer l'objet. |Utilisez les touches PgUp et PgDn pour zoomer et dézoomer. |Maintenez la touche alt enfoncée et déplacez le curseur. |- align= center | | | ''ou'' | ''ou'' |- align= center | | |{{KEY|shift}}+{{KEY|ctrl}}+[[Image:Select-touchpad.png | 70px | Alt=Touchpad with left button clicked | to Zoom]] |{{KEY|shift}}+{{KEY|ctrl}}+[[Image:Touchpad.png | 70px | Alt=Touchpad with no button clicked | to ROtate]] |-valign=top | | |Maintenez les touches {{KEY|shift}}+{{KEY|ctrl}} enfoncées, et appuyez sur le bouton gauche de la souris puis déplacez le pointeur. |Maintenez les touches {{KEY|shift}}+{{KEY|ctrl}} enfoncées, puis déplacez le curseur. |} <noinclude>[[Category:Template/fr]]</noinclude>

{|border=1 class="mousemodel" !align=center width="25%"|Select !align=center width="25%"|Pan !align=center width="25%"|Zoom !align=center width="25%"|Rotate View |- align=center |[[Image:Hand_cursor.png]] |[[Image:Pan_cursor.png]] |[[Image:Zoom_cursor.png]] |[[Image:Rotate_cursor.png]] |- align= center |[[Image:Select-touchpad.png | 70px | Alt=Touchpad with left button clicked | to Select ]] |{{KEY|shift}}+[[Image:Touchpad.png | 70px | Alt=Touchpad with no button clicked | to Pan]] |{{KEY|PgUp}} / {{KEY|PgDn}} |{{KEY|alt}}+[[Image:Touchpad.png | 70px | Alt=Touchpad with no button clicked | to Rotate]] |-valign=top |Press the left mouse button over an object you want to select. |Hold shift and move the object around. |Use PgUp and PgDn to zoom in and out. |Hold alt and move the pointer. |- align= center | | | ''or'' | ''or'' |- align= center | | |{{KEY|shift}}+{{KEY|ctrl}}+[[Image:Select-touchpad.png | 70px | Alt=Touchpad with left button clicked | to Zoom]] |{{KEY|shift}}+{{KEY|ctrl}}+[[Image:Touchpad.png | 70px | Alt=Touchpad with no button clicked | to ROtate]] |-valign=top | | |Hold down both the shift and the ctrl keys, press the left mouse button, and move the pointer. |Hold down both the shift and the ctrl keys and move the pointer. |} <noinclude>[[Category:Template]]</noinclude>

{|border=1 class="mousemodel" !align=center width="25%"|Select !align=center width="25%"|Pan !align=center width="25%"|Zoom !align=center width="25%"|Rotate View |- align=center |[[Image:Hand_cursor.png]] |[[Image:Pan_cursor.png]] |[[Image:Zoom_cursor.png]] |[[Image:Rotate_cursor.png]] |- align= center |[[Image:Select-touchpad.png | 70px | Alt=Touchpad with left button clicked | to Select ]] |{{KEY|shift}}+[[Image:Touchpad.png | 70px | Alt=Touchpad with no button clicked | to Pan]] |{{KEY|PgUp}} / {{KEY|PgDn}} |{{KEY|alt}}+[[Image:Touchpad.png | 70px | Alt=Touchpad with no button clicked | to Rotate]] |-valign=top |Press the left mouse button over an object you want to select. |Hold shift and move the object around. |Use PgUp and PgDn to zoom in and out. |Hold alt and move the pointer. |- align= center | | | ''or'' | ''or'' |- align= center | | |{{KEY|shift}}+{{KEY|ctrl}}+[[Image:Select-touchpad.png | 70px | Alt=Touchpad with left button clicked | to Zoom]] |{{KEY|shift}}+{{KEY|ctrl}}+[[Image:Touchpad.png | 70px | Alt=Touchpad with no button clicked | to ROtate]] |-valign=top | | |Hold down both the shift and the ctrl keys, press the left mouse button, and move the pointer. |Hold down both the shift and the ctrl keys and move the pointer. |} <noinclude>[[Category:Template/cs]]</noinclude>

{|border=1 class="mousemodel" !align=center width="25%"|Selezione !align=center width="25%"|Traslazione !align=center width="25%"|Zoom !align=center width="25%"|Rotazione |- align=center |[[Image:Hand_cursor.png]] |[[Image:Pan_cursor.png]] |[[Image:Zoom_cursor.png]] |[[Image:Rotate_cursor.png]] |- align= center |[[Image:Select-touchpad.png | 70px | Alt=Touchpad with left button clicked | to Select ]] |{{KEY|shift}}+[[Image:Touchpad.png | 70px | Alt=Touchpad with no button clicked | to Pan]] |{{KEY|PgUp}} / {{KEY|PgDn}} |{{KEY|alt}}+[[Image:Touchpad.png | 70px | Alt=Touchpad with no button clicked | to Rotate]] |-valign=top |Premere il tasto sinistro sull'oggetto che si vuole selezionare. |Tenere premuto il tasto Maiuscola e spostare l'oggetto. |Usare PgUp o PgDn per ingrandire o ridurre. |Tenere premuto il tasto Alt e muovere il puntatore. |} <noinclude>[[Category:Administration/it]] [[Category:Template/it]]</noinclude>

{|class="wikitable ct" width=100% height=100% style="float: right; width: 230px; margin-left: 1em" | | class="ctTitle"| === [[File:Base_ExampleCommandModel.png|32px]] Tutorial === |- ! class="ctOdd"|Class |- | class="ctEven"|{{{Class}}} |- ! class="ctOdd"|Level |- | class="ctEven"|{{{Level}}} |- ! class="ctOdd"|Time to complete |- | class="ctEven"|{{{Time|Not provided}}} |- ! class="ctOdd"|Author |- | class="ctEven"|{{{Author|Not provided}}} |- ! class="ctOdd"|FreeCAD version |- | class="ctEven"|{{{FCVersion|0.14.3700 or greater}}} |- ! class="ctOdd"|Example File(s) |- | class="ctEven"|{{{Files|None}}} |- | class="ctToc"|
__TOC__ |} ==Usage== This Template is the main anchor on documenting Tutorials. It should be inserted as the first line in new documents. The minimum code required for this template usage is: (sample result to right) 
{{TutorialInfo|Class=SampleClass|Level=Beginner|FCVersion=0.14.3700 or greater}}
{{TutorialInfo|Class=SampleClass|Level=Beginner|FCVersion=0.14.3700 or greater}} ===Minimum Parameters=== The following parameters are used in the format [parameter]=[value], with each parameter in the list separated by a pipe symbol (|): ;Class : The subcategory of this tutorial. Proposed classes are: 2D Drafting, Modeling, Rendering. ;Level : Experience level required to complete this tutorial: Beginner, Intermediate, Advanced. ;FCVersion : The FreeCAD version used in the creation of this tutorial. This should be the current stable version at the moment of writing. ===Optional Parameters=== The following parameters are optional. If they are not included in the template code, they will default to a value of "None". ;Time : The approximate time required to complete the tutorial. ;Author : Author of the tutorial. A link to the author's wiki or forum profile page will allow visitors to reach him/her with questions or comments. ;Files : Optional link to example files. An appropriate repository needs to be determined (GitHub or CADinet, see [http://forum.freecadweb.org/viewtopic.php?f=21&t=7635#p62352 forum discussion] ==Localization== The code required for this template is different if you are using a localized version. For more information see the [[Localisation#Translating_the_wiki|Localization]] page. * First, a localized version of this template must exist or be created. * The localized template must be named: 
Template:TutorialInfo/AA
where '''''/AA''''' is the 2 letter code for the desired language, for example '''''/fr''''' = French localization. * The method for calling the localized TutorialInfo template in a Tutorial document is: 
{{TutorialInfo/AA|Class=SampleClass|Level=Beginner|FCVersion=>=0.14.3700}}
where '''''/AA''''' is the 2 letter code for the desired language, for example '''''/fr''''' = French localization. * Make sure you add the localized version of this template to the Languages list below. [[Category:Template]] [[Category:Tutorials]]

{{TutorialInfo|Class=SampleClass|Level=Beginner|FCVersion=0.14.3700 or greater}} ===Minimum Parameters=== The following parameters are used in the format [parameter]=[value], with each parameter in the list separated by a pipe symbol (|): ;Class : The subcategory of this tutorial. Proposed classes are: 2D Drafting, Modeling, Rendering. ;Level : Experience level required to complete this tutorial: Beginner, Intermediate, Advanced. ;FCVersion : The FreeCAD version used in the creation of this tutorial. This should be the current stable version at the moment of writing. ===Optional Parameters=== The following parameters are optional. If they are not included in the template code, they will default to a value of "None". ;Time : The approximate time required to complete the tutorial. ;Author : Author of the tutorial. A link to the author's wiki or forum profile page will allow visitors to reach him/her with questions or comments. ;Files : Optional link to example files. An appropriate repository needs to be determined (GitHub or CADinet, see [http://forum.freecadweb.org/viewtopic.php?f=21&t=7635#p62352 forum discussion] ==Localization== The code required for this template is different if you are using a localized version. For more information see the [[Localisation#Translating_the_wiki|Localization]] page. * First, a localized version of this template must exist or be created. * The localized template must be named: 
Template:TutorialInfo/AA
where '''''/AA''''' is the 2 letter code for the desired language, for example '''''/fr''''' = French localization. * The method for calling the localized TutorialInfo template in a Tutorial document is: 
{{TutorialInfo/AA|Class=SampleClass|Level=Beginner|FCVersion=>=0.14.3700}}
where '''''/AA''''' is the 2 letter code for the desired language, for example '''''/fr''''' = French localization. * Make sure you add the localized version of this template to the Languages list below. [[Category:Template/it]] [[Category:Tutorials/it]]

* [[Image:Workbench_PartDesign.png|16px]] The [[PartDesign Workbench|Part Design Workbench]] for building Part shapes from sketches * [[Image:Workbench_Draft.png|16px]] The [[Draft Module|Draft Workbench]] for doing basic 2D CAD drafting * [[Image:Workbench_Mesh.png|16px]] The [[Mesh Module|Mesh Module]] for working with triangulated meshes * [[Image:Workbench_Part.png|16px]] The [[Part Module|Part Module]] for working with CAD parts * [[Image:Workbench_Image.png|16px]] The [[Image Module|Image Module]] for working with bitmap images * [[Image:Raytracing.png|16px]] The [[Raytracing Module|Raytracing Module]] for working with ray-tracing (rendering) * [[Image:Workbench_Drawing.png|16px]] The [[Drawing Module|Drawing workbench]] for displaying your 3D work on a 2D sheet * [[Image:Workbench_Robot.png|16px]] The [[Robot Module|Robot Module]] for studying robot movements * [[Image:Workbench_Sketcher.png|16px]] The [[Sketcher Module|Sketcher Module]] for working with geometry-constrained sketches * [[Image:Arch.png|16px]] The [[Arch Module|Arch Module]] for working with architectural elements * [[Image:Workbench_OpenSCAD.png|16px]] The [[OpenSCAD Module|OpenSCAD Module]] for interoperability with OpenSCAD and repairing CSG model history * [[Image:Workbench_Assembly.png|16px]] The [[Assembly_project|Assembly Module]] for working with multiple shapes, multiple documents, multiple files, multiple relationships... * [[Image:Workbench_Mesh.png|16px]] The [[Fem Workbench|Fem Module]] for Pre- and Post-processing FEM studies * [[File:FreeCAD-Ship-Ico.png|16px]] The [[FreeCADShip Workbench|Ship Workbench]] FreeCAD-Ship works over Ship entities, that must be created on top of provided geometry. * [[File:Plot_Save.png|16px]] The [[Plot Module|Plot Workbench]] The Plot module allows to edit and save output plots created from other modules and tools. * [[File:Spreadsheet Create.png|16px]] The [[Spreadsheet Module|Spreadsheet Workbench]] for creating and manipulating spreadsheet data
<noinclude>[[Category:Administration]] [[Category:Template]]</noinclude>

* [[Image:Workbench_PartDesign.png|16px]] [[PartDesign Workbench|Part Design Workbench]] 用于从草图创建零件形状 * [[Image:Workbench_Draft.png|16px]] [[Draft Module|Draft Workbench]] 用于绘制基本的二维CAD草图 * [[Image:Workbench_Mesh.png|16px]] [[Mesh Workbench]] 用于处理三角网格 * [[Image:Workbench_Part.png|16px]] [[Part Workbench]] 用于处理 CAD 零件 * [[Image:Workbench_Image.png|16px]] [[Image Workbench]] 用于处理位图图像 * [[Image:Raytracing.png|16px]] [[Raytracing Workbench]] 用于处理射线追踪（透视图） * [[Image:Workbench_Drawing.png|16px]] [[Drawing Module|Drawing workbench]] 用于在二维场景中呈现三维部件 * [[Image:Workbench_Robot.png|16px]] [[Robot Workbench]] 用于模拟机器人动作 * [[Image:Workbench_Sketcher.png|16px]] [[Sketcher Workbench]] 用于处理几何草图 * [[Image:Arch.png|16px]] [[Arch Workbench]] 用于处理建筑元素 <noinclude>[[Category:Template/cn]]</noinclude>

* [[Image:Workbench_PartDesign.png|16px]] The [[PartDesign Workbench/cs|Pracovní plocha Návrh Dílu]] for building Part shapes from sketches * [[Image:Workbench_Draft.png|16px]] The [[Draft Module/cs|Kreslicí modul]] for doing basic 2D CAD drafting * [[Image:Workbench_Mesh.png|16px]] The [[Mesh_Workbench/cs|Pracovní plocha Sít]] for working with triangulated meshes * [[Image:Workbench_Part.png|16px]] The [[Part_Module/cs|Modul Díl]] for working with CAD parts * [[Image:Workbench_Image.png|16px]] The [[Image Workbench/cs|Image Workbench]] for working with bitmap images * [[Image:Raytracing.png|16px]] The [[Raytracing Workbench/cs|Raytracing Workbench]] for working with ray-tracing (rendering) * [[Image:Workbench_Drawing.png|16px]] The [[Drawing Module/cs|Modul Výkres]] for displaying your 3D work on a 2D sheet * [[Image:Workbench_Robot.png|16px]] The [[Robot Workbench/cs|Robot Workbench]] for studying robot movements * [[Image:Workbench_Sketcher.png|16px]] The [[Sketcher Workbench/cs|Sketcher Workbench]] for working with geometry-constrained sketches * [[Image:Arch.png|16px]] The [[Arch Module/cs|Modul Architektura]] for working with architectural elements * [[Image:Workbench_OpenSCAD.png|16px]] The [[OpenSCAD Workbench/cs|OpenSCAD Workbench]] for interoperability with OpenSCAD and repairing CSG model history * [[Image:Workbench_Assembly.png|16px]] The [[Assembly_project/cs|Assembly Workbench]] for working with multiple shapes, multiple documents, multiple files, multiple relationships... * [[Image:Workbench_Mesh.png|16px]] The [[Fem Workbench/cs|Fem Workbench]] for Pre- and Post-processing FEM studies * [[File:FreeCAD-Ship-Ico.png|16px]] The [[FreeCADShip_Workbench/cs|Ship Workbench]] FreeCAD-Ship works over Ship entities, that must be created on top of provided geometry. * [[File:Plot_Save.png|16px]] The [[Plot_Module/cs|Plot Workbench]] The Plot module allows to edit and save output plots created from other modules and tools. <noinclude>[[Category:Template/cs]]</noinclude>

* [[Image:Workbench_PartDesign.png|16px]] Der [[PartDesign_Workbench|Arbeitsbereich Part Design]] (PartDesign) für die Erstellung von Körpern aus Skizzen sowie die Bearbeitung von Körpern mittels Skizzen. * [[Image:Workbench_Draft.png|16px]] Der [[Draft Module/de|Arbeitsbereich Entwurf]] (Draft) für die Arbeit mit ebenen Konstruktionselementen wie Linien, Kreisen, Text, Maßketten und Schraffuren. * [[Image:Workbench_Mesh.png|16px]] Der [[Mesh Module/de|Arbeitsbereich Netz]] (Mesh) für die Arbeit mit Oberflächennetzen. Aktuell sind dies vor allem polygonale Dreiecks- und Vierecksnetze. * [[Image:Workbench_Part.png|16px]] Der [[Part Module/de|Arbeitsbereich Part]] (Part) für die Erstellung von [[Part CreatePrimitives/de|Grundkörpern]], die grundlegende Bearbeitung von Körpern und Ausführung von Boolschen Operationen mit Körpern. * [[Image:Workbench_Image.png|16px]] Der [[Image Module/de|Arbeitsbereich Bild]] (Image) für die Arbeit mit Bitmap-Bildern. * [[Image:Raytracing.png|16px]] Der [[Raytracing Module/de|Arbeitsbereich Rendering]] für die Erstellung von fotorealistischen Bildern von Körpermodellen (Ray-Tracing). * [[Image:Workbench_Drawing.png|16px]] Der [[Drawing Module/de|Arbeitsbereich Zeichnung]] (Drawing) für die Ausgabe der erstellten Konstruktionselemente und Körpermodelle auf einem Zeichnungsblatt mit Titel. * [[Image:Workbench_Robot.png|16px]] Der [[Robot Workbench/de|Arbeitsbereich Roboter]] (Robot) für das Simulieren von Roboterbewegungen. * [[Image:Workbench_Sketcher.png|16px]] Der [[Sketcher Workbench/de|Arbeitsbereich Skizze]] (Sketcher) für das Erstellen von Geometrien mit Rand- bzw. Zwangsbedingungen. * [[Image:Workbench_Arch.svg|16px]] Der [[Arch Module/de|Arbeitsbereich Architektur]] (Arch) für die Arbeit mit Architektur-Bauteilen. * [[Image:Workbench_OpenSCAD.png|16px]] Der [[OpenSCAD Module/de|Arbeitsbereich OpenSCAD]] (OpenSCAD) für den Austausch mit OpenSCAD sowie CSG-Modell History-Reparaturen. * [[Image:Workbench_Assembly.png|16px]] Der [[Assembly_project/de|Arbeitsbereich Montage]] (Assembly) für die Arbeit mit mehreren Formen, mehreren Dokumenten, mehreren Dateien, mehreren Beziehungen... * [[Image:Workbench_Mesh.png|16px]] Der [[Fem Workbench/de|Arbeitsbereich FEM]] (Fem) für Vor- und Nachbearbeitung von FEM-Berechnungen. * [[File:FreeCAD-Ship-Ico.png|16px]] Der [[FreeCADShip_Workbench/de|Arbeitsbereich Boot]] (Ship) arbeitet mit Schiff-Entitäten, welche aufbauend auf bestehender Geometrie erstellt werden. * [[File:Plot_Save.png|16px]] Der [[Plot Module/de|Arbeitsbereich Diagramm]] (Plot) erlaubt das Editieren und Speichern von Diagrammausgaben. Basiert auf mathplotlib. * [[File:Spreadsheet Create.png|16px]] Der [[Spreadsheet_Workbench/de|Arbeitsbereich Tabellenkalkulation]] (Spreadsheet) für das Erstellen und Bearbeiten von tabellarischen Daten. <noinclude>[[Category:Administration/de]] [[Category:Template/de]]</noinclude>

* [[Image:Workbench_PartDesign.png|16px]] El [[PartDesign Workbench/es|entorno de Diseño de Piezas]] para construir piezas formadas por croquis * [[Image:Workbench_Draft.png|16px]] El [[Draft Module|Draft Module/es|entorno de Boceto]] para trabajar en bocetos 2D. * [[Image:Workbench_Mesh.png|16px]] El [[Mesh Module/es|entorno de Mallas]] para trabajar con ''mallas'' triangulares. * [[Image:Workbench_Part.png|16px]] El [[Part Module/es|entorno de Piezas]] para trabajar con ''piezas''. * [[Image:Workbench_Image.png|16px]] El [[Image Module/es|entorno de Imágenes]] para trabajar con bitmap (imágenes de mapa de bits). * [[Image:Raytracing.png|16px]] El [[Raytracing Module/es|entorno de Ray-tracing]] para trabajar con ray-tracing (rendering). * [[Image:Workbench_Drawing.png|16px]] El [[Drawing Module|Drawing Module/es|entorno de Dibujo]] para mostrar convenientemente su trabajo 3D en una hoja de dibujo 2D. * [[Image:Workbench_Robot.png|16px]] El [[Robot_Workbench/es|entorno de Simulación de Robots]] para estudiar los movimientos de los robots. * [[Image:Workbench_Sketcher.png|16px]] El [[Sketcher Module/es|entorno del Croquizador]] para trabajar con croquis con restricciones geométricas. * [[Image:Arch.png|16px]] El [[Arch Module/es|entorno de Arquitectura]] para trabajar con elementos arquitectónicos. * [[Image:Workbench_OpenSCAD.png|16px]] El [[OpenSCAD Workbench/es|entorno de OpenSCAD]] para interactuar con OpenSCAD y reparar el historial del modelo CSG <noinclude>[[Category:Template/es]]</noinclude>

* [[File:Workbench_PartDesign.png|16px]] Le [[PartDesign_Workbench/fr|Concepteur de pièces]] pour construire des pièces à partir d'esquisses. * [[File:Workbench_Draft.png|16px]] La [[Draft_Module/fr|Planche à dessin]] pour le dessin technique en deux dimensions. * [[File:Workbench_Mesh.png|16px]] L'[[Mesh_Module/fr|atelier Maillage]] pour travailler avec des maillages. * [[File:Workbench_Part.png|16px]] L'[[Part_Module/fr|atelier Pièce]] pour travailler avec des pièces de CAO. * [[File:Workbench_Image.png|16px]] L'[[Image_Module/fr|atelier Image]] pour travailler avec des images matricielles. * [[File:Raytracing.png|16px]] L'[[Raytracing_Module/fr|atelier Raytracing]] pour le lancer de rayons (rendu). * [[File:Workbench_Drawing.png|16px]] L'[[Drawing_Module/fr|atelier de mise en plan]] pour afficher votre projet 3D sur feuille(s) en deux dimensions. * [[File:Workbench_Robot.png|16px]] L'[[Robot_Workbench/fr|atelier Robot]] pour étudier les mouvements de robots industriels. * [[File:Workbench_Sketcher.png|16px]] L'[[Sketcher_Workbench/fr|atelier esquisse]] pour créer des esquisses contraintes géométriquement. * [[File:Arch.png|16px]] L'[[Arch_Module/fr|atelier Architecture]] pour concevoir des éléments architecturaux. * [[File:Workbench_OpenSCAD.png|16px]] L'[[OpenSCAD_Module/fr|atelier OpenSCAD]] offre une interopérabilité au logiciel libres [http://www.openscad.org/ OpenSCAD]. * [[Image:Workbench_Assembly.png|16px]] L'[[Assembly_project/fr|Atelier assemblage]] pour travailler avec plusieurs formes, plusieurs documents, plusieurs dossiers, plusieurs relations... * [[Image:Workbench_Mesh.png|16px]] L'[[Fem_Workbench/fr|Atelier Fem]] pour les études pré- et post-traitement FEM. * [[File:FreeCAD-Ship-Ico.png|16px]] L'[[FreeCADShip_Workbench/fr|atelier FreeCADShip]] pour créer des navires. * [[File:Plot_Save.png|16px]] Le [[Plot_Module/fr|Module Plot]] permet de modifier, et, d'enregistrer les sorties créées à partir d'autres modules, et, outils. * [[File:Spreadsheet Create.png|16px]] Le [[Spreadsheet Module/fr|tableur]] sert a créer et manipuler des données dans une feuille de calcul. <noinclude>[[Category:Template/fr]]</noinclude>

В настоящее время доступны следующие инструментарии:
'''Встроенные инструментарии''' * [[Image:Workbench_Mesh.png|16px]] [[Mesh Module/ru|Полигиональный инструментарий]] для работы с триангулированными сетками (полигиональные модели). * [[Image:Workbench_Part.png|16px]] [[Part Module/ru|Инструментарий Деталей]] для работы с CAD деталями. * [[Image:Workbench_Image.png|16px]] [[Image Module/ru|Инструментарий изображений]] для работы с bitmap изображениями. * [[Raytracing Module/ru|Инструментарий Рендеринга]] для работы с трасировкой лучей(рендеринг). * [[Image:Workbench_Draft.png|16px]] [[Draft Module/ru|Чертежный модуль]] для выполнения основных задача 2D черчения. * [[Drawing Module/ru|Инструментарий проецирования]] для отображения ваших 3D работ на 2D лист. * [[Image:Workbench_Robot.png|16px]] [[Robot Workbench/ru|Инструментарий Автоматики]] для изучения движений роботов. * [[Sketcher Workbench/ru|Инструментарий Эскизов]] для работы с геометрически ограниченными эскизами(на эскиз накладываются ограничения) * [[PartDesign Workbench/ru|Инструментарий Проектирования Деталей]] Для создания деталей из эскизов * Несколько тестируемых инструментариев. В списке инструметариев вы найдете, несколько инструментариев для тестирования в различных областях и функционльных возможностях,так как FreeCAD до сих пор находится на ранней стадии разработки. <noinclude>[[Category:Template/ru]]</noinclude>
